tika-abh02t0:838_2: kathitāti iminā imasmiṃ vibhaṅge kathitānaṃ lokiyabhāvameva dassento khandhavibhaṅgādīhi visesetīti na
tika-abh02t0:838_3: aññattha lokuttarānaṃ appamaññānaṃ kathitatā anuññātā hoti.
tika-abh02t0:843_2: Piṭṭhapūvaodanakiṇṇanānāsambhāre pakkhipitvā madditvā katā surā nāma.
tika-abh02t0:845_0: Kammapathā evāti asabbasādhāraṇesu jhānādikoṭṭhāsesu kammapathakoṭṭhāsikā evāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:845_6: tasmāssa yathāvuttesveva kammapathesu upakārakattasabhāgattavasena anupaveso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:846_2: “Sabbāpi hi etā vītikkamitabbavatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā veracetanāhi eva viramantī”ti ca vakkhatīti.
tika-abh02t0:847_2: Dosavasena musākathane ca niṭṭhappatto saṅghabhedo gahito.
tika-abh02t0:847_3: Dosavasena parassa byasanatthāya musākathane pana tassa tassa guṇavasena appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā yojetabbā,
tika-abh02t0:847_5: Nissaggiyathāvaravijjāmayiddhimayā sāhatthikāṇattikesveva pavisantīti dve eva gahitā.
tika-abh02t0:848_0: Pañcapi kammapathā evāti cetanāsaṅkhātaṃ pariyāyasīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:849_3: Ettha pana sikkhāpadavāre pahīnapañcābhabbaṭṭhānassa arahato viramitabbaverassa sabbathā abhāvā kiriyesu viratiyo na santīti na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh02t0:849_4: sekkhānaṃ pana pahīnapañcaverattepi taṃsabhāgatāya verabhūtānaṃ akusalānaṃ veranidānānaṃ lobhādīnañca sabbhāvā viratīnaṃ uppatti na na bhavissati.
tika-abh02t0:849_5: Akusalasamuṭṭhitāni ca kāyakammādīni tesaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni verāneva,
tika-abh02t0:849_8: Sikkhāvāre ca abhāvetabbatāya phaladhammāpi na sikkhitabbā,
tika-abh02t0:849_9: nāpi sikkhitasikkhassa uppajjamānā kiriyadhammāti na keci abyākatā sikkhāti uddhaṭā.
tika-abh02t0:852_0: 714. Sampattavirativasenāti sampatte paccuppanne ārammaṇe yathāviramitabbato virativasenāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:858_1: Eseva nayoti saṅkhepena dassetvā tameva nayaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “dhammappabhedassa hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:858_2: Niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṃ atthādīnaṃ paccayuppannādibhedehi bhinditvā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:859_0: “Yaṃ kiñci paccayasamuppanna”nti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni.
tika-abh02t0:859_3: abhidhammabhājanīye vipāko kiriyañcāti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānameva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā,
tika-abh02t0:860_1: tadatthaṃ pana vibhāvetumāha “pavatteti ceva pāpeti cā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:860_4: Maggo pana nibbānaṃ pāpetīti tasmiṃ pacchimo.
tika-abh02t0:861_3: Tassā abhilāpeti tassā niruttiyā avacanabhūtāya paññattiyā abhilāpeti keci vaṇṇayanti.
tika-abh02t0:861_6: na ca vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi,
tika-abh02t0:861_8: evaṃ sati atthadhammavajjaṃ tehi bodhetabbaṃ na vijjatīti tesaṃ niruttibhāvo āpajjati.
tika-abh02t0:861_12: tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:862_0: Taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ
tika-abh02t0:862_1: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā
tika-abh02t0:862_3: “Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā”ti ca vacanaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
tika-abh02t0:862_4: Evaṃ pana aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇanti vuttanti āpajjati.
tika-abh02t0:862_5: Yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussāmanussādisaddappabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ saddavibhāvakaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:862_8: Taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassāti ca paccuppannasaddārammaṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattayantassāti na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:862_9: Tampi hi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventaṃyeva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayahetuttā
tika-abh02t0:862_10: niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti ca pabhedagatampi hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:862_11: Sabhāvaniruttīti māgadhabhāsā adhippetāti tato aññaṃ sakkaṭanāmādisaddaṃ sandhāya “aññaṃ panā”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:863_7: tasmā paṭisambhidāto aññeneva pakārena jānitabbato na sakkaṭabhāsājānanaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:864_0: Idaṃ kathitanti māgadhabhāsāya sabhāvaniruttitāñāpanatthaṃ idaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ kathitanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:865_1: Sesā parivattanti ekantena kālantare aññathā honti vinassanti ca.
tika-abh02t0:865_2: Māgadhā pana katthaci kadāci parivattantīpi na sabbattha sabbadā sabbathā ca parivattati,
tika-abh02t0:865_6: teneva “nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti gāthaṃ pucchito citto gahapati “‘kiṃ nu kho etaṃ, bhante,
tika-abh02t0:866_1: Tañhi sabbesu tesu tīsu catūsupi vā pavattattā,
tika-abh02t0:866_2: kusalakiriyabhūtāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā “sabbatthakañāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:866_3: Imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti sātthakānaṃ paccavekkhitabbattā sabbo attho etassātipi sabbatthakaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:866_5: Sekkhe pavattā arahattappattiyā visadā hontīti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:866_6: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
tika-abh02t0:867_0: Pucchāya parato pavattā kathāti katvā aṭṭhakathā “paripucchā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:867_1: Paṭipattiṃ pūretabbaṃ maññissantīti paṭipattigarutāya lābhaṃ hīḷentena satasahassagghanakampi kambalaṃ
tika-abh02t0:867_2: vāsiyā koṭṭetvā paribhaṇḍakaraṇaṃ mayā kataṃ āvajjitvā lābhagaruno pariyattidharā dhammakathikāva bhavituṃ
tika-abh02t0:867_4: Ettha ca therassa kaṅkhuppattiyā pubbe avisadataṃ dassetvā arahattappattassa pañhavissajjanena arahattappattiyā visadatā dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:867_5: Tissatthero anantaraṃ vutto tissatthero evāti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:868_0: Pabhedo nāma maggehi adhigatānaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ pabhedagamanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:868_4: Na pana tathāti yathā adhigamassa balavapaccayo hoti,
tika-abh02t0:868_8: Tattha paṭisambhidā nāma natthīti paṭisambhidādhigamo natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:868_11: Pubbayogādhigamā hi dvepi visadakāraṇāti “pubbayogo pabhedassa balavapaccayo hotī”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh02t0:871_3: dhammavāre veneyyavasena atītānañca saṅgahitattā “uppannā samuppannā”tiādi na vuttanti atītapaccuppannā “atthā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:871_4: taṃnibbattakā ca “dhammā”ti idametesaṃ dvinnampi vārānaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:875_1: Avuttattāti “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇa”nti sāmaññena vatvā visesena avuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:875_2: Ettha ca kiriyānaṃ avipākattā dhammabhāvo na vuttoti.
tika-abh02t0:875_3: Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvo ca na vattabboti? Na,
tika-abh02t0:875_7: vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭattā dhammabhāvova tesaṃ vutto.
tika-abh02t0:875_10: kammaphalasambandhassa pana ahetuttā dhammabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh02t0:875_12: idaṃ paccayuppanna”nti evaṃ bhedaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale vipākakiriyadhamme ca sabhāvato paccavekkhantassa
tika-abh02t0:875_13: dhammapaṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā ca hotītipi tesaṃ atthadhammatā na vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:875_14: Kusalākusalavāresu ca dhammapaṭisambhidā kusalākusalānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ sattivisesaṃ sanipphādetabbataṃ
tika-abh02t0:875_15: passantī nipphādetabbāpekkhā hotīti taṃsambandheneva “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:875_16: Sabhāvadassanamattameva pana atthapaṭisambhidāya kiccaṃ nipphannaphalamattadassanatoti tassā nipphādakānapekkhattā
tika-abh02t0:875_17: vipākavāre “tesaṃ vipaccanake ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:876_3: Puna dhammassavane jānissathāti appassutattā dutiyavāraṃ kathento tadeva kathessatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:877_0: 746. Bhūmidassanatthanti ettha kāmāvacarā lokuttarā ca bhūmi “bhūmī”ti veditabbā, cittuppādā vāti.
tika-abh02t0:880_1: Paccayasamuppannañca atthaṃ paccayadhammañcāti vacanehi hetādipaccayasamuppannānaṃ kusalākusalarūpānampi atthapariyāyaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:880_3: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya kāmāvacaravipākārammaṇatā mahaggatārammaṇatā ca paṭisambhidāñāṇārammaṇatte na
tika-abh02t0:880_4: yujjati paṭisambhidāñāṇānaṃ kāmāvacaralokuttarakusalesu kāmāvacarakiriyālokuttaravipākesu ca uppattito.
tika-abh02t0:880_6: “yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānātī”ti vacanato pana na sabbañāṇārammaṇatāti kathayanti.
tika-abh02t0:880_7: Suttantabhājanīye pana “ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti avisesena vuttattā sabbañāṇārammaṇatā siyā.
tika-abh02t0:880_8: Abhidhammabhājanīyepi cittuppādavasena kathanaṃ niravasesakathananti yathādassitavisayavacanavasena “yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānātī”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:880_10: Yathā ca atthapaṭisambhidāvisayānaṃ na niravasesena kathanaṃ abhidhammabhājanīye,
tika-abh02t0:880_12: Evaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya sabbañāṇavisayattā “tisso paṭisambhidā siyā parittārammaṇā siyā mahaggatārammaṇā siyā appamāṇārammaṇā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:881_0: Yadipi “siyā atthapaṭisambhidā na maggārammaṇā”ti vacanato abhidhammabhājanīye vuttapaṭisambhidāsveva pañhapucchakanayo pavatto.
tika-abh02t0:881_1: Na hi maggo paccayuppanno na hoti,
tika-abh02t0:881_2: abhidhammabhājanīye ca paṭisambhidāñāṇavisayā eva paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā vuttāti na tassā mahaggatārammaṇatāti.
tika-abh02t0:881_4: tāsu balavatarāya ṭhatvā itarāya adhippāyo maggitabbo.
tika-abh02t0:881_5: Kusalākusalānaṃ pana paccayuppannattapaṭivedhopi kusalākusalabhāvapaṭivedhavinimutto natthīti nippariyāyā
tika-abh02t0:881_7: tathā vipākakiriyānaṃ paccayabhāvapaṭivedhopi vipākakiriyabhāvapaṭivedhavinimutto natthīti nippariyāyā
tika-abh02t0:881_9: Kiñci pana ñāṇaṃ appaṭibhānabhūtaṃ natthi ñeyyappakāsanatoti sabbasmimpi ñāṇe nippariyāyā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh02t0:881_10: Nippariyāyapaṭisambhidāsu pañhapucchakassa pavattiyaṃ dvepi pāḷiyo na virujjhanti.
tika-abh02t0:882_0: Saddārammaṇattā bahiddhārammaṇāti ettha parassa abhilāpasaddārammaṇattāti bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:882_1: Na hi saddārammaṇatā bahiddhārammaṇatāya kāraṇaṃ saddassa ajjhattassa ca sabbhāvāti.
tika-abh02t0:882_2: Anuvattamāno ca so eva saddoti visesanaṃ na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:887_1: Okāsaṭṭhena sampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇañcāpi ñāṇassa vatthu.
tika-abh02t0:887_4: tathā ekaṃ aññampīti hi gahetabbaṃ avitathasāmaññayuttaṃ ñāṇārammaṇaṃ yāthāvakavatthu.
tika-abh02t0:888_1: Osānadukassa pana dukamātikaṃ anissāya vuttattā dukabhāvānurūpehīti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:890_12: tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca,
tika-abh02t0:890_13: tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni dissanti,
tika-abh02t0:890_17: brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti ‘imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī’ti”ādinā vuttaṃ anekañāṇappabhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh02t0:890_18: Yāthāvapaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ ñeyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhakaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:891_2: aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, buddhā.
tika-abh02t0:891_3: Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-abh02t0:891_4: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:891_8: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:891_10: na samanupassāmī”ti vacanena dassitaakampiyañāṇayutto dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-abh02t0:892_0: “Devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”ti suttasesena sappurisūpassayādīnaṃ phalasampatti pavatti,
tika-abh02t0:892_1: purimasappurisūpassayādiṃ upanissāya pacchimasappurisūpassayādīnaṃ sampatti pavatti vā vuttāti ādi-
tika-abh02t0:892_4: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:892_5: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphattiparassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:892_6: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:893_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-abh02t0:896_0: “Idānī”ti etassa “iminā anukkamena vuttānīti veditabbānī”ti iminā saha yojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh02t0:896_6: Tattha tadabhāvaggahaṇena gahitaṃ “atthi dinna”ntiādikāya sammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhitiṃ tabbiparītāya ṭhānābhāvañca
tika-abh02t0:896_7: adhigamassa ṭhānaṃ passantena iminā ñāṇena adhigamānadhigamānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūte kilesāvaraṇatadabhāve
tika-abh02t0:896_8: passati bhagavāti imamatthaṃ sādhento āha “lokiyasammādiṭṭhiṭhitidassanato niyatamicchādiṭṭhiṭhānābhāvadassanato cā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:896_9: Ettha ca adhigamaṭṭhānadassanameva adhippetaṃ upari bhabbapuggalavaseneva vipākāvaraṇābhāvadassanādikassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-abh02t0:896_10: Iminā pana ñāṇena sijjhanato pasaṅgena itarampi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:896_11: Dhātuvemattadassanatoti rāgādīnaṃ adhimattatādivasena taṃsahitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vemattatādassanato,
tika-abh02t0:896_12: “ayaṃ imissā dhātuyā adhimattattā rāgacarito”tiādinā cariyāhetūnaṃ vā,
tika-abh02t0:896_13: rāgādayo eva vā pakatibhāvato dhātūti rāgādivemattadassanatoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:896_14: Payogaṃ anādiyitvāti santatimahāmattaaṅgulimālādīnaṃ viya kāmarāgabyāpādādivasena payogaṃ anādiyitvā.
tika-abh02t0:898_1: Na hetumevāti ettha ca na hetū evāti attho,
tika-abh02t0:898_6: Cutiggahaṇena cutiparicchinnāya ekāya jātiyā gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:898_9: Uppannaṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti “na rūpaṃ viya uppannā chaviññāṇaviññeyyā”ti rūpato etesaṃ visesanaṃ karoti.
tika-abh02t0:899_1: Kappato kappaṃ gantvāpi na uppajjatīti na kadāci tathā uppajjati.
tika-abh02t0:899_2: Na hi khīrādīnaṃ viya etesaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇavilakkhaṇatā atthīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:900_1: Samodhānetvāti loke vijjamānaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ samodhānetvā.
tika-abh02t0:900_2: Etena mahattepi avibhāvakattaṃ dassento sukhumattā na vibhāvessatīti vādapathaṃ chindati.
tika-abh02t0:903_3: Ettha ca “pañca viññāṇā anābhogā”ti ābhogasabhāvā na hontīti attho,
tika-abh02t0:903_4: “pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ natthi āvaṭṭanā vā”tiādīsupi āvaṭṭanabhāvo vātiādinā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:904_0: Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti ettha na sabbe rūpādidhammā dhammaggahaṇena gahitāti yathādhippetadhammadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh02t0:905_0: Rūpādīsu abhinipatanaṃ tehi samāgamo tesantipi vattuṃ yujjatīti āha “rūpādīnaṃ abhinipātamatta”nti.
tika-abh02t0:905_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotītiādīsu hi ayaṃ adhippāyo –
tika-abh02t0:905_4: ārammaṇakaraṇena paṭivijānitabbāni rūpādīni ṭhapetvā kusalākusalacetanāya taṃsampayuttānañca yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-abh02t0:905_6: Evañca katvā “dassanādimattato pana muttā aññā etesaṃ kusalādipaṭiviññatti nāma natthī”ti kiccantaraṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh02t0:906_0: Avipākabhāvena aññaṃ abyākatasāmaññaṃ anivārento kusalākusalaggahaṇañca karotīti cavanapariyosānañca kiccaṃ. Pi-
tika-abh02t0:906_1: saddena sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni sampiṇḍetvā pañcadvāre paṭisedhane ayaṃ adhippāyo siyā –
tika-abh02t0:906_3: pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā”ti evaṃ vuttā bhāsanakaraṇakarā,
tika-abh02t0:906_4: taṃsadisā ca sukhadukkhuppādakā balavanto chaṭṭhadvārikā eva dhammaggahaṇena gahitāti na tesaṃ pañcadvārikajavanena paṭivijānanaṃ atthi,
tika-abh02t0:906_5: dubbalānaṃ pana pubbaṅgamapaṭivijānanaṃ tattha na paṭisiddhaṃ “na kāyakammaṃ na vacīkammaṃ paṭṭhapetī”ti
tika-abh02t0:906_8: tabbiparītaṃ akusalaṃ kammaṃ karomīti ca kusalākusalasamādānaṃ pañcadvārikajavanena na hoti.
tika-abh02t0:906_9: Tathā paṭiccasamuppādavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttā “pañcadvārikacuti ca na pañcadvārikacittehi hoti cuticittassa ataṃdvārikattā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:906_10: Yā panāyaṃ pāḷi “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:906_11: tassā rūpādīnaṃ āpāthamattaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ kañci dhammasabhāvaṃ na paṭivijānātīti ayamattho dissati.
tika-abh02t0:906_12: Na hi rūpaṃ paṭiggaṇhantampi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpanti ca gaṇhātīti.
tika-abh02t0:906_13: Sampaṭicchanassapi rūpanīlādiākārapaṭivijānanaṃ natthīti kiñci dhammassa paṭivijānanaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:906_14: pañcahi pana viññāṇehi sātisayaṃ tassa vijānananti “aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:906_16: tato aññaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidaṃ icchantehi pañcadvārajavanena paṭisambhidāñāṇassa sahuppatti paṭisiddhā.
tika-abh02t0:907_1: nanu rūpādīnaṃ āpāthagamane niddāpaṭibodho hotīti? Na,
tika-abh02t0:907_2: paṭhamaṃ manodvārikajavanassa uppattitoti dassento āha “niddāyantassa hī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:908_1: Evaṃ vadantehi manodvārepi āvajjanaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:909_0: Tassā eva vasenāti tassā vasena ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu hotīti ca, veditabbanti ca yojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh02t0:912_1: saddo aññatra sabhāvaṃ gahetvā adhikaraṇesu pavattamāno adhikaraṇavasena liṅgaparivattiṃ gacchatīti adhippāyena
tika-abh02t0:912_2: jāpitā ca sā atthā cāti jāpitatthāti ayamattho vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:915_3: tasmā yāni paññāya vihitāni ahesuṃ honti bhavissanti ca,
tika-abh02t0:915_8: Vaḍḍhakīkammanti ca asikkhitvāpi kātabbaṃ thūlakammaṃ “kamma”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:915_9: paññā eva vā tattha tattha “kammaṃ sippa”nti ca veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:915_10: Nāgamaṇḍalaṃ nāma maṇḍalaṃ katvā sappe vijjāya pakkositvā baliṃ datvā visāpanayanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:915_14: “A ā”tiādikā mātikā “ka kā”tiādiko tappabhedo ca lekhā.
tika-abh02t0:916_2: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbānaṃ tappaṭivedhapaccayabhāvena anulomanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:916_4: puna tassā vevacanavasena “anulomikaṃ khanti”ntiādi vuttanti adhippāyena “anu…pe…
tika-abh02t0:916_6: Ettha ca evarūpinti yathāvuttakammāyatanādivisayaṃ kammassakatasaccānulomikasabhāvaṃ aniccādipavattiākārañcāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:916_8: Yassā paññāya dhammā nijjhānapajānanakiccasaṅkhātaṃ olokanaṃ khamanti aviparītasabhāvattā,
tika-abh02t0:916_9: sā paññā dhammānaṃ nijjhānakkhamanaṃ etissā atthīti dhammanijjhānakkhantīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:917_1: Asaṃvaraṃ muñcatīti samādānasampattaviratisampayuttacetanā “sīlaṃ pūrentassa muñcacetanā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:917_3: pubbacetanāvasena “adhikiccā”ti ca vattuṃ yuttanti “adhikiccā”tipi pāṭho yujjati.
tika-abh02t0:918_1: Pañcasīladasasīlāni viññāṇassa jātiyā ca paccayabhūtesu saṅkhārabhavesu antogadhānīti “uppādā vā”tiādikāya dhammaṭṭhitipāḷiyā saṅgahitāni.
tika-abh02t0:918_2: Bhavanibbattakasīlassa paññāpanaṃ satipi savane na tathāgatadesanāyattanti bhikkhuādīnampi taṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:920_1: Apāyuppādanakusalatā apāyakosallaṃ siyāti maññamāno pucchati “apāyakosallaṃ kathaṃ paññā nāma jātā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:920_2: Taṃ pana parassa adhippāyaṃ nivattento “paññavāyeva hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:920_4: Ṭhāne uppatti etassāti ṭhānuppattiyaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-abh02t0:920_6: bhayādīnaṃ uppattikkhaṇe tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne lahuuppajjanakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:923_0: 793. Na paritassatīti “api nāma me taṇḍulādīni siyu”nti na pattheti, tadabhāvena vā na uttasati.
tika-abh02t0:924_5: Saṅkhatapavaro vā ariyamaggo tassa ca phalaṃ dhammo,
tika-abh02t0:924_9: Ettha ca iminā dhammenāti maggañāṇenāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:924_10: duvidhampi pana maggaphalañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya ca mūlaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:924_11: kāraṇañca nayanayanassāti duvidhenapi tena dhammenāti na na yujjati,
tika-abh02t0:924_13: maggaphalasaṅkhātassa ca dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā nayanaṃ hotīti tena iminā dhammena ñāṇavisayabhāvena,
tika-abh02t0:924_14: ñāṇasampayogena vā ñātenāti ca attho na na yujjati.
tika-abh02t0:925_0: Yadipi sabbena sabbaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ abhijānanti,
tika-abh02t0:925_1: tathāpi paccuppanne sasantatipariyāpanne savisese abhiniveso hotīti āha “na taññeva ima”nti.
tika-abh02t0:926_0: Sammutimhi ñāṇanti dhamme ñāṇādīnaṃ viya sātisayassa paṭivedhakiccassa abhāvā visayobhāsanamattajānanasāmaññena ñāṇanti sammatesu antogadhanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:926_2: avasesaṃ pana itarañāṇattayavisabhāgaṃ ñāṇaṃ tabbisabhāgasāmaññena sammutiñāṇamhi paviṭṭhattā sammutiñāṇaṃ nāma hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:928_1: Sā hissāti ettha assāti yo “kāmesu vītarāgo hotī”ti evaṃ vutto,
tika-abh02t0:928_3: Svevāti etena kāmesu vītarāgabhāvanāvatthasseva paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgissa gahaṇe pavatte tassa tato paraṃ
tika-abh02t0:928_8: phale vā āsavakkhaye sati yathānurūpaṃ taṃnibbattanato catūsupi maggesu paññā chaṭṭhaṃ abhiññaṃ paṭivijjhatīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:929_3: Tadanudhammatāti tadanudhammā icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Tā-
tika-abh02t0:929_6: “Aho vata me avitakkaṃ uppajjeyyā”ti avitakkārammaṇā avitakkasahagatā.
tika-abh02t0:930_3: anārammaṇabhūtañca taṃ ṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontassāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:931_2: Ettha catasso paṭipadā cattāri ārammaṇānīti paññāya paṭipadārammaṇuddesena paññā eva uddiṭṭhāti sā eva vibhattāti.
tika-abh02t0:934_3: “so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandetī”tiādinā nayena pītiyā sukhassa ca pharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:934_4: Pītipharaṇatāsukhapharaṇatāhi ārammaṇe ṭhatvā catutthajjhānassa uppādanato “pādā viyā”ti tā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:935_0: Dutiyapañcake ca “pañcañāṇiko”ti samādhimukhena pañcañāṇāneva uddiṭṭhāni niddiṭṭhāni cāti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh02t0:935_3: imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ vāretabbañca atthīti maggānantaraṃ
tika-abh02t0:935_4: samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogeneva adhigatattā ca ṭhapitattā ca,
tika-abh02t0:935_6: Sativepullappattattāti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:938_3: Sotadhātuvisuddhīti ca cittacetasikā dhammā vuttāti tattha ñāṇaṃ sotadhātuvisuddhiyā ñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:938_6: Muddhappattena cutūpapātañāṇasaṅkhātena dibbacakkhuñāṇena sabbaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:941_1: Tadeva ñāṇanti chabbidhampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vipassanārammaṇabhāvena saha gahetvā vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:941_2: Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenāti chapi ñāṇāni saṅkhipitvā vuttena ñāṇena.
tika-abh02t0:941_4: ñāṇavipassanādassanato vipassanāpaṭivipassanādassanamattamevāti na taṃ aṅganti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:941_5: Pāḷiyaṃ pana sabbattha ñāṇavacanena aṅgānaṃ vuttattā nirodhadhammanti ñāṇanti iti-
tika-abh02t0:941_6: saddena pakāsetvā vuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ sattamaṃ ñāṇanti ayamattho dissati.
tika-abh02t0:941_8: tampi ñāṇanti sambandho hoti taṃñāṇaggahaṇe etasmiṃ ñāṇabhāvadassanassa anadhippetattā,
tika-abh02t0:944_0: 808. Vihāritabbaṭṭhenāti paccanīkadhamme, dukkhaṃ vā vicchinditvā pavattetabbaṭṭhena.
tika-abh02t0:948_5: Asukhe sukhanti diṭṭhivipallāsova idha sukhato upagamanassa ṭhānanti adhippetanti dassento “ekanta…pe…
tika-abh02t0:949_0: Liṅge parivatte ca so eva ekakammanibbattito bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho ca,
tika-abh02t0:950_2: vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇañca jīvitindriyaṃ ānantariyānānantariyabhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:950_4: Yathā vadhakacittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇampi jīvitindriyappabandhavicchedanavasena ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati,
tika-abh02t0:950_6: Sā hi cajitabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cajanamattameva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:951_1: kappavināseyeva muccatīti idaṃ kappaṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
tika-abh02t0:951_2: Tattha hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “āpāyikoti idaṃ suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-abh02t0:951_4: Kappavināseyevāti pana āyukappavināseyevāti atthe sati natthi virodho.
tika-abh02t0:951_5: Ettha ca saṇṭhahanteti idaṃ sve vinassissatīti viya abhūtaparikappavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:951_6: Ekadivasameva paccati tato paraṃ kappābhāvena āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:953_0: Kiṃ pana tanti yo so “niyato”ti vutto,
tika-abh02t0:953_2: Tasseva pana yathāpucchitassa niyatassa micchattasammattaniyatadhammānaṃ viya sabhāvato vijjamānataṃ
tika-abh02t0:953_3: yathāpucchitañca niyāmakahetuṃ paṭisedhetvā yena “niyato”ti “sattakkhattuparamādiko”ti ca vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:953_5: Jātassa kumārassa viya ariyāya jātiyā jātassa nāmamattametaṃ niyatasattakkhattuparamādikaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:953_8: sotāpanno ca niyatoti sotāpattimaggato uddhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayabhāvato pubbahetukiccaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:953_9: tato pubbe pana pubbahetukiccaṃ natthīti sotāpattimaggassa upanissayābhāvo āpajjati.
tika-abh02t0:953_10: Yadi hi tassapi pubbahetu upanissayo siyā,
tika-abh02t0:953_11: so ca niyāmakoti sotāpattimagguppattito pubbe eva niyato siyā,
tika-abh02t0:953_13: tasmāssa pubbahetunā ahetukatā āpannāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “iccassa ahetu appaccayā nibbattiṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:954_1: teneva sattakkhattuparamādiniyame sati sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattanakassa dukkhassa mūlabhūtā kilesā
tika-abh02t0:954_2: teneva khīṇāti upari tayo maggā akiccakā hontīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:954_3: Yadi upari tayo maggā sattakkhattuparamādikaṃ niyamenti,
tika-abh02t0:954_4: tato ca añño sotāpanno natthīti sotāpattimaggassa akiccakatā nippayojanatā āpajjatīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:954_7: Sā cuparimaggehi eva hotīti sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattito tena vinā vuṭṭhāne sakkāyadiṭṭhādippahānena
tika-abh02t0:954_8: ca tena vinā bhavitabbanti āha “paṭhamamaggena ca anuppajjitvāva kilesā khepetabbā hontī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:954_9: Na añño koci niyametīti nāmakaraṇanimittato vipassanāto añño koci niyāmako nāma natthīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:954_10: Vipassanāva niyametīti ca nāmakaraṇanimittataṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:955_0: Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi,
tika-abh02t0:955_1: sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādiṃ imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā “kiṃ panāvuso sāriputta,
tika-abh02t0:955_2: atthetarahi aññe samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭhāhaṃ, bhante,
tika-abh02t0:955_3: noti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso,
tika-abh02t0:955_4: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakkhettabhūtaṃ
tika-abh02t0:955_5: imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:956_1: tāya antarahitāya nidānuddesasaṅkhāte pātimokkhe pabbajjūpasampadākammesu ca sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:956_2: Pātimokkhe vā antogadhā pabbajjā upasampadā ca tadubhayābhāve pātimokkhābhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:956_5: Osakkitaṃ nāmāti pacchimapaṭivedhasīlabhedadvayaṃ ekato katvā tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:958_1: Vivādabhāvatoti vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve na uppajjantīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:959_2: yena dutiyabuddhaguṇe dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:959_3: Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi dhammānaṃ sabhāvaviseso na sakkā dhāretunti.
tika-abh02t0:959_9: Sakiṃ bhuttovāti ekampi ālopaṃ ajjhoharitvāva mareyyāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:960_2: Puna thero “ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ abhimatañca lokena attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:960_3: Evaṃ dhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅginaṃ dhārento abhimato ca viññūhi gambhīrāppameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā
tika-abh02t0:960_4: atibhārabhūto pathavīcalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotī”ti dassento “idha, mahārāja,
tika-abh02t0:961_1: Kāraṇamahantattāti mahantehi pāramitākāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:961_2: Pathavīādayo mahantā attano attano visaye ekekāva,
tika-abh02t0:961_3: evaṃ sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye eko eva.
tika-abh02t0:961_6: evaṃ ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā eko eva hotīti vadanto lokadhātvantaresupi dutiyassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:962_0: Pubbabhāge āyūhanavasena āyūhanasamaṅgitā sanniṭṭhānacetanāvasena cetanāsamaṅgitā ca veditabbā,
tika-abh02t0:965_1: Gatito aññā gatisampatti nāma natthīti dassento “sampannā gatī”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:966_0: Ekantaṃ kusalasseva okāsoti idaṃ yadipi koci kāyasucaritādipayogasampattiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ bādheyya,
tika-abh02t0:966_1: taṃ pana bādhanaṃ bādhakasseva issādinimittena viparītaggāhena jātaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:966_4: Makkaṭo bhattapuṭaṃ bandhaṭṭhāne muñcitvā bhuñjituṃ na jānāti,
tika-abh02t0:966_5: yattha vā tattha vā bhinditvā vināseti,
tika-abh02t0:966_7: Susāne chaḍḍetvātiādinā ghātetvā chaḍḍitassa vuṭṭhānābhāvo viya apāyato vuṭṭhānābhāvoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:967_2: Udake maraṇaṃ thale maraṇañca ekamevāti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:967_5: jīvitassa lahuparivattitaṃ pakāsentehi therehi evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:967_7: Atha vā udaketi nāgadīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:968_0: Thero na detīti kathamahaṃ etena ñāto,
tika-abh02t0:968_1: kenaci kiñci ācikkhitaṃ siyāti saññāya na adāsi.
tika-abh02t0:968_8: mayaṃ pana mahallakattā kiṃ rakkhitvā karissāma,
tika-abh02t0:968_9: mahallakattā eva ca rakkhituṃ na sakkhissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:968_10: Anāgāmittā vā thero attanā vattabbaṃ jānitvā ovadati.
tika-abh02t0:969_0: Sammāpayogassa gatamaggoti sammāpayogena nipphāditattā tassa sañjānanakāraṇanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:970_1: Manussāti bhaṇḍāgārikādiniyuttā manussā mahantattā sampaṭicchituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
tika-abh02t0:974_2: ekekasmiṃ dvāre cattāro cattāro gūthanirayādayoti evaṃ soḷasa ussadaniraye vaṇṇayanti.
tika-abh02t0:978_0: 812. Kappoti dvedhābhūtaggo. Ettha ca bījādidhātunānattavasena khandhādidhātunānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:981_5: yaṃ dussīlādayo dussīlādikeheva saṃsandantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:981_7: Āvuso ime manussā “yathāsabhāgena paribhuñjathā”ti vadantā amhe sabhāgāsabhāge viditvā hīnajjhāsayapaṇītajjhāsayataṃ
tika-abh02t0:981_8: paricchinditvā dhātusaṃyuttakamme upanenti tassa payogaṃ daṭṭhukāmāti attho,
tika-abh02t0:981_9: evaṃ sabhāgavaseneva ajjhāsayadhātuparicchindanato ajjhāsayadhātusabhāgavasena niyametīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:984_1: Apparajaṃ akkhaṃ etesanti apparajakkhāti attho vibhāvito,
tika-abh02t0:984_2: apparajaṃ akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhātipi saddattho sambhavati.
tika-abh02t0:984_3: Ettha ca āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti,
tika-abh02t0:985_5: bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno panuṇṇapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano
tika-abh02t0:985_6: anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño”ti evaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:985_8: parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanañca maggakiccāneva,
tika-abh02t0:986_2: Āciṇṇasamāciṇṇāti etena samantato veṭhetvā viya ṭhitabhāvena anusayitataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:987_2: itare mudindriyā”ti evaṃ indriyavisesadassanatthameva adhimuttiggahaṇanti āha “tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanattha”nti.
tika-abh02t0:990_2: Yasmiṃ bhavaṅge pavattamāne taṃsantatiyaṃ lokuttaraṃ nibbattati,
tika-abh02t0:993_1: Niddāyitvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto niddaṃ okkamitvā paṭibuddho samāpattiṃ samāpannomhīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:994_4: Tadeva paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:994_6: tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti imāya vuṭṭhānapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ “pāḷimuttakavuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:994_7: Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāna”nti pāḷi natthīti vadeyyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:994_8: te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-abh02t0:997_9: Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:997_10: tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:997_11: Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “tañhi jhānaṃ
tika-abh02t0:997_12: hutvā appetuṃ iddhi hutvā vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:997_13: na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1002_6: te eva “iti atītāni chattiṃsā”tiādinā tayo chattiṃsakā katāti āha “cha aṭṭhārasakā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1002_7: dvāsaṭṭhi pana diṭṭhigatāni aññattha vuttabhāveneva idha nikkhittānīti na gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-abh02t0:1005_1: Atthi paṭiccaṃ nāmāti yathā “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādīsu nissayādipaccayabhāvena paṭiccāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1005_2: na tathā idha khattiyādijātīnaṃ paramatthato avijjamānānaṃ nissayādipaccayattassa abhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1005_3: Yesu pana khandhesu santesu khattiyādisammuti hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1007_0: 845. Vatthunā vināpi vattabbatāya avatthukaṃ, na vatthuno abhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1008_5: Pamādasaṅkhātassa atthassa kāyaduccarite cittassa vossaggo pāṇātipāte micchādiṭṭhiyaṃ kodhe upanāheti evamādiko pariyāyo apariyanto,
tika-abh02t0:1008_6: tadatthatappariyāyappakāsako vossagganissaggādiko byañjanapariyāyo cāti sabbaṃ taṃ saṅkhipitvā evarūpoti
tika-abh02t0:1008_7: idaṃ ākāranidassanaṃ sabbapariyāyassa vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā katanti dassento āha “pariyantābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1008_8: Vissaṭṭhākāroti satiyā paccanīkabhūte cattāro khandhe dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1010_2: tvaṃ āpannosī”tiādinā tena vuttaṃ tasseva upari khipanavasena “paṭippharitvā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:1010_4: akusale vā idaṃ karonte ahaṃ kasmā na karomī”ti evaṃ idha paṭippharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1011_6: Yathāladdhaṃ vā atikkamitvā atra atra icchanaṃ atricchatā,
tika-abh02t0:1012_7: naṃ jīrati candakinnariṃ patthayitvā asitābhūdeviyā vihīno viya.
tika-abh02t0:1015_0: 850. Jānantasseva bhiyyo bhiyyo codento viya sambhāvetukāmo hoti. Paccayeti upādānādipaccaye.
tika-abh02t0:1017_1: lābhinā eva pana sakkā ñātunti attano samāpattilābhitaṃ sūcetīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1018_2: Tañhi kusalassa vijjhanato samāsevitatāya sīse parikkhataṃ sunikhataṃ visāṇaṃ viya,
tika-abh02t0:1019_3: Khīyananti ca yena lobhena paraṃ mamanti vadantaṃ khīyati, so vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1019_5: Tintiṇanti vā loluppamicceva vuttaṃ hoti. Saññā-
tika-abh02t0:1020_2: Athavātiādinā cīvaramaṇḍanādīnaṃ visesanāni “imassa vā pūtikāyassa bāhirānaṃ vā parikkhārānaṃ maṇḍanā”tiādīnīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1020_6: Ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ chavirāgasusaṇṭhānādikaraṇañca cīvarādīsu kāye ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1020_7: Tadahujātadārako viya hotīti dārakacāpalyaṃ na muñcatīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1022_0: 856. Paritassitāti saṅkampanā, ukkaṇṭhitassa vā tassa tassa taṇhāyanā.
tika-abh02t0:1026_2: Sabbattha kilesavasenāti thinamiddhakāraṇānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1027_2: So ājīvupaddavena upaddutoti katvā āha “upaddutassāti attho”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1028_0: Tividhampi taṃ tattha āgataṃ tassa nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā dassetunti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1029_4: Pūtimuttanti purāṇassa apurāṇassa ca sabbassa gomuttassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1030_5: Mukhasambhāvitoti korajikakorajikādibhāvena pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena aññehi sambhāvito.
tika-abh02t0:1030_6: So evarūpo evarūpatāya eva attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā “ayaṃ samaṇo”tiādiṃ katheti.
tika-abh02t0:1031_2: Āpāthakajjhāyīti manussānaṃ āpāthaṭṭhāne samādhiṃ samāpanno viya nisīdanto āpāthake janassa pākaṭaṭṭhāne jhāyī.
tika-abh02t0:1032_0: Aññaṃ viya katvā attano samīpe bhaṇanaṃ sāmantajappitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1032_4: kuhassa vā puggalassa ayanā gatikiriyā kuhāyanā.
tika-abh02t0:1033_0: 862. Puṭṭhassāti “ko tisso, ko rājapūjito”ti puṭṭhassa. Nahanāti bandhanā pariveṭhanā.
tika-abh02t0:1036_1: Nikattuṃ appena lābhena bahukaṃ vañcetvā gahetuṃ icchanaṃ nijigīsanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1037_1: Vaṇṇasampannaṃ pokkharaṃ vaṇṇapokkharanti uttarapadalopo pubbapadassa daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh02t0:1038_0: 867. Seyyasadisamānā unnativasena pavattāti ubhayatthāpi “mānaṃ jappetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1039_1: Hīnamāno pana onativasena pavattito kevalena mānasaddena niddesaṃ nārahatīti taṃniddese “omānaṃ jappetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1041_1: Puggalaṃ anāmasitvāti yathā seyyassa seyyamānādiniddesesu “parehi seyyaṃ attānaṃ dahatī”ti seyyādipuggalo mānuppādako āmaṭṭho,
tika-abh02t0:1041_2: evametassa seyyamānabhāvepi mānuppādakapuggalavisesaṃ anāmasitvā “pare atimaññati”cceva vuttanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1041_3: Pare atikkamitvā maññanañhi yassa kassaci atimānoti.
tika-abh02t0:1043_0: 881. Pakkhijātīsu vāyaso anto lāmakoti katvā “kākajāti viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1044_2: tasmā āditova “tumhe akhīṇāsavā”ti avatvā upāyena kathesīti vadanti,
tika-abh02t0:1044_3: dosacaritattā vā khippaṃ tatiyapadavāre virāgaṃ uppādesīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1045_0: 883. Mānaṃ anugatacchandoti mānasampayuttachando, mānasabhāvaṃ anugato mānacchando vā.
tika-abh02t0:1047_0: 887. Amaravādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, attano amaraṇatthāya devabhāvatthāya vā vitakko amaravitakko.
tika-abh02t0:1048_1: Paresu anuddayā rāgavasena anuddayakaraṇaṃ etassāti parānuddayo,
tika-abh02t0:1048_3: paresu vā anuddayasseva sahananditādikassa bhāvo parānuddayatā,
tika-abh02t0:1048_5: Tatthāti parānuddayatāya saṃsaṭṭhavihārena dassitāyāti attho yujjati.
tika-abh02t0:1049_1: Anavaññattiṃ patthento anavaññattatthameva kāmaguṇe ca patthetīti āha “pañcakāma…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1052_3: mariyādavācakassa vā ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā “aṭṭhapanā”ti vuttanti “anantaraṭṭhapanā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1052_5: taṃ anatikkamitvā tasseva daḷhīkaraṇavasena ṭhapanā mariyādaṭṭhapanā.
tika-abh02t0:1053_8: Dhuraṃ na detīti pāmokkhaṃ na deti.
tika-abh02t0:1054_1: Kāyena cetiyaṅgaṇādivattaṃ karoti “evaṃ vattasampanno saddho kathaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni karissatī”ti paresaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1055_0: Na sammā bhāsitāti yo na sammā bhāsati,
tika-abh02t0:1055_2: Kucchi vā piṭṭhi vā jānituṃ na sakkāti asantaguṇasambhāvaneneva cittānurūpakiriyāvirahato “evaṃcitto evaṃkiriyo”ti jānituṃ na sakkāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1056_2: Yathā so yakkho tādisaṃ rūpaṃ dassetvā “ajā”ti saññāya āgatāgate khādati,
tika-abh02t0:1056_4: Tenetaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ māyāto balavatarā vañcanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1057_2: taṃ bahiddhā saṃyojanato bahiddhāsaṃyojanassa puggalassa visesanabhūtaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh02t0:1060_1: Akusalamūlāneva vaṭṭamūlānīti tehi kathitehi vaṭṭamūlasamudācāro kathito hotīti āha “tīhi…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1061_1: Sassato lokotiādidassanameva brahmacariyaṃ mokkhasampāpakaṃ uttamacariyanti diṭṭhigatikehi sammatanti āha “diṭṭhigatikasammatassā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1062_1: Kathaṃvidhanti kenākārena saṇṭhitanti atthoti katvā āha “ākārasaṇṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1063_0: 921. Cetaso utrāso domanassaṃ, doso vā, taṃsampayuttā vā cetanādayo.
tika-abh02t0:1064_1: Desanāsukhatāyāti tiṇṇaṃ addhānaṃ vasena vicikicchāya desanā sukhā “kaṅkhati vicikicchatī”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1064_3: Vaṇṇādibhedaṃ sutvāti keci kira vadanti “khattiyajīvo paṇḍuvaṇṇo. Kasmā?
tika-abh02t0:1064_7: Te hi majjhanhasāyanharattīsu odātapītakāḷachāyā kāḷatamakālesu ramantī”ti tesaṃ vaṇṇabhedaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1065_1: Purisapuggaloti padadvayaṃ ekapadaṃ katvā jānantānaṃ vasenāyaṃ sammutikathā pavattā,
tika-abh02t0:1065_2: padantarameva vā idaṃ puggalavācakanti dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1065_3: Atha vā purisoti vutto ca puggalo eva,
tika-abh02t0:1065_6: Pubbe katanti purāṇatarakammaṃ icchantīti upapajjavedanīyañca kira paṭikkhipanti.
tika-abh02t0:1065_7: Āṇattimūlakena vāti yopi āṇāpetvā vadhabandhādidukkhaṃ uppādeti,
tika-abh02t0:1066_2: sabhāvatopi pana asampaṭivedho sampaṭivedhasukhassa paccanīkabhūto dukkho evāti anudahanatā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1066_3: Evañca katvā “upekkhā vedanā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1070_3: Ettha cāyaṃ āvajjanā akusalānaṃ āsannakāraṇattā khuddakavatthūsu vuttāti veditabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1073_3: Bhavābhavahetūtipīti ettha bhavanti jāyanti etenāti bhavo,
tika-abh02t0:1073_6: Bhāvanārāmatāariyavaṃsappaheyyattā vā purimataṇhāttayavajjā sabbā taṇhā “bhavābhavahetu uppajjatī”ti vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1074_2: taṃ taṃ kiriyaṃ na karontīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1076_4: Mā hevaṃ timbarukāti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nidānavagge āgatattā “timbarukadiṭṭhī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1079_0: 940. Āgantuṃ pana na dentīti āgamanassa paccayā na hontīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1080_2: Gimhakāle bhuñjitvā sayantassa sukhaṃ hotīti taṃ utusukhaṃ “seyyasukha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1080_7: Sīlaggahaṇena khandhakavattamethunaviratīnaṃ gahitattā tapabrahmacariyaggahaṇaṃ na kattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-abh02t0:1080_11: tāni ca te devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya carantīti.
tika-abh02t0:1080_12: Aññathā ca saddhāruciādīhi “yato kho bho ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”tiādinā vikappetvā.
tika-abh02t0:1081_1: Byasanesu ñātibhogarogabyasanaggahaṇena taṃnimittā sokādayo gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1081_3: Ettha ca ādīnavehi pañcahi tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtā akkhantiyeva bhinditvā kathitāti veditabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1082_1: “Ājīvikābhaya”nti pana pāṭhe paccayānuppattiṃ passato ājīvikanimitto cittutrāsoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1083_0: 943. Uppilāvitanti udaggatāsaṅkhāto avūpasamabhāvo, avūpasamahetubhūto vā pītiyā ākāro.
tika-abh02t0:1086_1: “Kodhano hoti upanāhī”tiādinā kodhādihetukā upanāhādayo kodhādīnaṃ sahāyakāraṇabhāvena suttante vuttāti kodhādayo eva vivādamūlāni,
tika-abh02t0:1089_1: Somanassena saddhiṃ upavicarantīti somanassupavicārāti akusalasomanassasahagatā rūpavicārādayo idhādhippetāti veditabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1089_3: Taṃsampayutto vāti etena vicāraggahaṇena vitakkopi gahitoti vitakkappavattanena “upavitakketī”ti idampi vuttaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1090_2: lobhasampayuttupekkhāpi pana gehassitā na na hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1091_1: Adhiccasamuppanniko “adhicca samuppanno attā uppanno bhavissatī”ti gaṇhanto sassatadiṭṭhiko hotīti evarūpassa
tika-abh02t0:1091_3: Na so jātoti ettha “jātū”ti ayaṃ nipāto u-
tika-abh02t0:1091_6: tena vā samānatthaṃ nipātantaraṃ etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1094_1: Dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīsu sattakassa aññassa abhāvā satta ucchedavādā eva idha tathā avatvā “satta diṭṭhī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1097_1: “Kammaṃ kho me kattabbaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā osīdanākārena pavattacittuppādā kosajjakāraṇāni,
tika-abh02t0:1097_6: saddassa atthaṃ vadatīti adhippāyena “tintamāso viyā”ti ayamattho vibhāvito,
tika-abh02t0:1098_4: tena tvaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutto “hiyyo mayā kāle bhuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1098_5: tenāhaṃ anāpanno”tiādinā aññena ayuttena kāraṇena aññaṃ yuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicchādetīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1098_6: Pucchitatthato bahiddhā yathā taṃ na allīyati,
tika-abh02t0:1098_7: tathā kathāya apanayanaṃ vikkhipanaṃ bahiddhā apanāmanā.
tika-abh02t0:1099_2: Yehi vā abhinivesehi asaññī attānaṃ vadanti,
tika-abh02t0:1109_0: Idha vinicchayoti vuttoti imissā vibhaṅgapāḷiyā yo chandarāgassa paccayasabhāvena vinicchaya-
tika-abh02t0:1109_3: saddena so eva āgatoti evaṃ vitakkassa vinicchayabhāvaṃ tasseva idha gahitatañca dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1109_4: Balavasanniṭṭhānanti balavatiyā taṇhāya ārammaṇassa niṭṭhapetvā gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1110_1: Satipi aññesañca saṅkhatabhāve ahanti asmīti ca sātisayā mānassa saṅkhatatāti katvā “saṅkhata”nti māno vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1110_3: Ettha “bhavissantī”tiādikā pavatti taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ visesavatīti tāsampi iñjitādibhāvo vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1113_2: tassā micchābhāvapaṭicchādanabhāvena pavatto tadākāro moho upāyacintāvasena uppannoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1113_3: Yathākate pana pāpe anādīnavadassanavasena pavattā saññā,
tika-abh02t0:1113_9: “Vimuttomhī”ti evaṃ pavatto akusalacittuppādo micchāvimuttīti keci vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:1113_10: Phalaṃ viya vimuttanti gahite pana diṭṭhisampayuttacitte diṭṭhi micchāñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1116_2: “Itthaṃ evaṃ aññathā”ti pana visesaṃ akatvā gahaṇaṃ samūhagāhoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1116_8: Patthanākappanavasenāti “api nāma sādhu panāhaṃ siya”nti evaṃ patthanāya kappanavasena.
tika-abh02t0:1117_0: Suddhasīsāti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṃ sādhāraṇasīsā visesassa anissitattā “suddhasīsā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1117_4: Diṭṭhimānesupi “taṇhāvicaritānī”ti vacanañca aññamaññaṃ vippayogīnaṃ diṭṭhimānānaṃ taṇhāya avippayogīnaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1118_1: Avakkarīti nipāto nānābhāve vattatīti anānākaraṇaṃ anavakkari,
tika-abh02t0:1118_3: avakkari vā akatvā anavakkari katvāti evaṃ dassento āha “avinibbhogaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1118_5: tattha avakiraṇaṃ vikkhepanaṃ samūhassa ekadesānaṃ vinibbhujjanaṃ avakāri,
tika-abh02t0:1118_7: pañcapi khandhe samūhato ekatteneva gahetvā attato avinibbhujjitvā asmīti chandamānadiṭṭhiyo paṭilabhatīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1118_8: Asitabyābhaṅgitāyāti dāttena kājena cāti etena parikkhārena,
tika-abh02t0:1119_1: Avakāriṃ karitvāti rūpādīni attato vinibbhujjitvā iminā rūpena…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1119_2: iminā viññāṇena asmīti chandaṃ paṭilabhatīti evaṃ sabbattha imināti etassa attato avinibbhuttena rūpādināti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1119_3: Attato hi avinibbhuttāni abahikatāni ahamicceva gahitāni rūpādīni upādāya upagantvā pavattā taṇhā “ajjhattikassa upādāyā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1119_4: attato ca vinibbhuttāni bahikatāni upagantvā pavattā “bāhirassa upādāyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1119_5: Khaggena vā chattena vā ahaṃ niccoti abhimaṅgalasammatena khaggādinā mama vināso natthīti maññatīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1119_6: Ekekassāti idaṃ anādimhi anante ca saṃsāre ekekassa atītānāgatesu chattiṃsāyapi sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1119_7: ekekassa vā puggalassa yathālābhavasenāti idampi anissitataṇhāmānadiṭṭhiṃ katvā puthujjanassa addhāpaccuppanne kassaci sambhavadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1124_3: niravasesato saṅgahitattā dutiyavārādīnañca ettha anuppavesato sabbasāmaññena vutto paṭhamo sabbasaṅgāhikavāro nāma,
tika-abh02t0:1124_5: Tattha pana “kāmadhātuyā kati khandhā kati āyatanānī”tiādinā tesaṃ atthitā eva vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1124_6: kiriyāvisesassa appayogo “atthi bhavati saṃvijjatī”ti sāmaññakiriyāya viññeyyabhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1124_8: catuttho ca upapattikkhaṇe uppattānuppattidassanavāroti tattha pātubhāvāpātubhāvavacanato.
tika-abh02t0:1125_1: Yathāpucchanti pucchānurūpaṃ avitathabyākaraṇaṃ parehi katampi sabbaññuvacanaṃ viññāya katattā sabbaññubyākaraṇameva nāma hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1125_2: ko pana vādo sabbaññunā eva kateti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1127_2: Ghānāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvenāti ettha yadi tadabhāvena gandhāyatanādīni āyatanādikiccaṃ na karonti,
tika-abh02t0:1127_3: asaññasattesu cakkhāyatanassa abhāvena rūpāyatanaṃ āyatanādikiccaṃ na kareyya.
tika-abh02t0:1127_4: Tato “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dvāyatanāni pātubhavantī”tiādivacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1127_8: tesaṃ sattānaṃ uppatti etthāti sattuppattīti vuccamānā te sattanikāyā ca,
tika-abh02t0:1127_9: na panettha apariyāpannokāso apariyāpannasattanikāyo ca atthi,
tika-abh02t0:1127_10: yo “dhātū”ti vucceyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento “okāsavasena vā sattuppattivasena vā apariyāpannadhātu nāma natthī”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1127_11: Sattuppattivasenāti iminā vā okāsasattalokadvayaṃ saha gahetvā tādisāya apariyāpannadhātuyā abhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh02t0:1127_13: sattāvāsavasena taṃtaṃbhavavasena uppajjamānā upādinnakakkhandhā taṃtaṃpariyāpannānaṃ sadisādhiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh02t0:1127_14: dhātūti vuccantīti evaṃ apariyāpannadhātu natthīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1129_1: Bhavavasena okāsavasena ca paricchinnāti tattha aññattha ca uppajjamānā upādinnakakkhandhā taṃtaṃpariyāpannā sabbe daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1132_1: Khandhādīnaṃ dhātusambhavādivasena pabhedaṃ vatvā ye sattā dhātuppabhedavanto,
tika-abh02t0:1132_4: tesaṃ vasena pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo devā”tiādiko chaṭṭhavāro āraddho.
tika-abh02t0:1132_5: Khandhādayo eva hi dhātuttayabhūtadevavasena dānādikammavasena taṃtaṃāyuppamāṇaparicchinnaupādinnakakkhandhavasena ca bhinnāti.
tika-abh02t0:1137_2: Tattha pana sobhanapabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe ā-
tika-abh02t0:1138_1: Ārammaṇamanasikārā pubbabhāgena kathitāti jhānakkhaṇe tato pacchā vā parittādikasiṇārammaṇabhāvanāya
tika-abh02t0:1138_2: āvajjanena ca jhānassa ārammaṇamanasikāranānattatā na hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1138_3: pubbabhāgabhāvanāya pana pubbabhāgāvajjanena ca hotīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1138_4: Pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena hi jhānaṃ parittapathavīkasiṇādīsu taṃtadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1138_12: “Appanāyapi vaṭṭantī”ti etassa appanāya pavattāya tato pacchāpi vaṭṭantīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1138_13: Saññāvirāgādīhi pana visesiyamānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tathā tathā tattha pavatto manasikāro ca bhavavisesaniyāmako
tika-abh02t0:1139_0: Vipulā phalāti vipulasantasukhāyuvaṇṇādiphalā. Suṭṭhu passanti paññācakkhunā maṃsadibbacakkhūhi ca.
tika-abh02t0:1140_1: “Yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantī hotī”ti vacanato “kammameva pamāṇa”nti āha,
tika-abh02t0:1141_0: Nilīyanokāsassa abhāvāti samānajātikena accharāgaṇena sabbadā parivāriyamānassa kāmaguṇākiṇṇassa tabbirahitaṭṭhānassa abhāvāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1142_0: Kiṃ niyametīti kiṃ jhānaṃ upapattiṃ niyametīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1142_3: Seṭṭhabhavā nāmāti tato paraṃ agamanato uttamabhavāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1142_5: Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti vehapphalādiṭṭhānāni eva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1142_6: Vehapphalato pana purimesu navasu nibbattaanāgāmī arūpadhātuṃ upapajjatīti katvā “rūpadhātuyā cutassa
tika-abh02t0:1142_7: arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassa kassaci satta anusayā anusenti,
tika-abh02t0:1142_10: na vehapphalādīsu upapannaṃ sandhāyāti ayamettha adhippāyo siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1142_11: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “navasu brahmalokesu nibbattaariyasāvakānaṃ tatrūpapattiyeva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1142_14: na tesveva uparūpari vehapphale ca upapatti arūpadhātūpapatti ca.
tika-abh02t0:1142_15: “Paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbatto anāgāmī nava brahmaloke sodhetvā matthake ṭhito parinibbātī”ti idampi
tika-abh02t0:1142_16: anupubbena ārohantaṃ sandhāya vuttanti na tena tassa matthakaṃ appattassa arūpadhātuṃ upapatti nivāritāti
tika-abh02t0:1143_0: Yo vā aññattha tattha vā maggaṃ bhāvetvā cavitvā tattha upapanno avikkhambhitarūparāgo ariyasāvako,
tika-abh02t0:1143_4: “imesu tīsu ṭhānesu nibbattaanāgāmino”ti ca sabbattha nibbattaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1143_6: tasmiṃ rūparāge vikkhambhite puna bhavābhilāso na bhavissatīti arūparāgupacchedo ca bhavissatiyeva.
tika-abh02t0:1143_7: Yo pana puthujjano tattha nibbatto ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetvā arūpehi vikkhambhitarūparāgo uppanne magge nibbattabhavādīnavadassanavasena
tika-abh02t0:1143_9: tassa vasena yamakapāḷi pavattāti vā ayamattho adhippeto siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1146_2: phusanalakkhaṇo phasso”tiādinā sāmaññavisesalakkhaṇapariggāhikā salakkhaṇapariggāhikā diṭṭhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyo ñātapariññā,
tika-abh02t0:1147_0: Tattha tatthāti khandhādīnaṃ tāva khandhavibhaṅgādīsu pañhapucchakavāre vattabbaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1147_1: hetuādīnañca khandhādīsu antogadhattā tattha tattha pañhapucchakavāre vattabbaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1157_0: Catusaccantogadhattā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ gāthāyaṃ “catusaccadaso”ti nippadesato saccāni gahitānīti
tika-abh02t0:1157_4: “Samāhaṭānī”ti ca etena samāhāre ayaṃ samāsoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1157_6: Pattādipakkhepena hissa na itthiliṅgatā yathā pañcapattaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1157_11: Kasmā panettha anantāparimāṇesu anaññasādhāraṇesu mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādīsu buddhaguṇesu saṃvijjamānesu sāvakehi,
tika-abh02t0:1157_12: paccekabuddhehi ca sādhāraṇena catusaccadassanena bhagavantaṃ thometīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “satipi sāvakāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1157_14: “tattha cā”tiādinā paccekabuddhehi ca bhagavato catusaccadassanassa asādhāraṇataṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1157_16: Parasantānesu pasāritabhāvena supākaṭattāti desanānubhāvena veneyyasantānesu catusaccadassanassa vitthāritabhāvena yāva devamanussesu suppakāsitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1157_17: Nāthasaddaṃ loke yācanupatāpissariyāsīsāsu paṭhantīti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “nāthatīti nātho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1157_18: Tattha yasmā bhagavā catusaccadassanabhāveneva attano hitasukhāsīsāya kilesabyasanupatāpanassa,
tika-abh02t0:1157_20: tasmā taṃ teneva pakāsitanti atthuddhāraṃ anāmasitvā paduddhāravasena nāthasaddassa atthaṃ dassento “veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsatī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1157_21: “Catusaccadaso”ti vā iminā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato ñāṇānubhāvo pakāsitoti “nātho”ti iminā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1157_23: Paramena cittissariyena samannāgato bhagavā nāthoti vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1157_24: Tathā paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte guṇehi īsatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1157_26: Guṇehi īsatīti paramukkaṃsagatehi attano sīlādiguṇehi dhammena issariyaṃ vattetīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1158_4: Saccābhisambodhena hi abhinīhārānurūpaṃ rūpārūpadhammesu chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhappavattena sātisayaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1158_7: phassādibhedena ca dhamme vibhajanto cittuppādakaṇḍādivasena dhammasaṅgahaṃ catudhā desetuṃ samattho ahosi.
tika-abh02t0:1158_8: Tathā atītaṃse appaṭihatañāṇatādibuddhadhammasamannāgato bhagavā atītādibhedato khandhādike vibhajitvā desetuṃ samattho ahosi.
tika-abh02t0:1158_11: “Sabbaññubhāsitattā”ti vatvā puna “asabbaññunā desetuṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ dassento”ti etena dhammasaṅgaṇīvibhaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1159_0: Nanu ca “catusaccadaso”tiādinā bhagavatova guṇā vibhāvitāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1159_1: teneva dhammasaṅghānampi guṇā vibhāvitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1159_3: tadādhāro ca saṅgho vuttova hotīti vuttaṃ “buddhādīnaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1160_5: Taṃ yasmā bhagavato saha vāsanāya pahīnaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1160_6: tasmāssa atītaṃse sabbatthakameva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānena ñāṇaṃ appaṭihatanti vuccati.
tika-abh02t0:1160_10: Tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ bhagavato tīṇi ñāṇānevāti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:1160_11: Ekaṃyeva hutvā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ nāma sabbaññutaññāṇameva.
tika-abh02t0:1160_12: Sabbaṃ kāyakammanti yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā kattabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1160_15: sabbaṃ kāyapayogaṃ pavattento bhagavā ñāṇena paricchinditvā ñāṇasahitameva pavattetīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1160_20: Aparikkhayāparimeyyapaṭibhānatāya hi bhagavato karaṇasampattiyā ca dhammadesanā nirantaraṃ pavattiyamānāpi na kadācipi parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
tika-abh02t0:1160_24: Ettha ca samādhiādīnaṃ ahāni taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhassa savāsanapahīnattā anaññasādhāraṇatāya veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1161_1: Te eva dhammeti te eva kusalādike tikadukehi saṅgahite dhamme.
tika-abh02t0:1161_2: Suttante khandhādivasena vutte khandhādivasena vibhajitunti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1161_3: Nanu suttante paṭisambhidāvasena te na vuttāti?
tika-abh02t0:1161_6: jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā pana hetuhetuphalādīsu ñāṇavibhāgassa vuttattā atthato vuttā eva honti,
tika-abh02t0:1161_7: paṭisambhidāmagge vā paṭisambhidānaṃ āgatattā suttante paṭisambhidāvasenapi te dhammā vuttā eva.
tika-abh02t0:1161_11: na paṭiniddesādināti saṅkhepena te tattha vuttāti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1161_13: Tatthāpi hi “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontī”tiādinā khandhādayo saṅkhepena vuttāti.
tika-abh02t0:1161_20: iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya ādisaddassa atthadīpakena.
tika-abh02t0:1161_34: Atthi me tumhesu anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1161_42: sabbadhammasaṅgāhakehi ca āyatanādīhi khandhehi ca appakatarapadattā saccavibhaṅgo ādimhi vattabboti? Na,
tika-abh02t0:1161_43: tatthāpi dukkhasaccavibhaṅge ekadesena khandhānaṃ eva vibhajitabbato.
tika-abh02t0:1161_47: Idha pana anavasesatova khandhā vibhajīyantīti nibbānavajjānaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1162_0: Apica rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti tividhā bodhaneyyapuggalā,
tika-abh02t0:1162_11: mudindriyānaṃ dhātudesanāti iminā payojanena anukkamena ca khandhāyatanadhātuvibhaṅgānaṃ desanākkamova veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1162_12: Taṃ panetaṃ khandhādittayaṃ pavattinivattitadubhayahetumukheneva ñāyamānaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhāya hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1162_14: So ca yathābhūtāvabodho visesato indriyasannissayenāti indriyavibhaṅgadesanā.
tika-abh02t0:1162_15: Indriyānañca indaṭṭho taṃtaṃpaccayadhammabhūtānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannesu paccayabhāvavisesenevāti
tika-abh02t0:1162_18: Svāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīsu sammāmanasikāro imāya paṭipattiyā hotīti jhānaappamaññāvibhaṅgadesanā,
tika-abh02t0:1162_19: sā sammāpaṭipatti ettake sīle patiṭṭhitassa sambhavatīti sikkhāpadavibhaṅgadesanā,
tika-abh02t0:1162_20: yathāvuttāya ca sammāpaṭipattiyā ime ānisaṃsāti paṭisambhidāñāṇavibhaṅgadesanā,
tika-abh02t0:1162_21: te cime ñāṇavisesā imesu kilesesu pahīyantesu ca sambhavanti,
tika-abh02t0:1162_23: evaṃ vitthārato desite khandhādike saṅkhepatopi jānantassa atthasiddhi hoti evāti dassanatthaṃ pariyosāne
tika-abh02t0:1162_24: dhammahadayavibhaṅgadesanā pavattāti evametesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvibhaṅgānaṃ desanākkamakāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1163_4: Yato rūpādīnaṃ vedanāsamavarodhanena “cattāro khandhā”tiādinā saṅkhipitvā khandhā 06 desetabbā siyuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1163_5: Ruppanādito aññassābhāvāti ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvato aññassa atītādike gahetvā rāsivasena vattabbassa saṃkhittassa sabhāvassa abhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1163_10: ekampi vā aggahetvā vuccamānā khandhavasena desanā anavasesasaṅkhatadhammasaṅgāhinī na sambhavati.
tika-abh02t0:1164_0: “Saddatthasahitaṃ khandhasaddassa visayaṃ dassetī”ti etena rāsisaddassa viya rāsaṭṭhe khandhasaddassa
tika-abh02t0:1164_11: Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandhotiādīsu guṇaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1164_12: Nanu ca kevalopi khandhasaddo “tiṇṇaṃ kho, māṇava,
tika-abh02t0:1164_15: tīhi khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito”ti ca ādīsu sīlādivācako diṭṭhoti? Na,
tika-abh02t0:1164_17: Na khandhasaddo paññattisaddassa atthe vattatīti niruttivohārādisaddā viya paññattipariyāyo na hotīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1164_18: Dārukkhandhoti paññatti hotīti tassa khandhasaddassa paññattivisesappavattitaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1164_19: Viññāṇakkhandhoti khandhasaddoti “viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho”ti ettha vutto khandhasaddo.
tika-abh02t0:1164_20: Samudāye niruḷhoti atītādibhedabhinnassa paññāya abhisaṃyūhanena rāsikate viññāṇasamūhe niruḷho.
tika-abh02t0:1164_21: Tāya eva ruḷhiyā pavattatīti tāya samudāye niruḷhatāya tadavayave ekasmimpi viññāṇe pavattatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1164_22: Ettha ca ñāṇasampayutte niruḷho kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalabhāvo viya ñāṇavippayutte viññāṇasamudāye
tika-abh02t0:1164_24: Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ tannimittayutte kismiñcideva visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāvasena nimittavirahepi pavatti ruḷhi nāma,
tika-abh02t0:1165_0: Rāsito guṇatoti sabbattha bhummatthe vā nissakkavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1165_4: koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe ca khandhaṭṭhe nibbānassa vasena chaṭṭhenāpi khandhena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1165_6: “Yesaṃ vā atītādivasena bhedo atthī”tiādinā atītādivibhāgabhinnesu ruppanādisabhāvadhammesu visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh02t0:1165_7: koṭṭhāsabhāvena gayhamānesu tabbibhāgarahitassa ekassa nibbānassa rāsaṭṭhatā viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhatāpi na
tika-abh02t0:1165_9: Etena paññattiyāpi khandhesu aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1166_0: Kasmā panettha phassādike viya saṅkhārakkhandhe anavarodhetvā vedanāsaññā visuṃ khandhabhāvena gahitāti?
tika-abh02t0:1166_5: kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇaṃ kāmānameva hetu mātāpi puttena vivadati,
tika-abh02t0:1166_15: Vedanānugiddhassa hi vedanāpaccayā taṇhā siddhā hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1166_16: tato ca taṇhāpaccayā upādānanti āvaṭṭati bhavacakkaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1166_17: Vipallatthasaññissa ca “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti vacanato diṭṭhimānataṇhāpapañcānaṃ anupacchedato saṃsārassa anupacchedova.
tika-abh02t0:1166_18: Iti vivādakāraṇānaṃ kāmajjhosānadiṭṭhābhinivesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo saṃsārahetubhāvoti imassa vivādamūlatādivisesassa
tika-abh02t0:1166_19: dassanatthaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe anavarodhetvā vedanāsaññā visuṃ khandhabhāvena gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1167_0: Okāsesūti vibhajanakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato atītādayo okāsāti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1167_3: Sabboti sakalo ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto vibhajananayo.
tika-abh02t0:1167_9: kabaḷīkāro āhāro rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbāti evaṃ pavattaṃ vibhajanañca.
tika-abh02t0:1167_11: Ekādasasu okāsesu yaṃ yattha vibhajanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1167_13: Evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīsupīti yathā rūpakkhandhe yathāsambhavaṃ ekādasasu okāsesu vibhajanaṃ yojetabbanti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1167_14: evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ ekādasasu okāsesu vibhajanaṃ yojetabbanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1168_0: Tattha vedanākkhandho tāva purime okāsapañcake sukhādivedanāttikavasena vibhatto,
tika-abh02t0:1168_3: itarasmiṃ oḷārikaduke paṭighasamphassadukavasena ceva yathāvuttakusalattikādivasena ca vibhatto.
tika-abh02t0:1168_7: Cetanāya eva cettha niddeso saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ cetanāppadhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1171_1: “Kiñcī”ti padaṃ “ekacca”nti iminā samānatthanti āha “kiñcīti pakārantarabhedaṃ āmasitvā aniyamanidassana”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1171_2: Ubhayenāti pakārabhedaṃ anāmasitvā āmasitvā ca aniyamadassanavasena pavattena “yaṃ kiñcī”ti padadvayena.
tika-abh02t0:1172_4: Dutiyavikappe pana vuttanayeneva kāraṇatthe pavattaṃ kiṃ-
tika-abh02t0:1172_5: saddaṃ “vadethā”ti kiriyāpadasambandhanena upayogavasena pariṇāmetvā vadati “taṃ kāraṇaṃ vadethā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1173_3: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppatti atthīti?
tika-abh02t0:1173_11: saddo ujukameva vikārāpattiṃ vadatīti dassento “bhedo cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1173_16: evaṃ sante lakkhaṇassa atippasaṅgo siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “arūpakkhandhāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1173_23: Yathā rūpadhammānaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇe sītādīhi samāgamo hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1173_24: evaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ aññehi samāgamo natthi atilahuparivattito,
tika-abh02t0:1173_25: tasmā arūpadhammā rūpadhammānaṃ viya pākaṭassa vikārassa abhāvato “ruppantī”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1173_27: “Ruppatī”ti padassa kattukammasādhanānaṃ vasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyati
tika-abh02t0:1173_31: Kattubhūto kammabhūto ca atthoti kattukammasādhanānaṃ vasena vuccamāno bhūtupādāyarūpasaṅkhāto attho.
tika-abh02t0:1173_38: Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṃ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā,
tika-abh02t0:1173_40: “Yaṃ pana ruppatī”tiādinā “kuppatī”tiādīnaṃ kattukammatthānampi atthavacanānaṃ vacane kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1173_43: “kenaṭṭhenā”ti panettha abhidheyyapariyāyo adhippetoti āha “kenaṭṭhenāti pucchāsabhāgavasena ruppanaṭṭhenā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1173_47: Ruppanalakkhaṇañca nāmetaṃ aniccatādi viya kakkhaḷattādito aññanti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1174_2: Tathāti tappakāratāya khārabhāve sati udakena kappavuṭṭhānakāle viya pathavī vilīyeyya.
tika-abh02t0:1174_3: Lokantariyasattānaṃ pana pāpakammabalena akhārepi khāre viya sarīrassa vilīyanā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1175_1: Pakaraṇappattaṃ rūpaṃ pakkhipitvā mātikā ṭhapitāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1175_3: āpajjati tappakārabhāvena atītaṃse gaṇanaṃ gatanti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1175_4: “Na hī”tiādinā dhammantaranivattanatthatā pakārantaranivattanatthatā ca bhūtupādāyagahaṇassa natthīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1175_7: “Na cā”tiādinā bhūtupādāyasabhāvo atītaṃsagaṇitatāya taṃsabhāvassapi aññathā gaṇitattā,
tika-abh02t0:1175_8: ataṃsabhāvassa ca tathā gaṇitattā akāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1175_10: labbhatī”ti etena dutiyanaye na kevalaṃ yathāvuttova doso,
tika-abh02t0:1175_13: Na hettha bhūtupādāyarūpabhāvo atītaṃse gaṇanassa kāraṇanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1176_9: Yattakā hi idha visesā niddiṭṭhā cakkhāyatanādayo,
tika-abh02t0:1176_14: Idha pana bhūtupādāyena nidassanabhūtena rūpassa sabbavisesavibhāvanatā dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:1177_8: Abhidhammo pana desetabbadhamme ujunippadesakathananti nippariyāyadesanaṃ nāma,
tika-abh02t0:1177_11: Tathā bhaddekarattasuttādīsu viya atītādibhāvo atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo addhāvasena idhāpi khandhavibhaṅge
tika-abh02t0:1178_7: Evaṃ āhārepīti ettha visabhāgāhārena anantarito anekavāraṃ anekadivasampi bhutto sabhāgekāhāraṃ nāma.
tika-abh02t0:1178_10: “Ekāhārasamuṭṭhāna”nti pana vuttattā ekasseva āhārassa yojanā yuttarūpāti apare.
tika-abh02t0:1178_11: Pañcadvāravasenāti ettha pañcadvārāvajjanato paṭṭhāya yāva tadārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1179_5: Tattha paṭhamena ādisaddena upanissayapaccayassa āhārādino ca dutiyena samanantarānantarūpanissayādino saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1179_13: Hetukiccaṃ nāma tassa tassa uppādetabbassa uppattikaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1179_14: tañca tasmiṃ khaṇe uppannaphalattā tato paraṃ kattabbābhāvato niṭṭhitañcāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1179_15: Itaraṃ pana tīsupi khaṇesu paccayakiccaṃ daṭṭhabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1180_1: Aniṭṭhanāmanivattanassāti aniṭṭhanāmanivattiyā akāraṇabhāvadassanena iṭṭhanāmalābhāpanassa akāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1181_4: Tesaṃyeva hatthiādīnaṃ sukhassa hetubhāvaṃ na gacchanti sāraṇādivasena dukkhapaccayattā.
tika-abh02t0:1181_7: Akusalena attanā katena nibbattaṃ dukkhassa paccayo hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1181_8: Tasmāti yasmā kammaṃ yasmiṃ santāne nibbattaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1181_12: Tattha “aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti yasmā paṭisedhadvayena kusalakammajassa iṭṭhabhāvo niyato,
tika-abh02t0:1181_13: tasmā “kusalakammajameva iṭṭha”nti evaṃ aniyametvā “kusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhamevā”ti evamettha niyamo gahetabboti dassento “akusalakammajampī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1181_16: Yadi duggatiyaṃ kesañci tiracchānānaṃ saṇṭhānādisampatti sugatiyaṃ sattānaṃ akusalanissandena virūparūpatā viya kusalanissandena,
tika-abh02t0:1181_18: Atha pana yaṃ kesañci amanāpampi samānaṃ rūpaṃ manāpaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh02t0:1181_20: evampi yathā kesañci tiracchānādīnaṃ kusalakammajaṃ manussādirūpaṃ amanāpato upaṭṭhahantampi kusalavipākasseva
tika-abh02t0:1181_22: evaṃ akusalakammajaṃ kesañci manāpaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahantampi akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇabhāvato atthato aniṭṭhameva nāma hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1181_25: yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko uppajjeyyā”tiādiaṭṭhānapāḷiyā virodho siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1181_29: Iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabboti yathā “kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1181_30: evaṃ kiñcāpi “akusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1181_31: tena pana nayadassanena akusalakammajassa abhāvo vutto eva hotīti so saṃvaṇṇanāvasena niddhāretvā vattabboti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1181_32: Etena kusalakammajameva iṭṭhanti purimapadāvadhāraṇassa gahetabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1182_5: Kasmā pana iṭṭhāniṭṭhamissite vatthumhi manāpatāva saṇṭhātīti āha “iṭṭhārammaṇena…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1182_7: Suṭṭhu vuttanti “iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ ekantato vipākeneva paricchijjatī”ti vadantehi iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ sammadeva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1183_0: “Aniṭṭhā”ti vacaneneva tesaṃ iṭṭhatā nivattitāti āha “sadisatā ca rūpādibhāvoyevā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1183_1: Iṭṭhāneva rūpādīni kāmaguṇāti sutte vuttānīti mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya iṭṭhapaṭipakkhā aniṭṭhāti adhippetāti vuttaṃ “aniṭṭhāti…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1183_3: Sabbāni vāti ettha “piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa”nti vacanato kathaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ kāmaguṇabhāvāpattīti ce?
tika-abh02t0:1183_5: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ “cakkhuviññeyyāni rūpāni iṭṭhānī”tiādisuttapadaṃ nīyatīti āha “atisayenā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1184_0: Indriyabaddharūpavasena pāḷiyaṃ hīnadukaniddeso pavattoti dassetuṃ “dvīsupi hīnapaṇītapadesū”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1184_3: “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna”nti indriyabaddharūpe niddiṭṭhe kasmā kammajavasena attho vutto,
tika-abh02t0:1184_6: Padhānattā hi kammajavasena atthaṃ vatvā sesesu “evaṃ utusamuṭṭhānādīsupī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atideso kato.
tika-abh02t0:1184_7: “Tehi tehīti etasmiṃ atthe”ti iminā “tesaṃ tesa”nti kattari sāmivacanaṃ āsaṅkati.
tika-abh02t0:1184_8: Tathā sati visaye vā sāmivacane laddhaguṇaṃ dasseti “na kammajavasenevā”tiādinā,
tika-abh02t0:1186_0: “Ekasmiṃyeva assādanakujjhanato”tiādinā “yasmā teyeva rūpādayo eko assādetī”tiādikaṃ suttantavivaraṇaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāve hetubhāvena vuttanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1186_1: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti nibbāne viya aniṭṭhaggahaṇaṃ saññāvipallāsena aññesupi ārammaṇesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhābhiniveso hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1187_7: iṭṭhañca hotīti ayampi attho vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1187_12: Puretaraṃ pavattacittābhisaṅkhāravasenāpi hi vināva saññāvipallāsaṃ iṭṭhaṃ “aniṭṭha”nti,
tika-abh02t0:1188_2: tassa buddharūpādikassa gūthādikassa ca ārammaṇassa yathākkamaṃ iṭṭhataṃ aniṭṭhatañca nidasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1188_3: Vijjamānepi saññāvipallāse ārammaṇena vipākaniyamadassananti iṭṭhārammaṇe kusalavipākova uppajjati,
tika-abh02t0:1188_9: Ārammaṇena niyāmito hi vipāko attano upakārakassa ārammaṇassa niyāmako hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1189_0: Dvārantare dukkhassa paccayabhūtassa ārammaṇassa dvārantare sukhavipākuppādanato,
tika-abh02t0:1189_1: dvārantare sukhassa paccayabhūtassa ārammaṇassa dvārantare dukkhavipākuppādanato vipākena ārammaṇaniyamadassanena
tika-abh02t0:1191_6: Na hi sakkā santikassa tabbhāvaṃ avināsetvā dūrabhāvaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1191_9: na ca okāsadūrato lakkhaṇato dūraṃ visuṃ karaṇena bhindati vibhāgaṃ karoti,
tika-abh02t0:1191_10: nāpi okāsadūrena lakkhaṇato dūraṃ vomissakakaraṇena bhindati sambhindatīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1191_11: “Tidhā attho daṭṭhabbo”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ “na hī”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-abh02t0:1191_15: “Etthāpī”tiādinā yathā “okāsato dūrameva bhindatī”ti ettha okāsato dūrassa okāsato santikabhāvakaraṇaṃ adhippetanti vināsanaṃ bhedanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1191_16: evaṃ “na lakkhaṇato dūraṃ bhindatī”ti etthāpi lakkhaṇato dūrassa lakkhaṇato santikabhāvākaraṇaṃ abhedanaṃ avināsananti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1191_17: Vomissakakaraṇavibhāgakaraṇatthataṃ sandhāyāha “bhindamānoti ettha ca aññathā bhedanaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1191_18: Pacchimanaye vināsanatthameva sandhāya “bhedanaṃ idha ca aññathā vutta”nti avoca.
tika-abh02t0:1194_3: Kāyavohāraṃ arahantīti kāyantogadhattā kāyekadesattā ca kāyoti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-abh02t0:1194_5: karajakāyopi “so imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”tiādīsu.
tika-abh02t0:1194_8: Yathāha “yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjācakkhuviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayita”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1194_9: “Na hi cakkhādayo kāyappasādā hontī”ti iminā kāyapasādanissitā vedanā nippariyāyena kāyikāti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1194_14: ekamuhuttādipubbaṇhādīsu utuādinā rūpassa viya vedanāya vibhāgo na gayhatīti samayavasena ca atītādibhedo na dassito”ti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:1194_15: Santānavasena pavattānampi vedanānaṃ cittena samūhato gahetabbataṃ sandhāyāha “vedanāsamudāyo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1195_1: taṃ pana atikkantahetupaccayakiccanti evaṃ vuttassa nayassa upalakkhaṇanti āha “pubbantāparantamajjhagatāti
tika-abh02t0:1195_4: vipākānaṃ viya ca ayaṃ nāma janakahetūti nippariyāyena na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1196_4: Sukhato tajjātiyā adukkhamasukhā paṇītāti yojetabbāti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1196_15: Chādanā āsiñcanā vā sabbassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1197_1: Ekantapaṇīte lokuttare hīnapaṇītānaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena hīnapaṇītatā.
tika-abh02t0:1197_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yā oḷārikā, sā hīnā.
tika-abh02t0:1197_7: Akusalādīsu dosasahagatādiantarabhedavasena upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumatā taṃtaṃvāpanavasena vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:1197_8: na kusalākusalādivasenāti āha “taṃtaṃvāpanavasena kathanepi parivattanaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1197_13: kilesādhikehi santāne pavattamānā kusalā dhammā kilesehi sambādhappattiyā tiṇādīhi sambādhappattāni viya sassāni vipulaphalauḷāraphalā na hontīti.
tika-abh02t0:1197_16: Oḷārikasukhumanikantīti ettha antogadhavisesaṃ nikantiyā oḷārikasukhumatāsāmaññaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1197_17: Yathā hettha oḷārikasāmaññena oḷārikoḷārikataroḷārikatamā nikantiyo gayhanti,
tika-abh02t0:1197_19: Sukhumatamanikantivatthunti cettha yāva bhavaggaṃ vipassanāñāṇañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1198_0: 13. Yadi siyāti yadi asampayogo visaṃsaṭṭho siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1199_2: Tato dūrato kusalatoti tato akusalato dūrato kāmāvacarādikusalavedayitato kusalā kāmāvacarādikusalavedanā.
tika-abh02t0:1199_3: “Na sakkā”ti vuttaṃ uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ “tathā hi satī”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-abh02t0:1199_4: Tasmāti yasmā dūrato santikuddharaṇaṃ vuttanayena santikato santikuddharaṇameva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1199_7: Tasmā santikato santikuddharaṇañca na sakkā kātuṃ atthavisesābhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1200_0: Nanu ca atisayavacanicchāvasena attheva atthavisesoti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “dūradūrataratāya viya santikasantikataratāya ca anadhippetattā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1200_3: Idha vuttassa dūrassāti imasmiṃ vedanākkhandhavibhaṅge “akusalā vedanā kusalābyākatāhi vedanāhi dūre”tiādinā vuttassa dūrassa.
tika-abh02t0:1200_5: tato accantavisadisattā tassa vasena dūre santikaṃ natthīti na sakkā dūrato santikaṃ uddharituṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1200_7: heṭṭhā yā vedanā yāya vedanāya dūreti vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1200_8: sā eva tassā kenacipi pariyāyena santiketi na uddharitabbāti.
tika-abh02t0:1200_13: “akusalā vedanā akusalāya vedanāya santike”ti evaṃ vuttaakusalāya vedanāyameva lobhasahagatādivasena vibhattāya dūrabhāvopi labbhati.
tika-abh02t0:1201_2: tadaggena dūrato santikaṃ uddhariyeyyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “upādāyupādāya dūrato ca santikaṃ na sakkā uddharitu”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1201_7: taṃ sabhāgaṭṭheneva labbhatīti santikatova santikaṃ uddhaṭaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh02t0:1201_10: Lobhasahagatāya dosasahagatā visabhāgatāya dūre samānā kathaṃ santike bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1201_11: Nanu tāsaṃ akusalasabhāgatā labbhatevāti tattha uttaramāha “visabhāgatā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1201_12: Tattha bhedaṃ aggahetvā na pavattatīti bhedaṃ visesaṃ asadisataṃ gahetvā eva pavattati visabhāgatā.
tika-abh02t0:1201_13: Dūratāyāti idhādhippetāya dūratāya sabhāgassa abyāpakattā dūrato santikuddharaṇaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1201_14: Sati hi sabhāgabyāpakatte siyā santikatāti dūrato santikuddharaṇaṃ sakkā kātunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1201_19: Visabhāgabyāpakattā santikatāyāti idhādhippetavisabhāgaṃ byāpetvā pavattanato heṭṭhā vuttasantikatāya santikato dūruddharaṇaṃ sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1205_8: Adhivacanaṃ paññattipakāsakaṃ ñāpakaṃ etesaṃ atthīti adhivacanā yathā arisasoti.
tika-abh02t0:1205_10: Arūpakkhandhapariyāpannattā phassepi yathāvutto attho sambhavatīti dassetuṃ “samphassoyeva vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1205_12: atha kho pañcadvārikaphassepi “viññeyyabhāve vacanaṃ adhikicca pavattā adhivacanā”tiādivuttappakāro attho sambhavati.
tika-abh02t0:1206_0: Yadi evanti yadi pañcadvārikaphassehi uppannasaññā pariyāyato nippariyāyato ca “adhivacanasamphassajā”ti vuccanti,
tika-abh02t0:1206_1: evaṃ cattāropi arūpino khandhā evaṃ vattuṃ yuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1206_2: Evaṃ sante saññāva kasmā “adhivacanasamphassajā”ti vuttāti āha “tiṇṇaṃ khandhāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1206_4: Atthavasenāti “vacanaṃ adhikicca pavattā adhivacanā”tiādinā vuttaatthavasena anvatthatāvasena.
tika-abh02t0:1206_5: Attano pattampi nāmanti “adhivacanasamphassajā”ti evaṃ attano anuppattampi nāmaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1206_7: Pubbe catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ sādhāraṇopi adhivacanasamphassajavohāro ruḷhivasena saññāya eva pavattoti
tika-abh02t0:1206_8: vatvā idāni so tadaññārūpakkhandhasādhāraṇo saññāya nivesitoti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1206_10: saddena kujjhitvā olokanādi viya rajjitvā savanādipi saṅgayhatīti veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1206_12: Cakkhusamphassajāsaññāya pana pākaṭabhāvaṃ nidassanavasena dassetuṃ “olokanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇavisayasamāgame”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1210_1: “Heṭṭhimakoṭiyāti etthā”ti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā”ti vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1210_4: Heṭṭhimakoṭiyāva padhānaṃ dassitanti imamatthaṃ gahetvā “yadi eva”ntiādinā codeti.
tika-abh02t0:1210_5: Itaro “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā padhānameva dassita”nti evamettha niyamo gahetabboti dassento “uparimakoṭigatabhāvenā”tiādinā taṃ pariharati.
tika-abh02t0:1210_7: Padhāne hi dassite appadhānampi atthato dassitameva hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1210_8: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “taṃsampayuttasaṅkhārā pana tāya gahitāya gahitāva hontī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1210_10: taṃ uparimakoṭiyampi labbhati evāti āha “heṭṭhimakoṭi hi sabbabyāpikā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1210_12: Āgamanakiriyā hi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā karaṇabhāvena tattha vuttāti.
tika-abh02t0:1210_14: evaṃ vacanakiriyāyapi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā karaṇabhāvo sambhavatīti dassetuṃ “purimepi vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1210_15: “Ekūnapaññāsappabhede”ti idaṃ lokiyacittuppāde pāḷiāgatānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ uparimakoṭiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1210_16: Yevāpanakadhammehi saddhiṃ uparimakoṭiyā gayhamānāya “tepaññāsā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1213_1: padassa tatvato pariyāyato ca atthaṃ dasseti “sañjātiyaṃ ādiuppattiya”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1213_9: Opapātikasamuggameneva cettha saṃsedajasamuggamopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo pañcakkhandhapariyāpannānaṃ tadā uppajjanārahānaṃ uppajjanato.
tika-abh02t0:1213_12: Sukhumajātiyalomā eva kira keci eḷakā himavante vijjanti,
tika-abh02t0:1213_13: tesaṃ lomaṃ sandhāya “jātimantaeḷakaloma”nti vuttaṃ atisukhumattā tesaṃ lomānaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1213_14: Keci pana “ajapākatikeḷakādīhi saṅkararahitānaṃ tesaṃ eḷakavisesānaṃ nibbatteḷakassa lomaṃ jātiuṇṇā,
tika-abh02t0:1215_11: Rūpāvacarānaṃ pana cakkhusotavatthujīvitavasena cattāri santatisīsānīti itaresaṃ vasena santatisīsahāni veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1216_2: Paṭisandhiyaṃ uppannā pavattā pañcakkhandhāti paṭisandhikkhaṇe pavattikkhaṇe ca pañcakkhandhe dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1216_8: “Vatthu uppādakkhaṇe dubbalaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ na paṭisandhikkhaṇaṃ eva,
tika-abh02t0:1216_9: nāpi vatthurūpaṃ eva sandhāya vuttanti dassento āha “sabbarūpānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe dubbalataṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1216_13: atha kho kammajassa paṭhamuppattiyaṃ apatiṭṭhitataṃ sandhāyāti dassento “satipī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1217_4: Tadāti ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādanameva natthi.
tika-abh02t0:1218_1: Yathāsambhavaṃ paccayā hontīti phassādayo āhārādivasena yathārahaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh02t0:1218_2: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭṭhāne “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1219_2: Tato purimatarehi uppajjamānaṃ viyāti yathā cuticittato āsannehi purimatarehi uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ bhavantare na uppajjati,
tika-abh02t0:1219_3: evaṃ cuticittena uppajjamānampi anupacchinnepi vaṭṭamūleti akāraṇaṃ vaṭṭamūlāvūpasamo cuticittassa rūpuppādaneti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1221_1: Samuṭṭhite rūpeti paṭisandhicittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpe samuṭṭhite paṭisandhianantaraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh02t0:1221_2: Uppādanirodhakkhaṇāti yathāvuttesu soḷasasu cittesu ādicittassa uppādakkhaṇo,
tika-abh02t0:1222_0: Dharamānakkhaṇe evāti tassa utuno vijjamānakkhaṇe eva yadi gahitā,
tika-abh02t0:1222_1: “soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ rūpa”nti vuttaṃ hoti soḷasaheva cittehi tassa dharamānatāya paricchinnattā.
tika-abh02t0:1222_2: Uppādakkhaṇaṃ aggahetvāti utuno dharamānakkhaṇe uppādakkhaṇaṃ aggahetvā nirodhakkhaṇo atha gahito,
tika-abh02t0:1222_3: “sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ rūpa”nti vuttaṃ hoti uppādakkhaṇasahitena ca ekassa cittakkhaṇassa gahitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1223_0: Evaṃ uppādanirodhakkhaṇesu gahitesu aggahitesu ca soḷasasattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatā,
tika-abh02t0:1223_1: tato adhikacittakkhaṇāyukatā ca siyāti dassetvā idāni tattha ṭhitapakkhaṃ dassento “yasmā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1223_2: Tattha tassa dharamānakkhaṇe uppannesūti tassa utuno dharamānakkhaṇe uppannesu soḷasasu cittesu paṭisandhipi yasmā gahitā,
tika-abh02t0:1223_3: tasmā utuno uppādakkhaṇo dharamānakkhaṇe gahitoti nirodhakkhaṇe aggahite “rūpe dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
tika-abh02t0:1223_4: taṃ pana sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhamānā adhikasoḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā adhippetā.
tika-abh02t0:1223_5: Gahite vā nirodhakkhaṇe soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā adhippetāti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1223_6: Ettha ca “adhikasoḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā”ti idaṃ paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇo gahitoti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1223_14: ekaṃ cuticittanti pañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti,
tika-abh02t0:1223_18: tadavasāne tasmiññeva ekacittakkhaṇaṭṭhitike ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjatī”ti ca vakkhati.
tika-abh02t0:1224_1: Ettha ca mātarā ajjhohaṭā ojā bāhirabbhañjanaṃ viya gabbhamallinā tasmiṃ santāne ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppattiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1224_2: Āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpapaveṇiyā ojāya viya sesatisantatiojāya rūpuppādananti udariye ojā rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti utusamuṭṭhānabhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1225_2: na cittena sampayuttadhammeti katvā āha “cittassa pubbaṅgamatāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1225_4: na kammacetanaṃ viya ekadhammamevā”ti vutte “yathā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa hetuādayo cittasampayuttadhammāpi samuṭṭhāpakāva,
tika-abh02t0:1225_5: evaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānarūpassa kammasampayuttāpī”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tassa parihāraṃ vattuṃ “kammasamuṭṭhānañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1226_2: Nayadassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe eva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pātubhāvoti imassa atthassa anadhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1226_4: Yathā ca “paṭisandhikkhaṇe evā”ti niyamo na gahetabbo,
tika-abh02t0:1226_5: evaṃ “ekakkhaṇe eva pātubhāvo”tipi niyamo na gahetabboti dassento “na paneta”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1227_8: Kammajarūpānaṃ vā itaresaṃ mūlabhāvato padhānanti “kammajarūpappavattiṃ sandhāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1227_10: Pade padaṃ akkamitvāti lakuṇḍakapādatāya attano akkantapadasamīpe padaṃ nikkhipitvā.
tika-abh02t0:1227_12: so idhādhippetoti āha “lahuṃ lahuṃ akkamitvāti attho”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1227_13: Saheva nirujjhantīti rūpaṃ kammajamidhādhippetanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1227_14: Utujaṃ pana cutito uddhampi pavattati eva.
tika-abh02t0:1227_16: arūpassa tato ekabhāgo”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ addhānappakāraṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1228_5: tato adhikā vā ete ākārā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1228_9: Nānānirodhabhāvaṃ viya ekuppādabhāvampi pacchimakammajassa ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ anicchanto “yadi panā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
