tika-abh02t0:1228_19: bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannassa nānānirodhatā ca natthīti āha “ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu uppannarūpāni vajjetvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1228_21: “Saṅkhalikassa viya sambandho”ti etena avicchinnasambandho idha “paveṇī”ti adhippetoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1228_23: Na hi rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ viya anantarapaccayabhāvo atthīti rūpadhammānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannarūpadhamme aggahetvā “aṭṭhacattālīsā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1228_24: Tesaṃ pana gahaṇe ekūnapaññāsāva siyāti āha “ekūnapaññāsakammajiyavacanaṃ kattabbaṃ siyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1229_7: Aññassāti ekassa cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppajjitvā tato aññassa cittassa.
tika-abh02t0:1229_9: Ettha ca pacchimakammajarūpappavattiyaṃ nirujjhanakanti vuttaṃ tato puretarappavattaṃ rūpaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1229_12: Ṭhitikkhaṇeti arūpassa rūpassa ca ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannassa rūpassa ca arūpassa ca dassitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1229_15: Kasmā panettha pacchimakammajena dīpanāyaṃ samatiṃsakammajarūpaggahaṇaṃ katanti āha “samatiṃsa…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1229_19: jīvitañca taṃ saṅkhāro cāti jīvitasaṅkhāro, āyu.
tika-abh02t0:1230_0: Aññassa uppādakkhaṇeti yassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ aññassa tato sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇe,
tika-abh02t0:1230_2: “Vuttanti adhippāyo”ti idaṃ pāḷiyā virujjhantampi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttanti ayamettha adhippāyoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1230_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kammajarūpanti sā tāya kena kāraṇena virujjhatīti āha “catu…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1230_12: Tena hi vuttaṃ “yena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh02t0:1231_0: Puna “etehī”ti iminā ekuppādanānānirodhanānuppādaekanirodhadīpanavasena pavattā aṭṭhakathāpadesā gahitāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1231_5: Tatiya bhāgoti ca uppādaṭṭhitikkhaṇe upādāya bhaṅgakkhaṇo adhippeto.
tika-abh02t0:1231_10: Ubhayañcetaṃ yathākkamaṃ manodvāre pañcadvāre ca āpāthagataṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1231_11: Na kho panevaṃ sakkā viññātuṃ ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1231_14: “Tasmā”tiādinā yattha khaṇekadesaṃ aggahitanti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1232_0: Kasmā panettha rūpameva samānepi aniccasaṅkhatādibhāve cirāyukaṃ jātanti?

tika-abh02t0:1232_6: aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yadidaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1232_11: Sā ca nesaṃ vohārānuguṇā vibhāvetabbatā attano dandhaparivattitāya,
tika-abh02t0:1232_12: tesañca lahuparivattitāya soḷasahi sattarasahi vā cittakkhaṇehi nippajjatīti rūpamevettha cirāyukaṃ jātaṃ. Kiñca –
tika-abh02t0:1232_18: pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti na ettha aniccasaṅkhatādibhāvasāmaññena rūpārūpaṃ samānāyukaṃ parikappetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1233_2: taṃ dassetvā yvāyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpuppādo vutto,

tika-abh02t0:1233_10: Na hi yathādhammasāsane abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ dissatīti adhippāyo.

tika-abh02t0:1234_14: evaṃ nirodhāvatthāya viya nirodhābhimukhāvatthāyapi bhavitabbaṃ. Sā ṭhiti,

tika-abh02t0:1235_5: taṃ dukkhasaccanti katvā “no”ti vattuṃ na sakkā,

tika-abh02t0:1240_5: Samāpajjanaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā samathavipassanānukkamena nāmakāyassa nirodhameva. Ādi-
tika-abh02t0:1243_0: Uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamopi labbhatevāti “cattāro satipaṭṭhānātiādiko desanākkamovā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1243_1: Anupubbukkaṃsatoti dānasīlakāmādīnavādidassananekkhammakathānaṃ anukkamena ukkaṭṭhabhāvato kathānaṃ anupubbukkaṃsatā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1243_2: Tena ukkaṃsakkamo nāmāyaṃ visuṃ kamoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1244_1: Anāsavā khandhesveva vuttāti attho sāsavānampi khandhesu vuttattā.

tika-abh02t0:1244_4: khandhādhikāre khandhapariyāpannā eva anāsavā gayhantīti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-abh02t0:1245_0: Yathā phassādayo visesato tadanuguṇavuttitāya saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasabhāvāti saṅkhārakkhandhe samavaruddhā,
tika-abh02t0:1245_1: na evaṃ vedanāsaññāviññāṇānīti rūpadhammā viya tāni visuṃ khandhabhāvena vuttāni.
tika-abh02t0:1245_2: Etena phassādīnaṃ visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyatābhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1245_7: sati rūpaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ abhinivissa uppajjanti saṃyojanābhinivesavinibandhā.
tika-abh02t0:1245_10: viññāṇe sati viññāṇaṃ upādāya viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa uppajjanti saṃyojanābhinivesavinibandhā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1245_12: mama rūpanti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hotī”ti ca evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

tika-abh02t0:1247_0: Puṭaṃ katvāti ca chattasadisaṃ puṭaṃ bandhaṃ katvā.

tika-abh02t0:1249_3: Yojetabbanti vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā samudayabhūte phassepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti yojetabbanti.
tika-abh02t0:1251_2: Viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyatīti ayamattho “tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati,
tika-abh02t0:1255_1: Taṃ vatvāti taṃ bhūmivasena jānitabbataṃ “sabbāpi catubhūmikavedanā”tiādinā vatvā.
tika-abh02t0:1256_2: tathāpi anantarameva paccāmasituṃ yutto itarattha asambhavatoti āha “aṭṭha…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1258_2: tassa vaḍḍhanaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne avuttassa kathanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1258_14: Tattha paññāppabhedajananatthanti dhammavisayāya pabhedagatāya paññāya vineyyānaṃ nibbattanatthaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1258_16: Abhiññeyyadhammavibhāgatāya sammasanavārassa visayabhāvato vuttaṃ “ekekassa vārassa gahitassa niyyānamukhabhāvato”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1258_17: Itarepi bhedā vuttāti duvidhatividhabhedānaṃ yaṃ nānattaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1258_18: tassa vasena itare bhedā anānattāpi yathāvuttakāraṇato vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1258_19: “Na kevala”ntiādinā bhedānaṃ aññamaññapekkhataṃ dassetvā “tasmā”tiādinā tesaṃ visiṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1259_0: Yathā dukamūlakādīsu bhedā gaṇanānupubbiyā pavattā pabhedantarāpekkhā,
tika-abh02t0:1259_2: Ete pana sattavidhādibhedā pabhedantaranirapekkhā kevalaṃ bahuvidhabhāvasāmaññeneva vuttāti dasseti “aññappabhedanirapekkhā”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1259_3: Dukatikapadatthānaṃ yathārahaṃ apekkhitabbāpekkhakabhāvena vuttattā yathā duke ṭhapetvā vuttā tikā tattha pakkhittā nāma jātā,
tika-abh02t0:1259_4: evaṃ tikadukapadatthānaṃ apekkhitabbāpekkhakabhāvena vuttattā duke vatvā vuttesupi tikesu te pakkhittā nāma hontīti āha “parato…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1261_7: “Kāmāvacaraaṭṭhakusalacittavasenā”tiādinā kusalābyākatānampi kāmāvacarānaṃyeva yojitattā vuttaṃ “samānavīthiyaṃ labbhamānatā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1261_10: atha kasmā samānavīthiyaṃyeva yojitāti āha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1262_0: Cittasambandhoti cittena sambandho cittasambandhaṃ katvā cittasīsena vedanāya kathanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1262_5: Yattha katthacīti dīpetabbassa atthassa visesābhāvato sattavidhabhedādīsu yattha katthaci.
tika-abh02t0:1262_9: rūpāvacarādibhūmiāmasanena pana asamānavīthiyaṃ labbhamānatā dassitāti āha “atibyattā ca ettha samānāsamānavīthīsu labbhamānatā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1262_11: Na bhūmiyo apekkhitvā ṭhapitāti kathetabbabhāvena bhūmiyo apekkhitvā na ṭhapitā,
tika-abh02t0:1263_0: “Upanissayakoṭiyā”ti ettha nippariyāyato pariyāyato ca upanissayakoṭidassanamukhena idhādhippetaupanissayakoṭiṃ
tika-abh02t0:1263_8: Pakatūpanissayo ca nānāvīthiyaṃyevāti tadalābhavacanaṃ idha nānāvīthijotakanti dasseti “ghānādidvāresū”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1263_11: so ca ghāyanādīhi paresaṃ paṭipattiyā jānituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-abh02t0:1263_12: Antimabhavikabodhisattādīnaṃ savanena vinā taṃphusanaṃ siyā mūlūpanissayoti “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1265_0: Thāmagamanaṃ nāma kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvoti āha “appahīnakāmarāgādikassa vā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1265_2: na nesaṃ kiccavisesoti kiccavisesena vutte dassento “asamapekkhanāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1265_6: saddena cakkhusamphassassa catubhūmikavedanāya upanissayabhāvo eva pakārantarena kathitoti imamevatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh02t0:1266_0: Sabbaṃ sammasanaṃ bhāvanāti veditabbā, na nīvaraṇappahānapariññāva.
tika-abh02t0:1267_0: Aññamaññassa cāti phoṭṭhabbamahābhūtesu itarītarassa, āpodhātuyā ca vasena.
tika-abh02t0:1268_3: Tassa vā dassanassāti tassa vā jātiādike bhayato dassanavasena pavattassa kāmāvacarañāṇassa.
tika-abh02t0:1269_0: Tadeva attano phalasseva phalabhāvenāti “manosamphasso”ti phassassa kāraṇabhāvena yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1269_1: tadeva viññāṇaṃ attano phalassa phalabhāvena vuttassa phassassa “cakkhusamphassaja”ntiādinā phalabhāvena vattuṃ na yuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1269_2: “Manosamphasso”tiādinā labbhamānopi viññāṇaṃ paṭicca phassassa paccayabhāvo hetuphalasaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1269_3: na vuttoti vatvā yadipi phasso viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1269_4: na pana phassassa viya viññāṇaṃ so tassa visesapaccayo hotīti viññāṇassa cakkhusamphassajāditā na vuttāti dassetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1272_1: Taṃ taṃ samudāyanti taṃ taṃ cittuppādasaṅkhātadhammasamudāyaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1273_0: Katthacīti te eva parivaṭṭe sāmaññena vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1273_1: Katthacīti vā tesu parivaṭṭesu kismiñcipi padese.
tika-abh02t0:1278_2: Taṃ nesaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ vipakkhavasena patiṭṭhāpetuṃ sādhāraṇaṃ udāharaṇavasena dasseti “āyatanasaddattho viyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1278_3: Atha vā cakkhādiattho eva cakkhādisaddavisesito āyatanatthoti taṃ tādisaṃ āyatanatthaṃ sandhāyāha “āyatanasaddattho viya asādhāraṇato”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1279_1: sotādīnampi ayaṃ samaññā siyāti atippasaṅgaṃ pariharanto “satipī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1279_2: Dutiye atthavikappe cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhati,
tika-abh02t0:1279_5: Rūpamiva cakkhuviññeyyaṃ viya saviggahamiva sabimbakaṃ viya vaṇṇavācako rūpa-
tika-abh02t0:1279_6: saddo adhippetoti āha “vitthāraṇaṃ vā rūpasaddassa attho”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1280_2: Ajjhoharaṇassa rasaggahaṇamūlatāvacanena rasassa paramparāya jīvitahetutaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1280_12: Ekāyatanattaṃ upanetvā vuttā dvādasa ekasabhāvattā bhinditvā vacane payojanābhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1282_1: saddo na āyatanatthādīsu viya padatthavivaraṇamukhena pavatto,
tika-abh02t0:1282_2: atha kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ devagharādike niruḷhatāya evamatthoti āha “ruḷhivasena āyatanasaddassatthaṃ vattu”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1283_1: Ūnacodanāti dvādasato ūnāni kasmā na vuttānīti codanā.
tika-abh02t0:1283_3: evaṃ sante cakkhādīnampi dhammāyatanabhāvo siyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “satipī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1283_5: atha kho dvārārammaṇabhāvehi asādhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti vacanaseso.
tika-abh02t0:1284_0: Yebhuyyasahuppattiādīhīti yebhuyyena cakkhāyatanādīni kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti.
tika-abh02t0:1284_1: “Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni uppajjantī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1284_2: Tasmā āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati,
tika-abh02t0:1284_11: te “mayhaṃ cakkhu”ntiādinā adhikasinehavatthubhūtā cakkhādayo yathā ajjhattikatāya,
tika-abh02t0:1284_14: Ghānādikkamenāti ghānaṃ jivhā kāyoti iminā kamena.
tika-abh02t0:1285_9: Passantopi hi dūratare nadisotaṃ na tassa saddaṃ suṇāti.
tika-abh02t0:1285_11: Purato ṭhapitamattassa hi bhojanassa gandho gayhatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1285_19: Taṃtaṃgocarattā tassa tassānantaraṃ bāhirāyatanāni vuttānīti vuttovāyamatthoti evampi imesaṃ kamo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1286_1: Yañhi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya ekaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh02t0:1287_5: Yasmāti yāya dhammatāya yena dvārādibhāvena kāraṇabhūtena.
tika-abh02t0:1288_7: Sadā abhāvoti na sadā abhāvapatiṭṭhāpanaṃ sabbakālampi natthīti,
tika-abh02t0:1288_10: Viparivattanaṃ uppādajarāvatthāhi santānaṃ vinā na vikārāpattīti āha “santānavikārāpatti vā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1289_3: Purimaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇanti “paṭipīḷanaṭṭhenā”ti pubbe sāmaññato vuttaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1289_4: Paccayavasena dukkhanākārena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dukkhanaṃ puggalasseva vasena dukkhamatāti āha “puggalassa pīḷanato dukkhama”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1290_0: “Natthi etassa vasavattako”ti iminā natthi etassa attāti anattāti imamatthaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh02t0:1290_1: “nāpi idaṃ vasavattaka”nti iminā pana na attāti anattāti.
tika-abh02t0:1290_4: Parassa ca attanīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-abh02t0:1290_5: Taṃ etassa natthīti taṃ yathāvuttaparaparikappitaṃ vasavattakaṃ etassa cakkhādino natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1290_7: “Suññaṃ taṃ tena vasavattanākārenā”ti iminā ubhayathāpi avasavattanaṭṭhe dassitabbe tattha tāva ekaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1290_8: dassetuṃ “parassā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna “atha vā”tiādinā itaraṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1290_10: na sāmiko assāmikoti evaṃ atthe gayhamāne “assāmikato”ti padassa suññavisesanatāya payojanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh02t0:1291_0: Sasantāne dhammānaṃ visadisuppatti idha bhāvasaṅkantigamanaṃ nāmāti āha “santatiyaṃ bhāvantaruppattiyevā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1291_1: Tathā visadisuppattiyaṃ purimākāravigamo pakatibhāvavijahananti āha “santatiyā yathāpavattākāravijahana”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1291_5: Sabhāvadhammo hi uppādakkhaṇaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇañca patvā bhijjatīti uppādāvatthāya jarāvatthaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1291_7: Tathā saṅkamato ca attalābhakkhaṇato uddhaṃ jarāmaraṇehi taṃsabhāvapariccāgo pakatibhāvavijahananti khaṇavasena cetaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1291_8: Pubbāparavasenāti ca khaṇānaṃ pubbāparavasenāti attho sambhavati.
tika-abh02t0:1291_11: “Cakkhuṃ anicca”nti vutte “aniccaṃ cakkhu”ntipi vuttameva hotīti “yaṃ cakkhu,
tika-abh02t0:1291_14: taṃ cakkhu”nti āpannamevāti āha “aniccānaṃ sesadhammānampi cakkhubhāvo āpajjatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1292_0: Tehi ca aniccadukkhalakkhaṇehi ca anattalakkhaṇameva visesena dassitaṃ “yadaniccaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1292_5: Evaṃ dukkhenāti evaṃ nānappakārena akkhirogādidukkhena ābādhatāya.
tika-abh02t0:1292_7: Na hi ghaṭabhedakaṇṭakavedhādivasena labbhamānā aniccadukkhatā sattānaṃ ekantato anattatādhigamahetū honti.
tika-abh02t0:1292_13: evaṃbhūtāni ca avasavattanato anattakānīti pariggahe ṭhitehi samupacitañāṇasambhārehi passituṃ sakkā.
tika-abh02t0:1293_5: Yadi cakkhādīnaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1293_8: Yassa hi tādisaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1293_9: tassa asati bahipaccayavisese kathaṃ pacchā visesaggahaṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh02t0:1293_11: Tasmā atthi nesaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ yaṃ saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ vaḍḍhentaṃ pacchā pākaṭataraṃ jāyatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1293_12: Tathā hi sarīrassa tāva ānāpānānaṃ anavatthānato parissamato ca visesaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1293_13: Anavatthitā hi assāsapassāsā vātā vārena vārena pavattanato.
tika-abh02t0:1293_14: Yadi hi assasite vā passassite vā sarīrassa koci pacchā viseso na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1293_17: Tasmā assasitaṃ sarīraṃ aññathā hontaṃ kamena tādisaṃ avatthaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-abh02t0:1293_19: passasite ca puna tatheva assāsassa paccayo hotīti ānāpānānaṃ anavatthānatopi sarīrassa visesaggahaṇaṃ aññathattasiddhi.
tika-abh02t0:1293_20: Tathā parissamopi asati visese pacchā sarīrassa na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1294_1: Rūpagandharasaphassādīnañhi visesena yo sarīre anindriyabaddhesu ca khīrūdakavatthapupphaphalosadhidhaññādīnaṃ pacchā viseso gayhati,
tika-abh02t0:1294_2: so asati bahipaccayavisese nesaṃ jarādiavatthāsu vaṇṇabalādibhedo,
tika-abh02t0:1294_3: rasavīriyavipākānubhāvabhedo ca khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ vinā kathamupalabbheyya.
tika-abh02t0:1294_7: Taṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ vinā na yujjatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1294_9: Na hi nissayamahābhūtabhedena vinā nissitabhedo sambhavatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1294_10: Evaṃ tāva rūpadhammānaṃ visesaggahaṇato khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1295_1: Yattha yattha hi ārammaṇe arūpadhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh02t0:1295_4: ārammaṇadhammā ca yathāsakaṃ khaṇato uddhaṃ na tiṭṭhantīti.
tika-abh02t0:1295_6: Aññe eva hi khaṇe khaṇe rūpādayo padīpajālāya,
tika-abh02t0:1295_12: saddavisesatopi tannimittānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1295_14: Paguṇañhi ganthaṃ sīghaṃ parivattentassa cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ saddānaṃ bhedo diṭṭho.
tika-abh02t0:1295_15: Na hi kāraṇabhedena vinā phalabhedo atthi.
tika-abh02t0:1295_18: Teneva nesaṃ khaṇe khaṇe aññathattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1295_20: Evaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ visesaggahaṇato khaṇe khaṇe aññathattasiddhi.
tika-abh02t0:1295_21: Yato hutvā abhāvato cakkhādīni aniccānīti siddhāni,
tika-abh02t0:1296_6: Pavattarūpādiggahaṇatoti ruppanādivasena pavattañca taṃ rūpādiggahaṇañcāti pavattarūpādiggahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1296_8: Aniccādiggahaṇassa sabbhāvāti rūpavedanādiñāṇato bhinnassa aniccādiñāṇassa labbhamānattā.
tika-abh02t0:1296_9: Tena satipi rūpādiatthānaṃ aniccādibhāve ruppanādibhāvato aniccādibhāvassa bhedamāha.
tika-abh02t0:1296_10: Idāni tameva bhedaṃ ñātatīraṇapariññāvisayatāya pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “na hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1296_12: Tattha lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya khandhārammaṇatāvacanena abhinnāti aññamaññavirodhāpādanena atidhāvituṃ na yuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1296_16: “Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti hi saṅkhāre sabhāvato sallakkhentoyeva lakkhaṇāni ca sallakkhetīti.
tika-abh02t0:1296_20: nānindriyādhikatāya ca vimokkhamukhattayabhūtānaṃ aññamaññabhedoti dassento “aniccanti ca gaṇhanto”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1299_2: Ajjhattikabāhiravasena abbokāratoti ajjhattikavasena ceva bāhiravasena ca asaṅkarato.
tika-abh02t0:1301_1: Tvameva kiṃ na jānāsīti kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsiyevāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1301_3: kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi evā”ti evaṃ vikkhepaṃ karontaṃ paravādiṃ “nanu ñāte”tiādinā sakavādī nibandhati.
tika-abh02t0:1301_6: Sasabhāvatā ca nibbānassa āpannā hotīti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1302_2: Kilesakkhayamattataṃ vā nibbānassa icchato kilesakkhayena bhavitabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1303_0: Evaṃ kilesakkhayamatte nibbāne khepetabbā kilesā bahuvidhā nānappakārā,
tika-abh02t0:1303_2: Svāyaṃ “katamaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā katame kilese khepetī”ti purimapucchādvayameva vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1303_3: Tadevāti yaṃ “avijjātaṇhānaṃ kiñci ekadesamattampī”ti vuttaṃ, tadeva.
tika-abh02t0:1304_0: Ettha ca yāyaṃ “kilesakkhayova nibbāna”nti nibbānassa abhāvatācodanā,
tika-abh02t0:1306_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo”ti –
tika-abh02t0:1308_0: “Gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti –
tika-abh02t0:1309_2: desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ, anataṃ, anāsavaṃ, saccaṃ, pāraṃ, nipuṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1309_7: nippapañcaṃ, santaṃ, amataṃ, paṇītaṃ, sivaṃ, khemaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1309_11: abyābajjhaṃ, virāgaṃ, suddhiṃ, muttiṃ, anālayaṃ, dīpaṃ, leṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1310_2: sabbañca rūpaṃ asaṅkhatā ca dhātū”tiādīhi abhidhammapadesehi ca paramatthabhāveneva desitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1310_3: Na hi sabhāvavirahitassa abhāvamattassa gambhīrāsaṅkhatādibhāvo abyākatadhammādibhāvo ca yutto,
tika-abh02t0:1311_2: svāyamabhāvo eko vā siyā aneko vā? Yadi eko,
tika-abh02t0:1311_3: ekeneva maggena kato sacchikato ca hotīti uparimānaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
tika-abh02t0:1311_4: Na hi ekaṃ anekehi kammappavattehi sādhetabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1311_8: Evaṃ sati suṭṭhutaraṃ maggassa niratthakatā āpajjati kilesānaṃ appahānato.
tika-abh02t0:1311_9: Akaronto ca maggo kilesābhāvaṃ tassa sacchikiriyāya kamatthaṃ sādheyya,
tika-abh02t0:1311_11: evaṃ sati vinā sabhāvabhedaṃ bahubhāvo natthīti bahubhāvatāpadesenassa sasabhāvatā āpannā.
tika-abh02t0:1311_16: Tathā tesaṃ kilesasaṅkhatāditāya kilesasaṅkhatādibhāvā ca siyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1311_17: na cetaṃ yuttanti na tesaṃ bahubhāvopacāro yutto.
tika-abh02t0:1311_18: Ekabhāvopi cassa asabhāvatāya eva vattuṃ na sakkāti ce? Na,
tika-abh02t0:1312_2: evaṃ sāmaññena sasabhāvatā bahubhāvaṃ na byabhicareyyāti sasabhāvapakkhepi nibbānassa bahubhāvo āpajjatīti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
tika-abh02t0:1312_4: Na hi evaṃ vattuṃ labbhā yathā kharabhāvo sasabhāvataṃ na byabhicarati,
tika-abh02t0:1312_8: na sasabhāvatā bahubhāvāpekkhāti na sasabhāvassa nibbānassa bahubhāvāpatti.
tika-abh02t0:1313_0: Api cettha kilesābhāvo nāma rāgādīnaṃ samucchedo accantappahānaṃ anuppādanirodho.
tika-abh02t0:1313_1: Tassa ca ekatte ekeneva maggena sādhetabbatā kiccavisesābhāvatoti dassanādimaggavibhāgo na siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1313_2: Icchito ca so odhisova kilesānaṃ pahātabbattā.
tika-abh02t0:1313_3: So ca maggavibhāgo saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ nātitikkhatikkhatikkhataratikkhatamabhāvena ekasmimpi samucchedappahānayogyabhāve
tika-abh02t0:1313_5: Abhāvo pana kilesānaṃ maggena kātabbo siyā “mā maggassa niratthakatā ahosī”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1313_9: So ca kilesābhāvo ekeneva maggena sādhetabbo siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1313_12: Tato dassanādimaggavibhāgo na siyāti sabbaṃ āvattati.
tika-abh02t0:1314_0: Yadi ca abhāvo bhāvassa siyāti tassa bhāvadhammatā icchitā,
tika-abh02t0:1314_1: evaṃ sati yathā saṅkhatadhammassa tassa jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ viya saṅkhatadhammatāpi āpannā,
tika-abh02t0:1314_2: evaṃ bahūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dhammassa tassa bahubhāvādippasaṅgopi dunnivāroti ataṃsabhāvassa asaṅkhatassekassa sasabhāvassa nibbānabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1315_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti vuttanti?
tika-abh02t0:1315_5: Tena rāgādikkhayapariyāyena ariyamaggena adhigantabbato “paramatthaṃ gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ duddasaṃ duranubodhaṃ nibbānaṃ rāgādikkhayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1316_0: Apica yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
tika-abh02t0:1316_1: evaṃ sasabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1316_5: saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese tadaṅgavasena pajahati,
tika-abh02t0:1316_7: Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
tika-abh02t0:1316_10: sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa
tika-abh02t0:1316_15: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti idaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakaṃ vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1316_17: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
tika-abh02t0:1316_21: saddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato seyyathāpi sīha- saddo.
tika-abh02t0:1316_22: Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatā dhātu itaratabbiparītavimuttisabhāvattā seyyathāpi “pathavīdhātu
tika-abh02t0:1316_23: vedanā cā”ti evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1324_1: Abhidhamme ca āgatāti imasmiṃ dhātuvibhaṅge abhidhammabhājanīyapañhapucchakesu,
tika-abh02t0:1324_3: Yathā pana suttante abhidhamme ca āgatā khandhādayo suttante desitaniyāmena khandhavibhaṅgādīsu suttantabhājanīyavasena vibhattā,
tika-abh02t0:1324_5: Tattha khandhādīnaṃ sabbasaṅgāhako abhidhammadesanāvisiṭṭho suttante āgato añño desetabbākāro natthīti
tika-abh02t0:1324_7: dhātūnaṃ pana so atthīti te tiṇṇaṃ dhātuchakkānaṃ vasena idha desitāti dassento āha “suttantesveva…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1324_9: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1325_0: Kathaṃ pana chasu chasu dhātūsu aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavarodhoti?
tika-abh02t0:1325_2: Tattha paṭhamachakke tāva pathavītejovāyodhātuyo sabhāvato phoṭṭhabbadhātu.
tika-abh02t0:1325_6: viññāṇadhātuyā dvārārammaṇabhāvena vā avasiṭṭhā rūpadhātuyo samavaruddhā,
tika-abh02t0:1325_7: viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena taṃsampayogato dhammadhātuekadesoti evaṃ sabbadhātusamavarodho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1325_13: Evamettha chasu chasu dhātūsu aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavarodho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1325_14: Tena vuttaṃ “sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1326_1: tena sasabhāvatāya ca idha dhātuvohāroti āha “suññe sabhāvamatte niruḷho dhātusaddo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1326_4: tehi asamphuṭṭhatā tesaṃ byāpakabhāve sati na hotīti āha “catūhi mahābhūtehi abyāpitabhāvo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1327_1: Avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci natthīti purimatthaṃ asambhāvento “dve eva vā”tiādinā samudāyena vinā dutiyatthamāha.
tika-abh02t0:1328_0: Pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti vā lomādiitarakoṭṭhāsehi asammisso visuṃ eko pathavīkoṭṭhāsoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1329_0: Payoganti bhāvanāpayogaṃ. Vīriyanti bhāvanānipphādakaṃ ussāhaṃ. Āyūhananti tādisaṃ cetanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1331_1: So pana yasmā pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷakharatā hotīti āha “kakkhaḷaṃ kharigatantiādivacanaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1332_1: Tathā hi taṃ vikantati chindatīti vikantaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1332_3: Lohasadisanti lohākāraṃ lohamalaṃ viya ghanasahitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh02t0:1332_4: Tāpetvā tāḷitaṃ pana chinnaṃ chinnaṃ hutvā visarati,
tika-abh02t0:1332_5: mudu maṭṭhaṃ kammaniyaṃ vā na hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1333_1: Tathā hi hatthikumbhaṃ varāhadāṭhaṃ bhujaṅgasīsaṃ valāhakūṭaṃ veṇupabbaṃ macchasiro saṅkho sippīti aṭṭha muttāyoniyo.
tika-abh02t0:1333_6: Valāhakajā bhāsurā dubbibhāgarūpā rattibhāge andhakāraṃ vidhamantā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-abh02t0:1333_10: te ca veḷavo amanussagocare eva padese jāyanti.
tika-abh02t0:1333_17: Evaṃ jātito aṭṭhavidhāsu muttāsu yā macchasaṅkhasippijā,
tika-abh02t0:1333_23: Bahulato vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ etaṃ vuttaṃ “muttāti sāmuddikamuttā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1334_0: 174. Idha natthi niyamo kevalaṃ dravabhāvasseva adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1337_1: Bhitticchiddādivasena labbhamānaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ nissāyeva paricchedākāsassa parikammakaraṇanti āha “ajaṭākāsassa ca kathitata”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1338_4: Tena hi kāraṇabhūtena sukhadukkhaphoṭṭhabbānaṃ yathāvuttasamatthatā hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1338_8: “Oḷārikappavatti eva vā pharaṇa”nti iminā nirupacāraṃ etesaṃ pharaṇaṭṭhaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1339_1: Ettha vuttaṃ saṅkappanti etasmiṃ “saṅkappo kāmo”tiādike niddesapadese vuttaṃ saṅkappaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1339_2: Tattha hi kilesakāmova “saṅkapparāgo purisassa kāmo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh02t0:1339_3: Vatthukāmassa tathā tathā saṅkappanato parikappanato “saṅkappo”ti vutto,
tika-abh02t0:1339_5: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana vitakkavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sopi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1340_14: “Etthāti panā”tiādinā saṃkilesavodānānaṃ saṅkarabhāvassa aniṭṭhāpajjanassa ca dassanena purimaṃyeva atthaṃ byatirekamukhena sampādeti.
tika-abh02t0:1343_1: Āveṇikattho atisayattho ca visesasaddo hotīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “puggalantarāsādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1343_5: Atisayakāraṇenapi yathā “atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1345_5: upanissayena ārammaṇādinā ca manoviññāṇassa paccayoti evaṃ manodhātudhammadhātūnaṃ manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1345_7: Tassā manodhātuyā manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabboti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1347_0: Na hi dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo santi aṭṭhārasadhātuvibhāgadassaneti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1347_1: Khandhāyatanadhātindriyānaṃyeva vasena saṅkhepādivibhāgadassanaṃ tesaṃ bahulaṃ pariññeyyadhammasaṅgaṇhanato.
tika-abh02t0:1348_0: Nijjīvassātiādi visesato sattasuññatādīpanatthā dhātudesanāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1348_1: Purimanayo aññesampi kamavuttīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ sambhavatīti adhippāyena vuttoti “manodhātuyeva vā”tiādinā dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1348_2: Tattha avijjamānepi purecarānucarabhāveti purecarānucarābhisandhiyā abhāvepi kevalaṃ anantarapubbakālaanantarāparakālatāya
tika-abh02t0:1349_0: “Aññaṃ aggahetvā pavattituṃ asamatthatāyā”ti etena viññāṇassa ekantasārammaṇatādassanena “ārammaṇena
tika-abh02t0:1349_1: vinā sayameva nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatī”ti evaṃ pavattitaṃ viññāṇavādaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh02t0:1351_1: rūpādi pana anekameva saṃhatanti imassa vā atthavisesassa dassanatthaṃ cakkhurūpādīsu vacanabhedo kato.
tika-abh02t0:1351_2: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ cakkhādi ekampi viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1351_5: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1351_7: yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa paccayo hotīti vuccatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1351_8: Taṃnissayatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā arūpabhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1351_9: atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
tika-abh02t0:1351_10: Itare ca paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1351_11: Svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassetuṃ
tika-abh02t0:1352_0: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā,
tika-abh02t0:1352_1: tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1352_4: tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvato yaṃ kiñci anālambitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa
tika-abh02t0:1352_6: Tassa yasmā yathā yathā sabhāvūpaladdhi viññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
tika-abh02t0:1352_7: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati.
tika-abh02t0:1352_8: Sā cassa indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavaseneva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1352_10: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti
tika-abh02t0:1353_7: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo sallakkhaṇārammaṇā,
tika-abh02t0:1353_10: Na cettha samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā samudāyābhogasseva abhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1353_12: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇā honti,
tika-abh02t0:1353_13: na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā andhā samuditā passantīti?
tika-abh02t0:1353_14: Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ asamatthānaṃ sivikāvahanādīsu samatthatāya dassanato.
tika-abh02t0:1353_15: Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh02t0:1353_16: tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṃ taṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā paribyattā.
tika-abh02t0:1354_1: saddena na kevalaṃ javanapariyosānā manoviññāṇadhātuyeva sampiṇḍīyati,
tika-abh02t0:1354_2: atha kho tadārammaṇabhavaṅgasaṅkhātāpi sampiṇḍīyatīti evampi attho labbhati,
tika-abh02t0:1354_4: Evaṃ satīti evaṃ aññamanodhātuppavattiyā oraṃ pavattacittānaṃ manoviññāṇadhātutādassane sati.
tika-abh02t0:1354_5: Satipi manaso sambhūtabhāve manodhātuyā manoviññāṇadhātubhāvappasaṅgo na hotiyeva taṃsabhāvasseva manoviññāṇadhātubhāvena niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh02t0:1354_8: Uppattiṭṭhānena cāti manodhātukiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuādīhi paricchinnena uppajjanaṭṭhānena ca.
tika-abh02t0:1354_9: Idāni ekattaggahaṇaṃ vināpi yathāvuttassa atthassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “anupanītepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1354_13: Na hi “manoviññāṇadhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantaraṃ uppajjati cittaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1354_14: tajjā manoviññāṇadhātū”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhavaṅgānantaraṃ uppannacittassa manodhātubhāvaṃ sādheti.
tika-abh02t0:1354_15: Siddhe hi manodhātubhāve taṃ tassa nivattakaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1354_16: Manoviññāṇadhātuyā pana uppannassa cittassa manoviññāṇadhātubhāvadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ tādisāya manodhātuyāpi
tika-abh02t0:1354_17: manoviññāṇadhātubhāvameva dīpeyyāti kathaṃ tassā nivattakaṃ siyāti āha “na hi yaṃ codīyati,
tika-abh02t0:1355_0: Yadi evaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanassa manoviññāṇadhātubhāvāpatti evāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “manodhātuyāpī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1355_1: Pañcaviññāṇehi manodhātūhi ca visiṭṭho sabhāvo pañcaviññāṇa…pe… sabhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1355_4: Javanāvasānānīti vā javanārammaṇattā tadārammaṇampi gahitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1356_0: Visuṃ kātuṃ yuttanti āvajjanampi yadipi rūpādivisayaṃ hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1356_1: javanaṃ viya ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ pana na hotīti edise ṭhāne visuṃ kātabbameva.
tika-abh02t0:1359_0: Heṭṭhā vuttanayattāti dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ “pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha rajjantassā”tiādinā
tika-abh02t0:1359_1: parittārammaṇādibhāve dassiyamāne “cittuppādarūpavasena taṃ taṃ samudāyaṃ ekekaṃ dhammaṃ katvā”tiādinā
tika-abh02t0:1365_4: Etesu kamatīti etesu ariyasaccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattati.
tika-abh02t0:1365_5: “Sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhāta”nti vuttaṃ atthasabhāvaṃ kamanakiriyāya kattubhāvena gahitanti pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “kiṃ kamatī”ti pucchati.
tika-abh02t0:1366_6: Attano eva tikhiṇabhāvoti saṅkhatadhammassa attano sabhāveneva rujāvahatikkhabhāvo.
tika-abh02t0:1366_10: avipariṇāmassa nirodhassa dassanena yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dukkhassa saṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhā āvi bhavantīti
tika-abh02t0:1366_12: Byāpetvāti bhavādīsu nānārammaṇesu ca visaṭā hutvā.
tika-abh02t0:1366_13: Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ “ūhanaṃ rāsikaraṇa”nti vatvā puna tadatthaṃ vivarati “dukkhanibbattana”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1366_14: Ekavokārabhavepi hi rāsibhūtameva dukkhaṃ nibbattati anekadhammasamūhato,
tika-abh02t0:1366_18: kārāgamaṃ katvā sampiṇḍanatthaṃ āyūhananti padaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1366_19: Nidadātīti dukkhassa ekantakāraṇattā taṃ nidassentaṃ viya janetīti dassento “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1366_24: palibodhaṭṭho niyyānasabhāvassa maggassa dassanena āvi bhavatīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1367_3: tasmā avivekabhūtassa samudayassa dassanena nirodhassa vivekaṭṭho āvi bhavati,
tika-abh02t0:1367_4: nibbānādhigamahetubhūtassāpi maggassa sappaccayatāya saṅkhatabhāvaṃ passato appaccayassa nirodhassa asaṅkhataṭṭho āvi bhavati,
tika-abh02t0:1367_5: tathā maraṇadhammatāya dukkhaṃ vinassantaṃ passato amaraṇadhammassa nirodhassa amataṭṭho āvi bhavatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “vivekā”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1367_6: Itare samudayanirodhadukkhadassanehīti ettha samudayadassanena “nāyaṃ hetu nibbānādhigamāya,
tika-abh02t0:1367_7: ayaṃ pana hetū”ti hetuṭṭho āvi bhavati.
tika-abh02t0:1367_8: Tathā paramagambhīrassa nipuṇatarassa duddasassa nirodhassa dassanena dassanaṭṭho sukhumarūpadassanena cakkhuno viya,
tika-abh02t0:1367_9: dukkhadassanena pana anekarogāturakapaṇajanadassanena issarajanassa uḷārabhāvo viya maggassa ādhipateyyaṭṭho āvi bhavati.
tika-abh02t0:1368_0: Te panete hetuṭṭhādike sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha palibodhupacchedavasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1368_2: “Maggādhipatino dhammā”ti vacanatoti yasmā satipi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādi na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1368_6: So tesaṃ ākāroti yo maggaṅgānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattadhammānaṃ ārammaṇādhipatipaccayatāsaṅkhāto ākāro,
tika-abh02t0:1368_9: Abhisametabbaṭṭhoti yathāvuttapīḷanādiatthameva paṭivijjhitabbatāya ekajjhaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1368_15: Ākāropi ñāṇena araṇīyato atthoti vuccatīti katvā tatiyanayo dassito.
tika-abh02t0:1368_16: Pīḷanādinā dassito visayavibhāgenapi visayivibhāgo hoti yathā “rūpasaññā,
tika-abh02t0:1369_4: saddassa ca payoge uppattiatthassa anupalabbhanato, u-
tika-abh02t0:1369_5: saddassa ca payoge upalabbhanato so uppattiatthaṃ dīpetīti āha “evaṃ uppannaṃ uditanti etthāpī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1370_6: Tassāti niṭṭhānabhūtāya phalasaṅkhātāya dukkhanirodhappattiyā abhisamayabhūtāya dukkhanirodhappattiyā paṭipadatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1372_0: Tannimittabhāvoti jātiādi viya adhiṭṭhānabhāvena dukkhassa kāraṇabhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1373_0: Marīcimāyāattānanti marīciyā māyāya attano ca ariyañāṇassāti ariyānaṃ ñāṇassa.
tika-abh02t0:1373_1: Tena ariyānaṃ maggañāṇānusārena pavattanakañāṇampi saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1374_0: Bādhakappabhavabhāvenāti bādhakassa uppādakabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā na taṇhā bādhakabhāvena gahitā pavattipavattihetūnaṃ asaṅkaravasena bodhanato.
tika-abh02t0:1374_3: samudayabhāvappasaṅgo cāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “jātiādīnaṃ viya vā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1374_4: Bādhakattassa bādhakatte ca niyamoti āha “dvidhāpi bādhakatthāvadhāraṇenā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1374_7: Suttantabhājanīye taṇhāya eva samudayabhāvassa dassitattā taṇhāvasena niyamaṃ dassento “na taṇhāya vinā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1374_10: Tathā hi sā kammavicittatāya hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī visesena kammassa sahakārikāraṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1375_7: Satipi dukkhasamudayāvabodhe yāvadeva nirodhamaggādhigamatthā paññābhāvanāti pacchimadvayasseva saccatthaṃ sātisayaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1375_8: tadadhigamassa ca avivādahetukaṃ sutte vibhāvitaṃ dassento “tassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1376_0: Ṭhānaṃ natthīti attano vādapatiṭṭhāpanakāraṇaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1376_1: Attabhāvapaṭilābheneva sattānaṃ jātiādīnaṃ patti sammukhībhāvo ca jāyatīti āha “sampattatā,
tika-abh02t0:1377_3: Pariññeyyādīni etapparamānevāti ito paraṃ neyyaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1378_4: Yathāvitakkitākārassa diṭṭhisaṅkhātāya dassanabhūtāya paññāya nijjhānakkhamanaṃ rocanaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti.
tika-abh02t0:1378_5: Ādicco viya pabhāya nirodhaṃ phusati sacchikaroti kilesandhakāraṃ viddhaṃseti.
tika-abh02t0:1379_2: Na yojetabbā siyāti yojanāyañca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo āpajjeyya,
tika-abh02t0:1379_3: saccānañca nānābhisamaye dukkhadassanādīhi paṭhamamaggādippaheyyānaṃ saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ ekadesappahānaṃ āpajjati.
tika-abh02t0:1379_5: tadanantarañca pattabbena phalena ekadesasotāpannatā ca āpajjati,
tika-abh02t0:1379_10: na maggo sayameva attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti aparipuṇṇo saccābhisamayo siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1379_11: Aññena maggena maggo ālambīyatīti paripuṇṇovāti ce?
tika-abh02t0:1379_12: Evaṃ sati yena maggena maggo ālambito,
tika-abh02t0:1379_17: Kiñca paricchinditabbaṃ samucchinditabbañca ālambitvā paricchedasamucchedabhāvanā maggañāṇassa na yuttā tato anissaṭabhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1379_19: Ahetukadiṭṭhi akiriyadiṭṭhiggahaṇena gahitā hetubyāpārova paramatthato kiriyāti katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1382_0: Kālo sutte jāgarati, kālo hi duratikkamo”ti. –
tika-abh02t0:1383_6: na ettha kassaci kāmakāro”ti evaṃvādā sabhāvavādino.
tika-abh02t0:1383_8: na ettha kassaci purisakāro”ti evaṃpavattavādā niyativādino, –
tika-abh02t0:1386_0: Evaṃpavattavādā yadicchāvādisaṅkhātā adhiccasamuppattivādino ca ettha sabhāvavāde eva antogadhāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1386_3: Kaṇādavādo pana issaricchāvasena aṇūnaṃ saṃyogaviyogato lokassa pavattinivattiṃ vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1386_7: pakati aññā”ti evaṃ pavattapakatipurisantarajānanena attasukhadukkhamohesu avibhāgaggahaṇe nivattite kira vuttanayena padhānaṃ nappavattati,
tika-abh02t0:1387_3: Chandassa saddahanānukūlāpi chandanavasena pavatti hotīti saddhindriyasaddhābalehi saddhiṃ chandiddhipādo vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1387_4: Tādise kāle upekkhānimittānubrūhanena upakārā samādhissa samavāhitāvasena tādisakiccāva upekkhā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1389_3: na ariyasacca”nti iminā catukke ādipade saṅgaho.
tika-abh02t0:1389_26: maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati,
tika-abh02t0:1389_29: Itarasaccadvayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ tassa tassa pabhāvakaṭṭhena siyā samudayo,
tika-abh02t0:1389_30: na pana yassa pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena.
tika-abh02t0:1389_36: sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa sacchikiriyāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena neva nirodho,
tika-abh02t0:1389_40: na pana yassa sacchikiriyāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena.
tika-abh02t0:1389_44: sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa bhāvanāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena neva maggo,
tika-abh02t0:1389_47: na pana yassa bhāvanāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena.
tika-abh02t0:1390_1: Evaṃ itaresupīti kātabbāpi kiriyā kārakarahitā kevalaṃ attano paccayehi tāya pavattamānāya paccayasāmaggī kiriyaṃ karotīti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1391_13: Paṭippalīnā cāti pacchā pakatiyaṃ palayaṃ gatā vesammaṃ muñcitvā sattādisamabhāvena anto samoruddhā.
tika-abh02t0:1391_24: Cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo vācā pāṇi pādo pāyu upatthaṃ manoti ekādasindriyāni.
tika-abh02t0:1391_25: Pathavī āpo tejo vāyo ākāsanti pañca bhūtavisesā, tehi.
tika-abh02t0:1391_30: Tividhañhi te kāraṇaṃ vadanti upādānakāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ samavāyikāraṇanti.
tika-abh02t0:1391_34: Dvīsu aṇūsūti pathavībhūtesu vā āpotejovāyobhūtesu vā dvīsu paramāṇūsu.
tika-abh02t0:1391_37: idha bīraṇesu ghaṭo”tiādinā nayena hetuphalānaṃ sambandhabhūtena sattānaṃ idhabuddhivohārā jāyanti.
tika-abh02t0:1391_38: So govisāṇānaṃ viya avisuṃ sahasiddhānaṃ sambandho samavāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1391_39: Khāṇusenānaṃ viya pana visuṃsiddhānaṃ sambandho saṃyogo.
tika-abh02t0:1391_40: Tīsu aṇūsu tiaṇukaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ ekībhūtamiva sambandhanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1391_45: tadantogadhāni eva tāni kāraṇāni maññantīti āha “attano antogadhehi kāraṇehī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1391_46: Sati samavāye hetumhi phalaṃ samavetanti phale hetu siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1391_47: taṃ natthīti dassento āha “samavāyābhāvā phale hetu natthīti hetusuññaṃ phala”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1392_8: evaṃ samathavipassanāsamaññāpi āgamanato maggassa siyunti āha “āgamanavasena vutto”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1394_0: Ādāya ūhitvāti gahetvā viya takketvā vitakketvā.
tika-abh02t0:1394_2: Purimakālassa viya niddeso yathā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1395_3: Itīti iminā kamenāti ayamatthoti adhippāyenāha “itisaddena vijānanakkamaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1400_3: So hi visesanaṃ avacchedakabhāvato pacchimaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṭṭhaṃ viseseti.
tika-abh02t0:1401_1: so ca tabbibhāgānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha “saṅkhepo sāmañña”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1402_1: Aparatthāti bhummavacanaṃ sāmiatthe yathā “sabbattha pādaka”nti āha “sāmiatthepi hi aparatthasaddo sijjhatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1402_4: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ sāmivasena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ bhummavasena dassitanti dīpento “tesaṃ tesanti vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1403_13: Ekekeneva padenāti yathā dutiyanaye jātiādipadesu dvīhi dvīhi padehi paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇāyatanayonivibhāgena sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā jāti dassitā,
tika-abh02t0:1403_15: Idha panetesu ekekeneva padena avibhāgato sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā.
tika-abh02t0:1404_4: Tāni hi rūpabhave pañcavokāre upapattikkhaṇe uppajjanti.
tika-abh02t0:1404_8: Tattha vikalindriyassa sattannaṃ navannaṃ dasannaṃ punapi dasannaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1404_9: itarassa ekādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ vasena saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1407_16: Maraṇena sattā yathāladdhaattabhāvena viyujjantīti āha “sampattibhavakkhandhehi viyojetī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1409_1: Byasanassa hi āpādakehi āpādanaṃ āpādetabbaāpattiyā saheva sijjhatīti.
tika-abh02t0:1411_1: Sukhaṃ hinoti pavattati etenāti sukhakāraṇaṃ hitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1411_8: Tabbināsāti ñātibhogabyasanāni vuttānīti te vikārabhāvena paññāpetabbattā paṇṇattimattā.
tika-abh02t0:1411_11: anipphannā ca hotīti vuttaṃ “aparinipphannataṃ sandhāya anipphannānīti āhā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1411_18: Anipphannatā sabhāvadhammattepi kenaci na nipphādīyatīti katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1412_2: Anto attano nissayassa niddahanavasena vā jhānaṃ cintanaṃ antonijjhānaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1412_3: Satipi anusocanabhāve attano katākatakusalākusalavisayo manovilekhabhūto vippaṭisāro kukkuccaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1415_5: Sambhamaṃ vā abbhantaragataṃ tassa paccupaṭṭhāpeti pākaṭabhāvakaraṇenāti sambhamapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh02t0:1417_1: Pubbe vuttadukkhatoti “attano khandhaṃ muṭṭhīhi pothetī”tiādinā vuttadukkhato.
tika-abh02t0:1419_1: Kāyadukkhābhibhūtassa patikārābhilāsāya tādisadukkhāvahapayogakālādīsu kāyikadukkhassa tadupanissayatā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1421_0: 198. Dukkhaṭṭhānanisajjādīni dukkhaṭṭhānādīni. Domanassassa vatthu hoti upāyāsoti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1424_3: Āgatehi ca tehi saṅkhārehi puggalassa saṃyogo hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1427_3: saddo karaṇatthe paccattanti yenapīti attho vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1427_6: tadā “na labhatī”ti ettha alābhapadhānābhāvato icchā visesīyatīti āha “alābhavisiṭṭhā icchā vuttā hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1427_7: “Icchaṃ na labhati ya”nti evaṃ kiriyāparāmasanabhūto yaṃ-
tika-abh02t0:1427_10: padhānabhūto alābhoti āha “tadā icchāvisiṭṭho alābho vutto hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1431_0: 202. Tādisassa vatthuno sabbhāvāti sāmaññato anavasesaggahaṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh02t0:1432_0: Atipākaṭena ati viya pakāsena dukkhenāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1435_7: saddena vuccatīti kiriyāvācakassa karaṇasaddassa adassanaṃ appayogo.
tika-abh02t0:1435_10: tadabhāve adāyikāti vuttāti āha “adāyikāpi punabbhavaṃ deticcevā”ti taṃsabhāvānativattanato.
tika-abh02t0:1435_16: Pavattivipākadāyino kammassa sahāyabhūtā taṇhā “upadhivepakkā”ti adhippetāti āha “upadhimhi yathānibbatte”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1435_19: Rañjanaṃ vatthassa viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1436_8: Ettha uppajjatīti samudāyāvayavehi viya sāmaññavisesehi na nānattavohāro na hoti yathā “rukkho siṃsapā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1436_10: Tasmā kiriyābhedasabbhāvato “sayānā bhuñjanti sadhanā”tiādīsu viya “uppajjamānā”ti ettha kiriyāya lakkhaṇatā,
tika-abh02t0:1436_12: Yadi uppajjamānā hotīti anicchitattā sāsaṅkaṃ uppādakiriyāya atthibhāvamāha.
tika-abh02t0:1436_13: Tena uppāde satīti ayametassa atthoti “uppajjamānā”ti ettha uppādo hetubhāvena vutto,
tika-abh02t0:1436_14: itaro ca tassa phalabhāvenāti āha “so hi tena upayojito viya hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1436_15: Uppajjamānāti vā taṇhāya tattha uppajjanasīlatā uppajjanasabhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1436_17: Tattheva cassā uppajjanasīlatā sakkāyato aññasmiṃ visaye pavattiyā abhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1436_21: Nivisamānā nivisatīti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabboti.
tika-abh02t0:1439_1: Taṇhāya virajjanaṃ haliddirāgassa viya palujjananti katvā āha “khayagamanavasenā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1440_0: Tadappavatti viyāti tassā tittaalābuvalliyā appavatti viya.
tika-abh02t0:1440_1: Appavattihetubhūtampi nibbānaṃ taṇhāya appavatti viya gayhatīti āha “tadappavatti viyā”ti yathā “rāgakkhayo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1440_4: Nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāyapi taṇhāya piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhāti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1440_7: tasmā “purimā vā upamā”tiādinā upamādvayaṃ ubhayattha yathākkamaṃ yojitaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1444_0: Tabbipakkhaviratisabhāvāti tassā sammāvācāya vipakkhato micchāvācāya viratisabhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1444_2: sabbāpi vā micchāvācā visaṃvādanādivasena bhedakarīti āha “bhedakaramicchāvācāpahānenā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1444_3: Visaṃvādanādikiccatāya hi lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ musāvādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā siniddhabhāvena pariggāhakasabhāvā
tika-abh02t0:1444_12: Sampayuttadhamme ca samuṭṭhāpentoti ettha samuṭṭhāpanaṃ micchākammantapaṭipakkhabhūtassa attano kiccassa anuguṇabhāvena sampayuttānaṃ pavattanameva,
tika-abh02t0:1444_13: ukkhipanaṃ vā nesaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-abh02t0:1445_3: Etasmiṃ pakkhe catumaggasammādiṭṭhiyā saṅgaho kato hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1445_4: Uparimaggasammādiṭṭhiyā pana diṭṭhiṭṭhāne taṃtaṃmaggavajjho māno gahetabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1445_7: Teneva hi aṅgenāti teneva sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena maggaṅgena.
tika-abh02t0:1446_2: viratiyā eva pana tadā padhānabhāvoti āha “viramaṇakāle vā viratiyo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1446_7: Tameva cetanāya amaggasabhāvataṃ dassetuṃ “ekassa ñāṇassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1446_8: Tattha sammāvācādikiccattayaṃ nāma micchāvācādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ samucchindanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1446_9: maggacetanā ca taṃsabhāvā na hotīti na tassā maggakkhaṇe sammāvācādibhāvasiddhi.
tika-abh02t0:1446_13: Evaṃ sante yathā tattha ekassa sammāsaṅkappassa tikiccatā,
tika-abh02t0:1446_15: evaṃ ekā maggacetanā sammāvācādikiccattayassa sādhikā bhaveyya,
tika-abh02t0:1446_16: tathā ca sati magge sammāvācādīni tīṇi aṅgāni na bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1446_17: chaḷaṅgiko ca ariyamaggo siyāti tayidamāha “ekāya cetanāyā”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1446_19: tasmā maggapaccayatāvacanato ca na cetanāya maggabhāvoti maggakkhaṇe viratiyova sammāvācādayo.
tika-abh02t0:1448_2: upakārako evā”ti iminā vacībhedataṃ samuṭṭhāpakacetanānaṃ viya viratiyāpi visesapaccayo vitakkoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1448_5: Tattha yathā visaṃvādanādimicchāvācato avirato micchākammantatopi na viramateva. Yathāha –
tika-abh02t0:1448_8: Tathā avisaṃvādanādinā sammāvācāya ṭhito sammākammantampi pūretiyevāti āha “vacībheda…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1448_10: Dhammānaṃ pavattiniṭṭhābhāvato yathā gatīti nibbatti vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:1450_1: atthaparipucchanaṃ paripucchāti tadubhayaṃ savanādhīnanti āha “savanañāṇe eva avarodhaṃ gacchantī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1454_0: Maggabhāvena catubbidhampi ekattenāti sotāpattimaggādivasena catubbidhampi maggabhāvena ekattena sāmaññato
tika-abh02t0:1454_3: tathā asadisatā ca ekaccasadisatā ca jhānaṅgavasena sabbasadisasabbāsadisaekaccasadisatā,
tika-abh02t0:1454_8: nivattanatoti paṭhamattheravādaṃ vadanto tadajjhāsayaṃ purakkhatvā vadatīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1454_10: Pādakajjhānaniyāmanti pādakajjhānaniyāmaṃ dhuraṃ katvā āhāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1454_13: Na hi tassā idha paṭikkhepatā atthi.
tika-abh02t0:1454_14: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “keci vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyāmetīti vadantī”ti?
tika-abh02t0:1454_16: Idhāpīti idha pādakajjhānaniyāmepi vipassanāniyāmo na paṭikkhittoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh02t0:1454_19: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vipassanāniyāmo visuṃ gahitoti?
tika-abh02t0:1455_1: na lokiya”nti idaṃ theravāde āgataṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapitanti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ saṅgahetvā
tika-abh02t0:1455_12: Aññajhānikāpīti tikacatukkajjhānato aññajhānikāpi catukkajjhānikāpi maggā uppajjanti. Pi-
tika-abh02t0:1455_14: Yadi evaṃ catuvokārabhavepi pañcavokārabhave viya maggassa tikacatukkajjhānikabhāve kenassa jhānaṅgādiniyāmoti
tika-abh02t0:1455_16: Pubbābhisaṅkhārasamāpattīti ca pādakabhūtā attanā atikkantadhammavirāgabhāvena vipassanāya pubbābhisaṅkhārakārī arūpasamāpatti,
tika-abh02t0:1455_19: Na sammasitabbāti na sammasitabbā samāpatti jhānaṅgādiniyāmikā sammasitabbānaṃ tikacatukkajjhānānaṃ tattha anuppajjanato,
tika-abh02t0:1456_1: Taṃtaṃkusalārammaṇārammaṇattāti kāmāvacarādīsu yena yena kusalena saddhiṃ nekkhammasaṅkappādayo uppajjanti,
tika-abh02t0:1456_2: tassa tassa kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti taṃtaṃkusalārammaṇārammaṇā,
tika-abh02t0:1456_6: “Aṅgāna”nti idaṃ “nekkhammasaṅkappādīna”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ avayavena vinā samudāyābhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1456_8: aparisuddhasīlassa vā sammappadhānāsambhavato samādhānassa viya vāyāmassa sīlaṃ visesapaccayo.
tika-abh02t0:1457_3: nīvaraṇajeṭṭhakassa kāmacchandassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato samādhissa alobhasādhanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1461_2: nanu taṇhāyapi cakkhādīnaṃ viya taṇhāvatthutāvacanena pariññeyyatā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1461_9: Tathā hi tesaṃ sabbaso accantappahāyikā dassanabhāvanāti?
tika-abh02t0:1461_11: tathāpi yathā “dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyya”nti taṇhāvajje upādānakkhandhapañcake pariññeyyabhāvo niruḷho,
tika-abh02t0:1461_13: taṇhāya pana “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā”tiādinā samudayabhāvo viya sātisayaṃ pahātabbabhāvo niruḷhoti dassetuṃ
tika-abh02t0:1461_20: “Nippadesato samudayaṃ dassetu”nti samudayassevettha gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “dukkhanirodhā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1461_25: “Avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā desanābhedo eva hi tattha viseso.
tika-abh02t0:1461_27: Apubbo natthīti dhammato apubbo natthīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1461_34: pañcasu pana koṭṭhāsesu uparūpari apubbaṃ dassitanti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1461_39: paṭhamakoṭṭhāsepi vā kasmā taṇhā gahitāti āha “apubbasamudayadassanatthāyapi hī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1461_41: Desanāvasena na vuttoti na dhammavasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1461_42: Tasmā dukkhādīni tattha ariyasaccadesanāyaṃ sappadesāni dassitāni honti pariyāyenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1461_43: Abhidhammadesanā pana nippariyāyakathāti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nippadesato samudayaṃ dassetuṃ”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1462_7: na nippariyāyato tadabhāvatoti āha “na hi kusalā pahātabbā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1463_0: Kāyakammādisuddhiyāti pubbabhāgakāyakammavacīkammaājīvasuddhiyā dūratarūpanissayataṃ ariyamaggassa dassetīti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1464_0: Jhānehi desanāpaveso “lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī”ti jhānasīsena desanāva.
tika-abh02t0:1467_2: Evaṃ panāti “apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā”tiādippakārena.
tika-abh02t0:1472_3: Te hi “taṃ dvāraṃ pavattiokāsabhūtaṃ etesaṃ atthī”ti taṃdvārikā.
tika-abh02t0:1472_4: Nanu ca tabbatthukehipi taṃ indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti.
tika-abh02t0:1472_10: Atha vā taṃdvārikesu tassa indaṭṭho pākaṭoti “taṃdvārikehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1473_6: kasmā pana suttante khandhādayo viya indriyāni ekajjhaṃ na vuttāni,
tika-abh02t0:1474_0: Khīṇāsavassa bhāvabhūtoti chaḷaṅgupekkhā viya khīṇāsavasseva dhammabhūto.
tika-abh02t0:1476_3: na ekaccasomanassindriyādīnaṃ viya parikappavasenāti dassento “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1477_2: na ca tattha manindriyaṃ vatvā itthipurisindriyāni vuttāni.
tika-abh02t0:1477_3: Idha pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ indriyānukkamo vutto sabbākārena yamakadesanāya saṃsandatīti dassento āha “so indriyayamakadesanāya sametī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1477_6: Tesaṃ majjhe vuttaṃ ubhayesaṃ upakārakatādīpanatthanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1477_7: Tena evampi desanantarānurodhena jīvitindriyassa anukkamaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1477_9: parato pana kiccavinicchaye idha pāḷiyaṃ āgataniyāmeneva manindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyassa,
tika-abh02t0:1477_14: Rūpārūpavasena duvidhampi hi jīvitindriyaṃ idha gahitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1477_15: “Pavattī”ti etena sahajātadhammānaṃ pavattanarasena jīvitindriyena vedayitānaṃ pavattetabbataṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh02t0:1478_2: Evaṃ sāmatthiyato kiccavisesaṃ vavatthapetvā pakaraṇatopi taṃ dasseti “indriyakathāya ca pavattattā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1478_6: yathā manindriyassa pubbaṅgamasabhāvābhāvato sayañca te aññadatthu manindriyasseva vase vattanti.
tika-abh02t0:1478_12: Sabbatthāti vasavattāpanaṃ sahajātadhammānupālananti evaṃ yāva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca sampayuttānanti taṃkiccaniddese.
tika-abh02t0:1478_14: anupatthambhe ca satī”ti padaṃ āharitvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1478_15: Na hi padattho sabbhāvaṃ byabhicaratīti janakupatthambhakattābhāvepīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1478_33: Saṃyojanasamucchindanatadupanissayatā eva sandhāya aññātāvindriyassa kiccantarāpasutatā vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1478_35: Abyāpībhāvato vā aññātāvindriyassa paṭippassaddhippahānakiccaṃ na vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1478_37: Maggānantarañhi phalaṃ “tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”tiādivacanato kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena pavattati,
tika-abh02t0:1478_40: Itarassa pana nicchandarāgesu sattavohāro viya ruḷhivasena paṭippassaddhikiccatā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1479_5: Tayidaṃ ādhipaccaṃ attano kicce balavanti aññesampi sabhāvadhammānaṃ labbhateva.
tika-abh02t0:1479_11: Svāyaṃ viseso “cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi cakkhādīnaṃ siddhamādhipacca”ntiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitoyeva.
tika-abh02t0:1480_1: tassā visesanissayo cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānīti tāni tāva ādhipaccatthaṃ upādāya “cakkhundriyaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1480_4: ayaṃ so dhammo tesaṃ ṭhitihetūti dassanatthaṃ jīvitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1480_7: Svāyaṃ sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ vedanāpañcakaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1480_11: niṭṭhitakiccā ca hontīti dassanatthaṃ ante anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni tīṇi vuttāni.
tika-abh02t0:1481_0: Atha vā pavattinivattīnaṃ nissayādidassanatthampi etāni eva vuttāni.
tika-abh02t0:1481_1: Pavattiyā hi visesato mūlanissayabhūtāni cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni.
tika-abh02t0:1481_17: Evaṃ pavattiyā nissayasamuppādaṭṭhitisambhogadassanatthaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ yāva upekkhindriyanti cuddasindriyāni desitāni.
tika-abh02t0:1481_20: Vivaṭṭasannissitena hi nibbattitāni saddhādīni pañca indriyāni nivattiyā nissayo.
tika-abh02t0:1482_12: Avijjamānasaṅgāhakattanti tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ anupalabbhamānassa indriyassa saṅgāhakatā.
tika-abh02t0:1485_0: Idha imasmiṃ “sattindriyā anārammaṇā”ti evaṃ ekantānārammaṇatte vuccamāne na ābhaṭṭhaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ na bhāsitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1485_1: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana anābhaṭṭhanti katasamāsaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1485_5: Yasmā pana rūpārūpamissakasseva vasena siyāpakkhasaṅgaho yutto,
tika-abh02t0:1485_10: Kathaṃ pana rūpakoṭṭhāsenassānārammaṇassa navattabbatāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na hi anārammaṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1485_17: siyā na vattabbā ‘parittārammaṇā’tipi ‘mahaggatārammaṇā’tipi ‘appamāṇārammaṇā’tipī”tiādīsu viya na sārammaṇasseva navattabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1485_20: Evaṃ navattabbaṃ sārammaṇamevāti ayampi niyamo natthīti dassento “navattabbassa vā sārammaṇata”nti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1486_1: na parittārammaṇādibhāvenāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “athāpī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1486_3: Siyā anārammaṇantipi vattabbaṃ siyāti anārammaṇaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ sārammaṇehi visuṃ katvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1486_7: avacane ca aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti dassento āha “na hi pañhapucchake sāvasesā desanā atthī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1486_10: Yāpi “aṭṭhindriyā siyā ajjhattārammaṇā”ti ajjhattārammaṇādibhāvena navattabbatā vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1486_11: sā jīvitindriyassa ākiñcaññāyatanakāle paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvamattārammaṇataṃ sandhāya vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1486_13: nāpi anārammaṇassa parittārammaṇādibhāvena navattabbatābhāvadassanatthanti dassento “aṭṭhindriyā siyā ajjhattārammaṇāti ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1492_4: Na hi moggaliputtatissattherena vuttattā buddhasāvakā vibhajjavādino ahesunti?
tika-abh02t0:1492_11: mahārājā”ti tadā vuttavacanena ñāyati “sammāsambuddhasāvakā vibhajjavādino”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti kiṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1492_14: vinayāya dhammaṃ desemi rāgassā”tiādiṃ vatvā “no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī”tiādinā verañjabrāhmaṇassa
tika-abh02t0:1492_15: bhagavatā venayikādibhāvo vibhajja vuttoti taṃ anuvadantā sāvakāpi tathā vadantīti āha “te hi venayikādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1492_20: Vibhajjavādiparisā vibhajjavādimaṇḍalanti etasmiṃ atthe yathā taṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1492_24: yāya nivutā khīṇāsavāpi nāmagottādīsu ekaccaṃ na jānanti,
tika-abh02t0:1492_26: Taṃ sandhāyāha “avijjā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ hetupaccayo hotītiādiṃ vadanto”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1492_36: Tesu purimaṃ “ācariye anabbhācikkhantenā”ti iminā apanītanti itaraṃ dasseti “parasamayaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1492_39: saddo pana upacayattho na hotīti kecivādo na sārato gahetabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1493_2: āloḷento vā dhammataṃ dhammasabhāvaṃ vilometi viparītato dahati.
tika-abh02t0:1493_4: buddhādayo mahante mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇāni.
tika-abh02t0:1493_11: Atthato cāyaṃ mahāpadeso “sammukhā metaṃ bhagavato suta”ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa “dhammo”ti vā “adhammo”ti vā vinicchayane kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1493_18: Evaṃ “amumhā mayā ayaṃ dhammo paṭiggahito”ti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro.
tika-abh02t0:1494_0: Suttasuttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatimahāpadeseti ettha tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni tīṇi piṭakāni atthasūcanādiatthena suttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1494_1: Yathāvuttassa suttassa anulomato yathāvuttā eva cattāro mahāpadesā suttānulomaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1494_2: Pāḷiyā atthagāhaṇena dhammatāyaṃ patiṭṭhāpanato aṭṭhakathā ācariyavādo.
tika-abh02t0:1494_4: Ettha ca suttaācariyavādaattanomatīnampi kenaci ābhatassa dhammādhammādibhāvavinicchayane kāraṇabhāvasabhāvato mahāpadesatā vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1494_8: Ekassa padassa ekena pakārena atthaṃ vatvā tasseva puna pakārantarena atthaṃ vadanto vā aparehi pariyāyehi
tika-abh02t0:1494_9: niddisati nāma yathā “avijjā dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detī”tiādiṃ vatvā
tika-abh02t0:1494_10: puna “ayaṃ avijjā dukkhādīsu aññāṇa”nti vuttāpi “dukkhasaccassa ekadeso hotī”tiādivacanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1494_11: Atha vā hetubhāvena vuttassa atthassa puna phalabhāvena vacanaṃ tamevatthaṃ punarāvattetvā niddisanaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1494_12: yathā “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vatvā puna “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti vacanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1494_13: Atha vā “sabbametaṃ bhavacakkaṃ kammañceva vipāko ca.
tika-abh02t0:1494_14: Kilesakammavipākavasena tividha”nti ca ādinā vuttassevatthassa duvidhatividhādivibhāgadassanaṃ tamevatthaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1495_1: Ye hi dhamme samūhabhūte santānavasena vattamāne upādāya sattapaññatti,
tika-abh02t0:1495_2: tassā tato aññathānāññathāaccantābhāvasaṅkhāte ante anupagamma yāthāvato saṅgahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1495_4: Avijjādikassa paccayadhammassa saṅkhārādipaccayuppannadhammaṃ pati hetuādinā paccayena paccayabhāvo paccayākāro,
tika-abh02t0:1496_1: Kāmañcettha sabbāpi atthavaṇṇanā imināva nayena kātabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1496_2: paṭiccasamuppādavaṇṇanāya pana garutarabhāvaṃ dassento evaṃ vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1498_3: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti vā attānaṃ atthikaṃ katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1499_2: kammassa visesahetubhāvato ca vaṭṭassa mūlakāraṇaṃ avijjā.
tika-abh02t0:1499_3: Vipākavaṭṭanimittassa kammavaṭṭassa kāraṇabhūtampi kilesavaṭṭaṃ avijjāmūlakanti dassanatthaṃ avijjā ādito vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1499_4: Taṇhāpi hi avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnave eva visaye assādānupassino pavattati,
tika-abh02t0:1499_6: Mūlādidassanasāmaññañcāti valliyā mūlamajjhapariyosānassa dassanena paṭiccasamuppādassa taṃdassanasāmaññañca yojetabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1499_7: samantacakkhunā sabbassa diṭṭhattepi desanākāle desanāñāṇacakkhunā bodhetabbatāvasena ekadesadassanassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1500_2: “Abhinandanato”ti hi iminā sappītikāya taṇhāya pavatti dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:1500_3: “Abhivadato”ti iminā tato balavatarāya diṭṭhisahitāya mānasahitāya vā.
tika-abh02t0:1500_4: “Ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato”ti iminā pana tatopi balavatamāya diṭṭhisahitāya,
tika-abh02t0:1500_8: Kathaṃ pana nandivacanena catubbidhampi upādānaṃ vuttanti āha “nanditā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1500_10: tāya nandiyā taṇhāya avippayogena avinābhāvena diṭṭhupādānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1502_4: Saṃvattatīti ca nimittassa kattūpacāravasenetaṃ vuttaṃ yathā “ariyabhāvakarāni saccāni ariyasaccānī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1502_5: Pakatiādayo heṭṭhā saccavibhaṅge hetuvippaṭipattikathāyaṃ dassitā eva.
tika-abh02t0:1502_7: Na kiñci kāraṇaṃ bujjhanti yathā taṃ aññe bālaputhujjanā.
tika-abh02t0:1502_8: Itarāsanti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā desanādīnaṃ tissannaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1502_11: Vuttāni hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jarāmaraṇādikassa dukkhassa attanā adhigatakāraṇasandassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1502_12: Āhāranidānavavatthāpanānusārena yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ atiharitvā puna atītaddhato pabhuti hetuphalapaṭipāṭisandassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1502_13: Anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhuti anāgataddhasandassanattha”nti tissannaṃ yathākkamaṃ tīṇi payojanāni.
tika-abh02t0:1503_5: tannimittānañca sesāhārānaṃ visesapaccayo hotīti āha “āhārataṇhādayo paccuppannaddhā”ti. Ādi-
tika-abh02t0:1503_7: Āhārataṇhādayoti ettha paccuppannakammavaṭṭapariyāpanne āhāre gahetvā addhayojanaṃ katvā anāgatavipākavaṭṭapariyāpanne
tika-abh02t0:1503_8: gahetvā yojetuṃ vuttaṃ “āhārā vā taṇhāya pabhāvetabbā anāgato addhā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1503_10: Yujjatīti phalabhūte āhāre paccuppanne paccakkhato dassetvā “taṃnidānaṃ taṇhaṃ tassā nidāna”ntiādinā
tika-abh02t0:1503_11: phalaparamparāya kāraṇaparamparāya ca dassanaṃ tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayānulomato,
tika-abh02t0:1503_14: taṇhāggahaṇeneva saṅkhārāvijjā gahitāti kimatthaṃ puna te gahitāti āha “saṅkhārāvijjā tatopi atītataro
tika-abh02t0:1503_16: Atītanti vā atītatāsāmaññena atītatarampi saṅgahitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1504_5: Tassa āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiāhārakā cattāro āhārāti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1504_9: Tasmāti yasmā āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiāhārakā cattāro āhārā gayhanti, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1504_12: Tato paranti tato atītaddhato paraṃ paccuppanne anāgate ca addhani “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”ntiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1504_14: Paccuppannaṃ hetunti etarahi vattamānaṃ taṇhādikaṃ āhārādīnaṃ hetuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1505_3: Akusalañhi kammaṃ kammavaṭṭassa kilesavaṭṭassa ca paccayo hotiyeva.
tika-abh02t0:1505_7: vuccatī”tiādinā vaṭṭasīsānampi avijjātaṇhānaṃ sappaccayatādassanāpadesena sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1506_0: Avijjaṃ taṇhā anuvattatīti dukkhe taṇhaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattiyā tato avijjāya balavabhāvamāha.
tika-abh02t0:1506_1: Avijjābhibhūtā hi sattā satipi taṇhāparitassite ekantānatthasaññitaṃ attakilamathānuyogadukkhamanuyuñjanti.
tika-abh02t0:1506_2: Taṇhaṃ avijjā anuvattatīti sukhe avijjaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattiyā tato taṇhāya balavabhāvamāha.
tika-abh02t0:1506_3: Yadipi sāvajjasukhānubhave balavatīyeva avijjā vijjamānaādīnavaṃ paṭicchādentī tiṭṭhati,
tika-abh02t0:1506_4: taṇhā pana tatopi balavataratāya satte vipulānatthasañhite anariye sukhe niyojetīti avijjāya tadanuvattanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1507_3: Cakkhādinissite eva katvāti cakkhādiggahaṇeneva gahite katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1507_5: Phassena phuṭṭhoti ārammaṇaṃ phusantena viya uppannena sukhavedaniyena,
tika-abh02t0:1507_7: Phasse hi tathā uppanne taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo phuṭṭhoti vohāro hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1508_1: evaṃ vedanāyapīti dassento “saḷāyatanānaṃ vedanāya visesapaccayabhāva”nti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1508_4: Kāyassa bhedā kāyūpagoti ubhayatthāpi kāyasaddena upādinnakkhandhapañcako gahito.
tika-abh02t0:1509_0: Anabhisamayabhūtattāti abhisamayassa paṭipakkhabhūtattā. Avijjāyāti avijjāya sati.
tika-abh02t0:1510_1: Tasmāti yasmā sati saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārattepi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā padhānatāya visuṃ vuttā gobalībaddañāyena, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1510_2: Tattha vuttampīti saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhāresu vuttampi abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāraṃ vajjetvā aggahetvā itare saṅkhārā yojetabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1510_3: Evañhi atthassa uddharaṇuddharitabbatādvayaṃ asaṅkarato dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1510_4: “Idha vaṇṇetabbabhāvenā”ti iminā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārānaṃ satipi saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārabhāve yathāvuttameva padhānabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti.
tika-abh02t0:1510_6: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe saṅgaṇhanavasena saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārehi saṅgahitāpi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā
tika-abh02t0:1510_10: Sāmaññato saṅgayhamānampi padhānabhāvajotanatthaṃ visuṃ gayhati yathā taṃ “puññañāṇasambhārā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1511_6: Cetanāpadhānattā pana tassa cetanākiccaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1511_8: āyūhananti ca rāsibhūtassa rūpārūpasaṅkhātassa phalassa nibbattanato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1511_9: “Anārammaṇatā abyākatatā”ti idaṃ abyākatasseva anārammaṇattā abyākatasambandhinī anārammaṇatāti katvā vuttaṃ. Āyatanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1513_0: Sokādīnaṃ sabbhāvāti “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti aniṭṭhāpetvā tadanantaraṃ sokādīnampi vuttānaṃ vijjamānattā
tika-abh02t0:1513_1: tesaṃ vasena aṅgabahuttappasaṅge paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ bahubhāve āpanne.
tika-abh02t0:1513_7: Mūlaṅgaṃ dassetunti imāya paṭiccasamuppādadesanāya mūlabhūtaṃ avijjaṅgaṃ socanādīhi sammohāpattikathanena
tika-abh02t0:1513_8: dassetuṃ te sokādayo vuttā bhavacakkassa avicchedadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1513_14: Tato parāyāti anāgate dutiyattabhāvato parāya tatiyattabhāvādīsu paṭisandhiyā.
tika-abh02t0:1513_18: Suttanti “assutavā puthujjano”ti imaṃ suttaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1513_19: Avijjā sokādīnaṃ kāraṇanti dassitā assutavatāya avijjābhibhavanadīpaniyā taduppattivacanato.
tika-abh02t0:1513_20: “Na sokādīnaṃ bālassa jarāmaraṇanimittatāmattassa sādhakaṃ sutta”nti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “na cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1513_21: Tena na ca jarāmaraṇanimittameva dukkhaṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1513_22: atha kho avijjānimittampettha vuttanayena yojetabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1513_23: Evaṃ jarāmaraṇena sokādīnaṃ ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvā dvādaseva paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh02t0:1514_0: Kasmā panettha jarāmaraṇantā eva desanā katā,
tika-abh02t0:1514_4: viññāṇādipariyosānabhūtāya ca cutiyā paṭisandhipātubhāvoti pavattitaduparamabhūtaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ punabbhavābhinibbattinimittaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1514_5: Taṃ pana kammūpapattibhavato jātiyā dassitattā “bhavapaccayā jātī”ti imināva pakāsitanti na puna vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:1514_9: asati pana tasmiṃ “esevanto dukkhassā”ti jarāmaraṇapariyosānāva desanā katā.
tika-abh02t0:1514_10: Yasmā pana na amaraṇā jarā atthi sabbesaṃ uppattimantānaṃ pākānantarabhedato,
tika-abh02t0:1514_13: na nāmarūpaṃ viya ubhayaṭṭhāne ekajjhaṃ uppattiyā,
tika-abh02t0:1514_15: Yā panāyaṃ osānaṃ gatā punabbhavābhinibbatti dīpitā,
tika-abh02t0:1514_17: kilesakammābhāve tadabhāvato “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti evamādi eva vā atthato pakāsito hotīti vaṭṭattayassa
tika-abh02t0:1514_19: Atha vā jarāgahaṇena paripakkaparipakkatarādikkamena vattamānaṃ nāmarūpādi,
tika-abh02t0:1515_2: kumāro vuddhimanvāya indriyānaṃ paripākamanvāya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti cakkhuviññeyyehi rūpehi…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1515_5: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe sārajjati,
tika-abh02t0:1515_9: yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1516_0: Ettha hi paripakkindriyassa chasu dvāresu sarāgādiggahaṇena tadavinābhāvitāya vimuttiyā appajānane ca sokādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā avijjā pakāsitā.
tika-abh02t0:1516_5: “assutavā”tiādivacanato avijjāsavato sokādīnaṃ pavatti dīpitāti tesaṃ hetutāya taggahaṇena gahitā āsavā.
tika-abh02t0:1516_7: tato ca “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato āsavanimittāya ca avijjāya jarāgahaṇena gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1516_9: Apica “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vatvā “bhavapaccayā jātī”ti vadantenapi bhavacakkassa anavaṭṭhānato paribbhamanaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1516_10: Ettha hi viññāṇena avijjānivutassa punabbhavo dassito,
tika-abh02t0:1516_12: ubhayattha ubhinnaṃ anuvattamānattāti avijjātaṇhānimittaṃ bhavacakkaṃ anavaṭṭhānato paribbhamatīti ayamattho
tika-abh02t0:1516_13: dīpitoti jarāmaraṇantāpi desanā na tato paraṃ pavattiyā abhāvaṃ sūceti atadatthattā,
tika-abh02t0:1516_14: na ca paccayantaradassanatthameva puna vacananti sakkā viññātuṃ ekatreva tadubhayadesanāya tassa siddhattā.
tika-abh02t0:1516_20: Yathā hi taṇhāpaccayā kāmupādānahetukaṃ kammabhavasaṅkhāraṃ vadanto na vinā bhavataṇhāya avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1516_21: Tathā tameva avijjāpaccayaṃ desento na antarena avijjāya bhavataṇhā kammabhavassa paccayoti.
tika-abh02t0:1516_22: Tato ca pubbe pavattā avijjādipaccayā saṅkhārādayo,
tika-abh02t0:1516_29: viññāṇādipaccayānāmarūpādīti evametesaṃ aṅgānaṃ pubbāparasambandho dassito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1519_1: Pitā kathīyatīti asuko asukassa pitāti pitubhāvena kathīyati.
tika-abh02t0:1519_2: Kathiyamāno ca asandehatthaṃ aññehi mittadattehi visesetvā kathīyatīti taṃ dassento āha “dīgho…pe… datto”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1520_0: Yāthāvoti aviparīto. Kiccajātitoti paṭicchādanakiccato, uppajjanaṭṭhānato ca.
tika-abh02t0:1522_1: Tathā pavattanahetu taṃsampayuttā avijjāsampayuttā dukkhārammaṇā honti.
tika-abh02t0:1523_0: Tasmāti sabhāvato agambhīrattā tesaṃ duddasabhāvakaraṇī tadārammaṇatā avijjā uppajjati.
tika-abh02t0:1523_2: Samānepi paṇītaasaṃkilesikādibhāve sappaccayato appaccayassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ “maggassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1526_3: “Apuññaphalato”ti vā iminā puññassa āyatiṃ hitataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1527_0: “Evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu puññaphalampi puññanti vuccatīti āha “puññupaganti bhavasampattupaga”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1529_3: Dānaṃ ārabbhāti tehi nibbattiyamānaṃ pariccāgaṃ uddissa.
tika-abh02t0:1529_7: Yathā vā sampayuttehi nibbattiyamānā dānakiriyā nipphattivasena adhikataṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh02t0:1531_0: “Vacanavisesamattamevā”ti atthavisesābhāvo vuttoti atthavisesābhāvamāha “kāyadvāre pavatti eva hi ādānādipāpanā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1532_3: Sahajātassa pana anantarassa ca paccayo hotiyeva.
tika-abh02t0:1532_4: “Kusalā vipākadhammā cā”ti idaṃ sekkhaputhujjanasantāne abhiññācetanā idhādhippetā,
tika-abh02t0:1532_6: Tena yathāvuttaabhiññācetanāpi paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayo siyā kusalasabhāvattā,
tika-abh02t0:1532_12: Na hi tassā vipākuppādanaṃ atthīti āha “na vipākuppādanena kusalatā vipākadhammatā cā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1532_13: Kevalañhi yā aññesaṃ vipākadhammānaṃ sabyāpārā saussāhā pavatti,
tika-abh02t0:1532_18: Asambhavatoti taṃ asambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “sā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1532_21: Tattha aññabhūmikassa tāva uppādanaṃ ayuttaṃ paccayābhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1532_24: Sabhūmikaṃ navattabbārammaṇaṃ vā uppādeyya parittādiārammaṇaṃ vā,
tika-abh02t0:1532_26: parittādiārammaṇattā ca abhiññācetanāya navattabbārammaṇaṃ na uppādeyya.
tika-abh02t0:1532_27: Tathā ekantanavattabbārammaṇattā rūpāvacaravipākassa parittādiārammaṇañca na uppādeyyāti ayamasambhavo.
tika-abh02t0:1532_30: “Pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇa”ntiādinā kusalena abhinnaṃ katvā vipākassa ārammaṇaṃ desitanti āha “cittuppādakaṇḍe…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1532_32: “Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānāni kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca catutthassa jhānassa vipāko ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1532_34: vacanato rūpāvacaravipāko ekantanavattabbārammaṇoti āha “na ca rūpāvacaravipāko parittādiārammaṇo atthī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1532_37: Navattabbārammaṇāpi hi sā atthīti na byāpīti vipākānuppādane tassā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “kasiṇesu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1532_39: Tassa tassa adhiṭṭhānavikubbanadibbasaddasavanādikassa yadicchitassa kiccassa nipphādanamattaṃ pana abhiññācetanā,
tika-abh02t0:1533_0: Keci pana “samānabhūmikato āsevanalābhena balavantāni jhānānīti tāni vipākaṃ denti samāpattibhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1533_1: abhiññā pana satipi jhānabhāve tadabhāvato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āgantukāvāti dubbalā,
tika-abh02t0:1533_3: Taṃ akāraṇaṃ punappunaṃ parikammavasena abhiññāyapi vasībhāvasabbhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1533_4: Yaṃ pana vadanti “pādakajjhāne attanā samānasabhāvehi javanehi laddhāsevane sammadeva vasībhāvappatte
tika-abh02t0:1533_6: tāsañca catutthajjhānikattā catutthajjhānabhūmiko eva vipāko nibbatteyya,
tika-abh02t0:1533_7: so ca yathāvuttaguṇena balavatā pādakajjhāneneva katokāsena sijjhatīti anokāsatāya abhiññā na vipākaṃ detī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1533_9: Sati hi vipākadāyibhāve vipākassa anokāsacodanā yuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1534_0: Na hotīti viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1534_1: Uddhaccacetanāpi abhiññācetanāto nibbisesena vuttāti maññamāno “vipāke”ti ca vacanaṃ na vipākārahatāmattavācako,
tika-abh02t0:1534_3: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “na hi ‘vipāke’ti vacanaṃ vipākadhammavacanaṃ viya vipākārahataṃ vadatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1534_9: tasmā tassā pavattivipākassa vasena vibhaṅge vipāko uddhaṭo.
tika-abh02t0:1534_10: Ubhayavipākadāyikāya pana cetanāya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayo vuccatīti tadabhāvato paṭṭhāne tassā so na vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1534_11: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “viññāṇassa paccayabhāve apanetabbā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1534_13: “Evaṃ uddhaccacetanāpi na hotī”ti idampi viññāṇassa paccayatābhāvamattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1534_14: Evañhettha aññamaññaṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca avirodho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1535_3: sekkhasantāne bhāvanāya pahātabbā”ti imassa atthassa vuttattā “puthujjanānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1535_4: “Na vuccantī”ti iminā puthujjane pavattabahiddhāsaṃyojanādīnaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbapariyāyābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1535_5: “Yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā tamevatthaṃ yuttito ca āgamato ca vibhāveti.
tika-abh02t0:1536_2: Evañca katvāti yathāvuttapāḷiyaṃ uddhaccaggahaṇena uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo gahito,
tika-abh02t0:1536_3: na yattha katthaci uddhaccanti evamatthe sati.
tika-abh02t0:1536_8: pahātabbā pana na uppajjanārahāti tesaṃ atītādibhāvena navattabbatā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1536_11: Vipākaṃ na janayantīti sakalakilesaparikkhaye viya ekaccaparikkhayepi tannimittaṃ taṃ ekaccaṃ kammaṃ na vipaccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1536_12: Vipāko vibhaṅge vuttoti paṭisandhipavattibhedaṃ duvidhampi vipākaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh02t0:1537_4: Tena yadipi tesaṃ akusalānaṃ imasmiṃ tike tatiyapadasaṅgaho na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1537_6: Sabbena sabbaṃ dhammavasena asaṅgahitassa tikadukesu navattabbatāpattīti āha “nāpajjatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1537_12: Yathāvuttapadesu viyāti yathāvuttesu paṭhamādīsu tīsu padesu.
tika-abh02t0:1537_14: itare ca yathārahaṃ rāsittayavasena bhinditvā bhajāpitā taṃtaṃkoṭṭhāsato katā, evaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1538_2: apekkhitabbabhāvenārahitāpi taṃsabhāvānativattanato tathā vuccantīti navattabbatāpattidosaṃ pariharanto
tika-abh02t0:1538_3: tassa udāharaṇaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “atha vā yathā sappaṭighehī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1538_6: Bhāvanāya pahātabbānanti pariyāyena nippariyāyena ca bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1538_8: pacchimānaṃ avipākattā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayatā na vuttāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1538_9: Yathā ca bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1538_10: evaṃ dassanena pahātabbānaṃ vasena tesaṃ paccayalābhopi natthīti dassento “na ca…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1538_13: Tattha na te dassanato uddhaṃ pavattantīti ye dassanena pahātabbapaccayā kilesā,
tika-abh02t0:1538_14: te dassanena pahātabbapakkhikā evāti tesaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbapariyāyo eva natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1538_15: kathaṃ tesaṃ vasena dassanena pahātabbā bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayoti vucceyyāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1538_16: Atha vā ye puthujjanasantāne na dassanena pahātabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1538_19: na tesaṃ paccayabhūtā dassanena pahātabbā atthīti evampi dassanena pahātabbā bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayoti na vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1538_21: tappaccayaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ siyāti kathaṃ tassa ekantabhāvanāya pahātabbatā vuttāti
tika-abh02t0:1538_23: Tasmāti yasmā sarāgavītarāgasantānesu sahāyavekallena kammassa vipākāvipākadhammatā viya puthujjanasekkhasantānesu
tika-abh02t0:1539_0: Ettha ca yaṃ “na bhāvanāya pahātabbampi atthi uddhaccasahagata”ntiādi amataggapathe vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1539_5: Yadi hi uddhaccasahagataṃ na bhāvanāya pahātabbampi abhavissa,
tika-abh02t0:1539_6: yathā atītārammaṇattike “niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthī”ti vatvā “kāmāvacarakusalassa vipākato dasa cittuppādā”tiādinā puna vibhajitvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1539_8: Niyogā bhāvanāya pahātabbā natthī”ti vatvā “uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbo,
tika-abh02t0:1539_9: siyā na vattabbo ‘dassanena pahātabbo’tipi ‘bhāvanāya pahātabbo’tipī”tiādi vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1539_11: Yā ca tamatthaṃ paṭipādentena “yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā yutti vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1539_13: Dassanena pahātabbārammaṇānaṃ rāgadiṭṭhivicikicchuddhaccānaṃ dassanena pahātabbabhāvasseva icchitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1540_0: Yañca “uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo vuttoti dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayaniddese uddhaccassa anuddharaṇaṃ kāraṇabhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1540_3: anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅge cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1540_4: katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassā”ti imassa vibhaṅge labbhamānampi cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1541_0: Sahāyabhāvo ca dassanena pahātabbānaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbassa vipākadānaṃ pati vicāretabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1541_1: Kiṃ avijjādi viya dānādīnaṃ uppattiyā eva vikuppādanasamatthatāpādanena dassanena pahātabbā bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ sahakārikāraṇaṃ honti,
tika-abh02t0:1541_2: udāhu kileso viya kammassa paṭisandhidāne satīti,
tika-abh02t0:1541_6: sahāyavekallena avipākasabhāvatāya āpāditattā khīṇataṇhāvijjāmāne santāne dānādi viya.
tika-abh02t0:1541_12: tasmā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca avirujjhanavasenettha atthavinicchayo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1542_2: Kāraṇaṃ dassentoti avikalaphaluppādanādhikāre tadabhāvato yadipi uddhaccacetanā viññāṇassa paccayabhāve apanetabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1542_3: avijjāya pana paccayuppannabhāve gahetabbāti imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento.
tika-abh02t0:1542_6: Tanti yena kāraṇena saṅkhāraggahaṇena abhiññācetanāya aggahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1543_5: taṃ hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ vipallāsassādanānaṃ avijjāya hetubhāvadassanato.
tika-abh02t0:1543_6: “Ratho setaparikkhāro”tiādīsu parivāratthopi parikkhārasaddo hotīti vuttaṃ “taṇhāya parivāre”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1543_7: Taṇhāparivāreti ca taṇhāya kiccasādhanena saṅkhārānaṃ sahakārikāraṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1543_8: Parikkhāraṭṭho saṅkhāraṭṭho viya bhūsanaṭṭho hotīti dassento “saṅkhate alaṅkate”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1543_16: Amaṅgalampi maṅgalapariyāyena voharanti maṅgalikāti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhe adiṭṭhasaddo viyā”ti yathā “asive sivā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1544_2: Taṃ puññaphalaṃ attho payojanaṃ etassāti tadattho.
tika-abh02t0:1545_6: Sabhayassāpi pisācanagarassa kāmaguṇasamiddhiyā sukhavipallāsahetubhāvo viyāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1546_1: tāva idaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī”tiādīsu yadipi parimāṇaniyamanakamapadapūraṇamattādīsupi tāva-
tika-abh02t0:1546_3: idha pana vakkhamānattāpekkho adhippetoti vuttaṃ “tāvāti vattabbantarāpekkho nipāto”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1547_1: “Rāgadiṭṭhisampayuttāyā”ti ettha rāgasampayuttāya tāva avijjāya yojanā hotu rāgassa assādanabhāvato,
tika-abh02t0:1547_2: diṭṭhisampayuttāya pana kathanti āha “tadavippayuttā ca diṭṭhī…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1547_8: Anavijjārammaṇassāti na avijjārammaṇassa avijjaṃ anārabbha pavattassa.
tika-abh02t0:1547_14: asahajātassa upanissayādinā saṅkhārassa avijjā paccayo hotīti ayamattho “yaṃ kiñcī”tiādinā dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1547_16: avijjāsammūḷhattā arūpabhavasampattiyo patthetvā tāneva jhānāni nibbattentassāti puññābhisaṅkhāre vuttena nayena,
tika-abh02t0:1548_1: Ekasmiṃyeva lokassa kāraṇabhūte sati tato sakalāya pavattiyā anavasesato,
tika-abh02t0:1548_2: sabbadā ca pavattitabbaṃ apekkhitabbassa kāraṇantarassa abhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1548_3: Na cetaṃ atthi kameneva pavattiyā dassanato.
tika-abh02t0:1548_4: Kāraṇantarāpekkhatāya pana ekakāraṇavādo apahato siyā ekassa ca anekasabhāvatābhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1548_8: itarathā tassa ekabhāvo eva na siyāti imamatthamāha “sabbassa…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1548_12: anekato ekanti imesu tīsu pakāresu avijjamānesu anupalabbhamānesu pārisesañāyena.
tika-abh02t0:1548_13: Anekato anekanti ekasmiṃ catutthe eva ca pakāre vijjamāne.
tika-abh02t0:1549_5: Na hi kadāci sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca dukkhavedanā,
tika-abh02t0:1549_6: dukkhādivedanīyaṃ vā phassaṃ paṭicca sukhavedanā uppajjati.
tika-abh02t0:1549_13: na taṃyeva upādāya tassā kadācipi sukhumatā paṇītatā vā atthīti vuttaṃ “oḷārikasukhumādisaṅkarābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1549_21: phalantarāsammissatā ca kāraṇassa dassitā paṭhamapakkhe asaṃkiṇṇatāvavatthānanti katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1549_23: phalavisesena ca kāraṇaviseso nicchīyatīti ayamattho dassito sanniṭṭhānaṃ vavatthānanti katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1549_24: Purimasmiñca pakkhe dhammānaṃ asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1549_28: Ekasmiṃ dose kupite itarepi khobhaṃ gacchanti.
