tika-abh02t0:1549_29: Santesupi tesu semhapaṭikārena rogavūpasamato semho pākaṭoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1550_1: kāraṇameva vā taṇhāti āha “taṇhāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa vuttattā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1550_7: “taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”nti vacanato taṇhā ca saṅkhārassa kāraṇanti pākaṭā.
tika-abh02t0:1550_8: Anassādanīyesu anekādīnavavokiṇṇesu saṅkhāresu assādānupassanā avijjāya vinā na hotīti dassento āha “assādānupassino…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1550_10: Khīṇāsavassa saṅkhārābhāvatoti byatirekenapi avijjāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-abh02t0:1550_12: Etena bālānaṃ eva sambhavato avijjāya asādhāraṇatā vuttāti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1550_14: Vatthārammaṇataṇhupādānādīni viya avijjāpi puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ sādhāraṇakāraṇanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “puññabhavādī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1550_19: Ettha ca kiccakaraṇaṭṭhānabhedena kiccavatī avijjā bhinditvā dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:1550_20: Na hi yadavatthā avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ upanissayo,
tika-abh02t0:1550_21: tadavatthā eva itaresaṃ upanissayoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1551_2: “Purimacittañhī”tiādinā ṭhānaviruddho ca udāhaṭoti āha “na idaṃ ekantikaṃ siyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1551_4: Purimasippādisikkhā hi pacchā pavattamānasippādikiriyānaṃ samodhānāsambhavā ṭhānavirodhoti yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1551_10: gotrabhuto maggassa liṅgaparivattanādivasena ca pavattiyaṃ veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1551_16: dadhi ambilarasaṃ pittabrūhanaṃ kaṭukavipākasabhāvanti ato sabhāvavirodhā.
tika-abh02t0:1552_3: tā pana yebhuyyena rattalomakā hontīti vuttaṃ “rattā eḷakā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1552_5: avipākānampi paccayuppannabhāvato na vipākadhammavipākāpekkhā paccayapaccayuppannatāti vuttaṃ “vipākāyeva te ca nā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1552_8: Na na yujjati yujjati eva paccayuppannatāmattassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1553_1: sā pana kenaci akaṭā akaṭavidhā paṭiniyatasabhāvāti dassetuṃ niyativādinā vuttanidassanaṃ āharanto “acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇīnaṃ viyā”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1553_3: yaṃ sandhāya “yadicchāya pavattanaṃ nivattanaṃ yadicchāyā”tiādi vuccati.
tika-abh02t0:1553_12: sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1553_13: Etehi vikappanehīti cutiādīsu sammūḷhatāya “satto maratī”tiādivikappanehi kāraṇabhūtehi.
tika-abh02t0:1553_14: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ katvāti ayonisomanasikāraparibrūhanena cittaṃ akusalaṃ katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1554_1: Pariyattidhammañhi sammadeva jānanto paṭipattidhammaṃ paripūretvā paṭivedhadhamme patiṭṭhahati.
tika-abh02t0:1557_2: Viññāṇādayo vedanāpariyosānā etarahi vipākavaṭṭabhūtā idhādhippetāti āha “taṃkammanibbattameva viññāṇaṃ bhavituṃ arahatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1557_3: Ayañca atthavaṇṇanā dhātukathāpāḷiyā na sametīti dassento “dhātukathāyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1557_4: Tattha dhātukathāyaṃ vacanato sabbaviññāṇaphassavedanāpariggaho kato dhātukathāyanti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1558_1: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
tika-abh02t0:1558_3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti –
tika-abh02t0:1559_2: Tenāha “vipākā dhammāti imassa viya vissajjanaṃ siyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1559_3: Tasmāti yasmā vippayuttena saṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese nippadesāva viññāṇaphassavedanā gahitā, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1559_7: Tena yathāvuttaatthavaṇṇanā suttantabhājanīyavasena vuttāti yathādassitaṃ virodhaṃ pariharati.
tika-abh02t0:1559_9: atha kasmā “kāmabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
tika-abh02t0:1559_10: Rūpabhavo pañcahi khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahito”tiādinā upādinnakkhandhavasena
tika-abh02t0:1559_11: bhavo vissajjitoti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “bhavo pana…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1559_18: tasmā taṃ saṅkhārapaccayanti imamatthaṃ dassento “viññāṇassa vipākattā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1560_0: “Somanassasahagatāneva sandhāya vutta”nti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ upekkhāsahagatakusalākusalajavanānantarampi somanassasahagatatadārammaṇassa icchitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1560_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “catunnaṃ pana duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarajavanassa pariyosāne ahetukacittaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1560_2: tadārammaṇabhāvena patiṭṭhātī”ti vatvā “iṭṭhārammaṇe pana santīraṇampi tadārammaṇampi somanassasahagatamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1560_3: Kusalākusalañhi abhiiṭṭhampi ārammaṇaṃ tathābhisaṅkharaṇena kadāci na majjhattaṃ katvā na pavattati,
tika-abh02t0:1560_6: Kiriyajavanānaṃ pana visayābhisaṅkharaṇassa balavabhāvato tadanantarānaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ yathāvisayaṃ vedanāvasena tadanuguṇatā icchitā.
tika-abh02t0:1560_7: Ye pana kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na icchanti,
tika-abh02t0:1560_10: taṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1560_12: Tihetukajavanāvasāne ca duhetukajavanāvasāne cāti samuccayattho ca- saddo.
tika-abh02t0:1560_13: Keci pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “kusalajavanāvasānepi ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ hotīti ‘yebhuyyenā’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:1560_14: Lobhacittassa vā sattānaṃ bahulaṃ uppajjanato “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1560_15: “Sakiṃ vā”ti vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vuttaṃ yathā “aṭṭha vā dasa vā”ti dassetuṃ “dirattatirattādīsu viya veditabba”nti āha. Vā-
tika-abh02t0:1560_20: Tirattaṃ pana vāsādike labbhamāne diratte vattabbameva natthīti dirattaggahaṇaṃ visuṃ na yojetīti adhippāyena “vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1560_21: Kevalaṃ “tiratta”nti vutte aññattha vāsādinā antaritampi tirattaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-abh02t0:1560_22: dirattavisiṭṭhaṃ pana tirattaṃ vuccamānaṃ tena anantaritameva tirattaṃ dīpetīti āha “nirantaratirattadassanatthaṃ vā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1560_24: “Adhippāyo”ti etena ekacittakkhaṇāyukepi visaye kadāci tadārammaṇaṃ uppajjeyyāti “sakiṃ evā”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ ulliṅgeti.
tika-abh02t0:1560_25: “Sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve eva cittavārā āgatā”ti vuttattā ayampi attho vicāretvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1560_26: Anurūpāya paṭisandhiyāti attano attano anucchavikena paṭisandhānakiccena.
tika-abh02t0:1561_1: kati paṭisandhicittānī”tiādinā paṭisandhivicāro parato vitthārato kathīyatīti āha “paṭisandhikathā mahāvisayāti katvā pavattimeva tāva dassento”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1561_9: Paccayuppannabhāvena paṭhamuddiṭṭhāni sabbānipi lokiyavipākacittāni anvādesaṃ arahantīti āha “tatrassāti pavattiyaṃ bāttiṃsavidhassā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1562_0: Yathā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiviññāṇasaṅkhātassa bījassa abhāvepi rūpabhave cakkhusotindriyapavattiānubhāvato cakkhusotaviññāṇānaṃ sambhavo,
tika-abh02t0:1562_1: evaṃ teneva kāraṇena sampaṭicchanādīnampi tattha sambhavoti dassento “indriyapavattiānubhāvato evā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1562_5: Tasmiñca satīti tasmiṃ dvārabhede vīthibhede ca sati.
tika-abh02t0:1562_7: Janakaṃ anubandhati nāmāti taṃsadise tabbohāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1563_0: Idaṃ pana vatvāti rūpārūpāvacaradhamme ārabbha tadārammaṇānuppattiṃ vatvā.
tika-abh02t0:1563_3: Tathā hi lobhadosasahagatacittuppādepi samādhi “avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā”tiādinā niddiṭṭho.
tika-abh02t0:1564_0: “Kena katthā”ti padassa “kena cittena kasmiṃ bhave”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “ekūnavīsatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1564_1: Tattha tena tena cittenāti tena tena ahetukadvayādicittena saddhiṃ pavattamānā paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpārūpadhammā ekūnavīsati paṭisandhiyoti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1565_3: bhavitabbanti kammādiupaṭṭhānassa parato tīhi javanavārehi pavattitabbanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1565_6: Tasmāti yasmā ekajavanavārasseva kammādiupaṭṭhānena maraṇaṃ na sambhavati, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1565_9: antarantarā pañcadvāravīthiyā vā vattamānāya phoṭṭhabbasamāyoge paṭhamaṃ kāyadvārāvajjanuppatti yuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1565_10: tathāpi kismiñci cintiyamāne tamevārabbha ekasmiṃ javanavāre pavatte pacchā kāyadvārāvajjanuppatti siyā
tika-abh02t0:1565_12: Yathā niddāyantassa phoṭṭhabbasamāyogena pabujjhanakāle manodvārāvajjanameva āvaṭṭeti,
tika-abh02t0:1565_21: Yesaṃ visayo atthīti yesaṃ nippariyāyena visayo atthi.
tika-abh02t0:1567_3: Yasmiñhi cittasantāne puññādicetanāya viya bhavapatthanāya paribhāvanā anupacchinnā,
tika-abh02t0:1567_5: Taṃ pana cittaṃ tathā uppajjamānaṃ tāya vināmitaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “anupacchinnakilesabalavināmita”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1567_8: “Nicchinantī”ti vuttassa nicchayassa nibandhanaṃ āgamaṃ dassento “nimittassādagadhitaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1568_0: Akusale hi duggatūpanissaye niyamite kusalaṃ sugatūpanissayoti niyamitameva hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1569_0: Aniṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āha yato duggatipaṭisandhi dassīyatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1569_1: Yadi evaṃ “rāgādihetubhūta”nti kasmā vuttanti āha “tampi hi…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1569_3: Yasmā pana hīnaṃ ārammaṇanti ārammaṇabhūtakammanimittaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1569_5: Kammanimittabhūtañhi ārammaṇaṃ yaṃ vipākassa janakaṃ kammaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1569_7: tassa kammassa sadisāsannajavanasahajātānañca rāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayasaṅkhāto hetu hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1569_8: so eva cassa hīnabhāvoti dassetuṃ “tañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1569_9: Kammavasena aniṭṭhanti hīnassa akusalakammassa ārammaṇato ārammaṇatāvasena hīnanti katvā aniṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1569_11: “Aññathā cā”tiādinā kammanimittārammaṇassa akusalavipākassa na sambhavoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1569_15: Cutiāsannajavanānaṃ paṭisandhijanakatte ayamattho labbheyyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “na ca paṭisandhiyā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1569_17: Na assāditānīti assādanabhūtāya taṇhāya na āmaṭṭhāni.
tika-abh02t0:1570_3: samādinnā”ti vacanato yathāvuttacutiāsannajavanānaṃ paṭisandhidānaṃ siddhanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na ca dubbalehī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1570_5: Ñāṇavatthuvibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyañhi “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātī”ti padānaṃ atthaṃ vivaranto vakkhati “sabbampi…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1570_9: Upapajjanasupinadassanādīnaṃ manodvārikacitteneva pavatti pākaṭāti tāni bahi karonto “cavanapariyosānaṃ kicca”nti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1571_0: Tatthāti “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātī”ti pāḷivaṇṇanāyaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1571_1: Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti ettha na sabbe rūpādidhammā dhammaggahaṇena gahitāti yathādhippetadhammadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1571_2: “manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānātī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti
tika-abh02t0:1571_6: yāya sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā taṃsantāne anveti anugacchati,
tika-abh02t0:1571_9: Yadi pañcadvāre yathāvuttakiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni paṭikkhittāni,
tika-abh02t0:1571_10: kathaṃ tattha cavanupapajjanāni sambhavantīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tadārammaṇānantaraṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1572_3: Mahaggatāvasānaṃ vadantīti yathāpaccayaṃ mahaggatasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa sā vīthi uppajjati,
tika-abh02t0:1572_8: vuttāvasesā dve arūpāvacarāti navattabbārammaṇā sattavidhā cutiyo.
tika-abh02t0:1572_9: Duggaticuti pana parato vuccatīti idha na gahitā.
tika-abh02t0:1573_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “suddhāya vāti mahaggatakammanimittārammaṇāya javanavīthiyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1573_4: “cakkhusotānaṃ vā”ti pana dvāradvayasseva vasena vikappantarakaraṇaṃ yathādhippetassa atthassa ñāpakanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1573_5: Ñāpakañca nāma agatikā gatīti yathāvuttaṃ ñāpakaṃ asambhāvento “athāpī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1573_8: Ayampi paṭisandhīti āruppacutiyā anantaraṃ paṭisandhiṃ vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1573_9: Tatthevāti “pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ vā nimitta”nti vutte paṭhame vikappe eva.
tika-abh02t0:1573_19: Atītapaccuppannārammaṇā ca kāmāvacarapaṭisandhīti etthāpi itarāhīti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:1574_6: navattabbātītārammaṇatāya dvippakārā āruppapaṭisandhīti āha “dviekadvippakārānaṃ kāmarūpāruppānaṃ vasenā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1574_11: navattabbārammaṇāya āruppacutiyā anantarā atītārammaṇā paccuppannārammaṇā ca dve kāmapaṭisandhī,
tika-abh02t0:1575_1: Yadipi “kammassa katattā”tiādināpi kammassa vipākānaṃ upanissayapaccayabhāvo gahitoyeva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1576_0: Ādinā vimissaviññāṇenāti ekassa bhavassa ādibhūtena rūpavimissena paṭisandhiviññāṇena.
tika-abh02t0:1576_2: Avacanaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ maññamāno “gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā”ti vatvā sabbena sabbaṃ rūpabhave te
tika-abh02t0:1576_6: Pañca dhātuyoti tā eva pañca dhātuyo.
tika-abh02t0:1576_20: atha kho pakaraṇantarepi gandhādayo paṭikkhittāti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1576_22: Yathā ghānāyatanādīnaṃ tattha rūpabhave bhāvo atthi,
tika-abh02t0:1576_28: Tato paravādī yaṃ tattha ajjhattikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ ghānādikaṃ saṇṭhānanimittaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1576_30: Bāhirānaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ vasena puṭṭho yasmā ghānappasādādayo tattha na icchati,
tika-abh02t0:1576_31: tasmā tesaṃ gocaraṃ paṭisedhento “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhipati. Ādi-
tika-abh02t0:1576_34: Na hevaṃ vattabbe”tiādinayappavattānaṃ anulomapaṭilomasaṃsandanapañhādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1577_0: Idāni anāyatanasabhāve gandharase paṭijānitvāpi dosaṃ vadanto “yadi cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1577_5: tathā āyatanabhāvo cāti sabbathāpi tattha vijjamānānaṃ gandharasānaṃ āyatanesu avacane kāraṇaṃ natthīti dassento “dhammabhāvo cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1577_9: yathāvuttakāraṇato gandharasāyatanabhāvena avuccamānāpi dhammāyatanabhāvena vattabbā siyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1577_11: Tasmā niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “nattheva rūpabhave gandharasā”ti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1577_13: kāmadhātuyaṃ vuttānaṃ tesaṃ kiṃ gandharasabhāvato aññena sabhāvena rūpadhātuyaṃ atthibhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1577_15: Yadi purimo pakkho dhammāyatane tesaṃ saṅgaho siyā anāyatanasabhāvassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvā,
tika-abh02t0:1577_16: atha dutiyo teneva kāraṇena nesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvo siddhoti imamatthaṃ dassento “yadi cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1577_17: Tasmāti yasmā gandharasā dhammahadayavibhaṅge na vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1577_19: phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyā pathavīādayo viya ghāyituṃ sāyituñca asakkuṇeyyā te natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1577_27: “Na vilomitā”ti iminā yathāpaṭiññātaṃ dhammaṃ dīpitaṃ ulliṅgeti.
tika-abh02t0:1578_0: Ettha ca rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ na karontīti
tika-abh02t0:1578_3: “Tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato,
tika-abh02t0:1578_4: na sabbena sabbaṃ gandharasānaṃ ojāya ca abhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1578_5: Iti visayino kiccassa ca abhāvena visayo,
tika-abh02t0:1578_8: tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1578_11: tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto diṭṭho yathā tattheva rūpāyatanassa.
tika-abh02t0:1578_13: kathaṃ asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantīti.
tika-abh02t0:1578_15: acakkhāyatanabhāvena ca nesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti?
tika-abh02t0:1578_17: Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1578_18: tena rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1578_19: Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh02t0:1578_20: tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato,
tika-abh02t0:1578_21: manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1578_24: Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1578_25: tena saññīnampi gandhādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1578_26: Asatipi hi attano indriye rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati.
tika-abh02t0:1578_27: Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni,
tika-abh02t0:1578_30: Aññathā rūpaloke phusitumasakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ vacīghoso eva na siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1578_32: na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanasabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1578_33: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanasaṅkhātassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1578_34: tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1578_35: Evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1578_36: Vuttañhi “asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1578_37: Paṭigho hettha bhūtattayassa kāyappasādaṃ pati taṃnissayabhūtaghaṭṭanadvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1578_38: so ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvassa ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi.
tika-abh02t0:1578_40: atha kasmā gandhāyatanādīnipi gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti?
tika-abh02t0:1578_42: Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya,
tika-abh02t0:1578_47: na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tatthāvacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1578_48: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ paṭijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.
tika-abh02t0:1578_49: Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1578_51: Nayidamevaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tattha nesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā.
tika-abh02t0:1578_53: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā.
tika-abh02t0:1578_61: tannissayānañca viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
tika-abh02t0:1578_62: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi nesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva,
tika-abh02t0:1578_64: tathā cakkhudasakādivasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1579_0: Eḷakassa jātakāle uṇṇā jātiuṇṇāti paṭhamo attho.
tika-abh02t0:1580_1: opapātikayonikesūti niddhāraṇeti dassento “opapātikayonikehi rūpībrahme niddhāretī”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1582_0: “Na vuttaṃ aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti idaṃ “na hi pāḷiyaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1582_2: Cakkhusotaghānavikalassa hi upapajjamānassa aṭṭheva āyatanāni siyunti.
tika-abh02t0:1582_3: Sati ca aghānakupapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1582_4: Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1582_7: kassaci aparāni navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1582_14: kassaci satta dhātuyo pātubhavantī”ti evaṃ dhātupātubhāvapañho veditabbo. Ādi-
tika-abh02t0:1582_15: saddena “kassaci cuddasindriyāni pātubhavantī”tiādi nayappavattā indriyapañhādayo saṅgahitā.
tika-abh02t0:1583_0: Ettha ca yathā “sattati ukkaṃsato ca rūpānī”ti padaṃ “saṃsedajopapātīsū”ti ettha yonidvayavasena yojīyati,
tika-abh02t0:1583_4: Saṃsedajasseva ca jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1583_10: Evañca katvā āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāya “kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako opapātiko natthi.
tika-abh02t0:1583_14: yāva ‘kassaci navāyatanānī’ti pāḷi opapātike sandhāya vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1583_15: Tasmā pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avirodho siddho hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1583_16: tathā ca yathāvuttapāḷiyā ayamatthavaṇṇanā aññadatthu saṃsandati sametiyevā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1583_18: Tathā hi dhammahadayavibhaṅge ‘kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī’tiādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1583_21: taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahaṇavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1583_22: Tathā hi vakkhati “saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanāparipuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā”ti
tika-abh02t0:1583_23: “padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ dassetuṃ ‘opapātikāna’nti vutta”nti ca.
tika-abh02t0:1583_25: saṃsedajayonivaseneva ca avakaṃsato pavattiṃ dassetuṃ opapātikayoniyā itaraṃ asaṅgahetvā “saṃsedajopapātīsū”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh02t0:1584_10: Yadipi “ayaṃ nāma duggatipaṭisandhi na hotī”ti niyamo natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1585_2: “Bhedaviseso eva ca evaṃ vitthārena dassito”ti idaṃ “amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇāyā”tiādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1585_8: tattha tattheva vā bhavādike cavitvā upapajjantassa vasena cutipaṭisandhiyojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1585_10: saddoti dassento “tato hetuṃ vināti tattha hetuṃ vinā”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1585_12: tasmiṃ purimabhave nipphannaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādikaṃ kāraṇaṃ vinā na hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1586_3: Svāyamattho “pañcannaṃ dvārāna”ntiādinā heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyamāgatoti āha “pañcadvārikaviññāṇānantarampi hi pubbe cuti dassitā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1586_6: Cuticittena saddhiṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ nirodho hotīti dassetuṃ “yamake cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1586_9: Yathāupaṭṭhite kammādiārammaṇe anekavāraṃ uppattiyā santānassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha paṭisandhiviññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa hetubhāvo.
tika-abh02t0:1587_0: Santānavasena nippajjamānānaṃ namanādikiriyānaṃ ekasmiṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇeyeva atthasiddhīti dassento āha “namana…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1587_2: Pathaviyaṃ sabalapayogehīti pathaviyā ādhāraṇabhūtāya attano balena payogena ca karaṇabhūtena.
tika-abh02t0:1588_5: Paṭighosādīnañhi saddādippavattito sati purimasiddhiyaṃ te saddādipaccayadesaṃ gaccheyyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1588_6: na pana te atthīti vuttaṃ “tato pubbe abhāvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1588_8: Yathā ca hetudesaṃ na gacchati hetusamuppannaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1588_13: Purimabhavahetudese sannihitaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ tato aññatra bhavantare taṃ upagantvā tappaccayaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1588_14: Paccayato nibbattamānaṃ paccayuppannaṃ aññatra agantvā paccayadesaṃ anupagatameva hutvā nibbattatīti paṭhamo attho.
tika-abh02t0:1588_15: Paṭhamaṃ paccayena samodhānagataṃ hutvā tato aññatra gantvā paccayuppannavatthubhāvaṃ nāpajjatīti dutiyo attho.
tika-abh02t0:1588_16: Yathāsambhavanti yāya “na khīrato dadhi sambhūtaṃ siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1588_17: na khīrasāmino dadhi siyā”ti ca khīradadhīsu ekantaṃ ekatāya nānatāya ca dosayojanā katā.
tika-abh02t0:1588_21: Santānabaddhesu dhammesu ekantaekatāpaṭisedhena sassatagāhassa paṭisedhitattā vuttaṃ “sayaṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāretī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1588_22: Tathā ekantanānatāpaṭisedhena ucchedagāho paṭisedhito hotīti āha “paraṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ añño karoti,
tika-abh02t0:1588_25: akatāgamo ca nivattito hotīti adhiccasamuppannadiṭṭhinivāraṇeneva niyatisabhāvavādapaṭisedhopi katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1591_6: itaro paṭhamajjhānavipākādīnaṃ pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca paccayo hotīti pākaṭoyamatthoti taṃ avibhajitvā
tika-abh02t0:1591_14: Evañhi sati na ettha kiñci vicāretabbaṃ heṭṭhā vitthāritattā.
tika-abh02t0:1591_15: Keci pana “dvādasākusalacetanābhedoti idaṃ ‘channaṃ pavatte’tiādinā yojetabba”nti vadanti,
tika-abh02t0:1591_16: tesaṃ matena uddhaccacetanāya gahaṇe payojanaṃ vicāretabbameva paṭisandhiyāpi paccayabhāvassa vuttattā.
tika-abh02t0:1591_20: Manopadosikānaṃ tadaññavatthūnampi aniṭṭhatā kathaṃ na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1591_22: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pacuratābhāvato taṃ anāmasitvā “tathā kāmāvacaradevalokepī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1592_2: Pañcadasannaṃ ahetukavipākaviññāṇānaṃ pañcaṭṭhānāni dve apanetvā avasesānaṃ terasannaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1592_5: Ekadesapaccayabhāvenāti ekadesassa vīsaticetanābhedassa kāmāvacaracittasaṅkhārassa paccayabhāvena ekūnatiṃsacetanābhedo samudāyo vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1592_6: Svevāti avayavagatenāpi visesena samudāyo voharīyati yathā “alaṅkato rājakumāro”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1593_1: Tattha hi “kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ tāva ṭhitassā”tiādinā paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattiyañca vipākassa vitthārappakāsanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1593_4: Catutthajjhānameva hi bhāvanāvisesappavattaṃ asaññabhūmiṃ āruppabhūmiñca nipphādeti,
tika-abh02t0:1594_3: Vuttanayenāti “kāmabhave pana duggatiyaṃ aṭṭhannampi parittavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
tika-abh02t0:1597_1: Yadipi suttante abhidhamme ca paṭiccasamuppādaniddese rūpapadassa desanābhedo natthi,
tika-abh02t0:1597_2: abhidhamme pana “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetū”tiādinā suttantato tassa desanābhedo atthevāti āha “suttantā…pe… bhedo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1597_3: Saṅkhyeyyesu paricchedato gahitesu atthasiddho tattha saṅkhyāparicchedoti vuttaṃ “atthato pana vuttameva hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1598_0: Opapātikasattesūti vā sāmaññato sabbe opapātikā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1598_1: Tesu brahmakāyikādiggahaṇena rūpāvacarāva vuttāti tadaññe sandhāya sesaopapātikānanti sesaggahaṇaṃ sātthakameva.
tika-abh02t0:1599_0: “Dve santatisīsānī”ti ārabbha yāva “satta santatisīsānī”ti ettakaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sattakapariyosāna”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1599_2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva sabbaṃ rūpaṃ uppajjatīti hi attano adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1600_3: “Sabbesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti aṭṭhasālinīṭīkāyaṃ vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh02t0:1600_4: Pañcaviññāṇakkhaṇe tappaccayā rūpuppattiyā abhāvena vuttaṃ “pañcaviññāṇappavattikālaṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1600_11: Kammaviññāṇappaccayā vipākacittappavattikāle vipākanāmassa kammasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca vasena.
tika-abh02t0:1600_13: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpavasena ca nāmarūpassa sambhavo dassetabboti āha “sahajāta…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1600_18: Nidassito ca nidassitavipakkho ca nidassitavipakkhoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh02t0:1601_2: saddaṃ ānetvā āha “tato yuttameva idanti yojetabba”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1601_7: tayo ca arūpino khandhā”tiādinā vuttena nayena.
tika-abh02t0:1603_0: Yadipi “atthi rūpaṃ cittasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādivacanato rūpassapi viññāṇapaccayatā suttato jānitabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1603_2: asati ca abhāvato yathā saddheyyādivatthumhi saddhādayoti nāmassapi yuttito viññāṇapaccayatā siddhā,
tika-abh02t0:1603_10: bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”ntiādi,
tika-abh02t0:1603_11: tasmā “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti padassa saccadesanābhāvadīpanena dhammacakkappavattanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “nāmarūpamattatāvacaneneva vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1606_2: Tena catunnaṃ tāva bhūtānaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatavasena cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ paccayabhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1606_4: pavattiyaṃ yasmā anantaracittena saddhiṃ uppannameva vatthu ṭhitippattiyā balavabhāvena tassa nissayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh02t0:1606_9: Ekappakārenevāti yathā cakkhādīnaṃ manāyatanassa paṭiniyatadassanādikiccānuvidhānato niyato ekappakāreneva paccayabhāvo,
tika-abh02t0:1606_11: tesaṃ pana rūpārammaṇādinā pakārantarena tassa paccayabhāvoti “aniyamato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1606_12: Keci pana “niyamato”ti padaṃ “sasantatipariyāpanna”nti iminā sambandhitvā atthaṃ vadanti “ekantena sasantatipariyāpanna”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1607_1: itarehi dvīhi saddatopi atthatopi sarūpataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1607_2: “Cakkhādīhi saha ‘saḷāyatana’nti vutta”nti vuttanayena ekasesaṃ katvā manāyatanaṃ cakkhādīhi saddhiṃ
tika-abh02t0:1607_9: Avipākañhi tattha itaranti adhippetanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “paccayanaye panā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1608_2: tato ekaṃ apanetvā aṭṭhadhā paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1609_0: Paṭisandhiyaṃ arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa uppādakkhaṇe paccayā hontīti “pavatte”ti viseseti.
tika-abh02t0:1613_5: Sabbāyatanato hi ekassa phassassa asambhavacodanāyaṃ tappasaṅgena ekāyatanato anekassāpi sambhavo natthīti
tika-abh02t0:1613_9: Ekaphassasambhavassa labbhamānattā “saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti bhagavatā vuttanti parihāraṃ dassentoti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1617_2: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacuticittasampayuttāya hi vedanāya sahajātamanosamphasso vuttanayena aṭṭhadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1621_0: Kammaphalābhipatthanāvasena sattā kammānipi āyūhantīti sātisayaṃ taṇhāya vipākavedanā upanissayo,
tika-abh02t0:1621_4: “Sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti idaṃ iṭṭhasabhāvaṃyeva upekkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1621_7: Sabbassāti avītarāgassa vītarāgassa ca vedanāvato puggalassa.
tika-abh02t0:1622_0: Vedanāpaccayā evāti ayaṃ niyamo niyamantaranivattanaparoti nāssa paccayantaranivattanatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1625_1: Purimadiṭṭhinti “sassato attā”ti pageva abhiniviṭṭhaṃ sassatagāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1625_5: Lokoti vā gahaṇanti yaṃ “loko sassato”ti gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1625_12: Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāratoti samudāyabhūtato dhammasaṅkhepavitthārato tadavayavabhūtaṃ saṅkhepaṃ vitthārañca niddhāreti.
tika-abh02t0:1627_0: Yena bhavassādena gadhitacitto bhavanibbattakaṃ kammaṃ katvā upapanno,
tika-abh02t0:1627_1: sā bhavanikanti santāne cirānubandhā abhiṇhuppattikā upapannamattassa uppajjatīti āha “yadipi…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1627_3: Arahattamaggavajjhattā bhavarāgassapi kāmupādānabhāvo atthevāti āha “taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1627_5: Sabbāpi taṇhā kāmupādānanti etthāpi tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1632_3: Tassa vā attheti tassa vantusaddassa atthe, atthi-
tika-abh02t0:1632_5: Akāraṃ katvāti yathā “pītisukhaṃ assa atthī”ti atthe akāraṃ katvā uppādetvā jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:1632_6: evaṃ saññā assa atthīti sañño, bhavo,
tika-abh02t0:1632_9: Pavattattāti pavattakapavattanaṭṭhānānaṃ abhedepi upacāravasena bhinnaṃ viya katvā dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1633_4: kammaṃ vadāmī”tiādinā suttepi cetanāya kammabhāvo āgatova.
tika-abh02t0:1633_5: Nippariyāyena pana cetanāva kammabhavoti vuttamatthaṃ abhidhammapāḷiyāva sādhento “vuttañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1633_8: saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātuekadesena ca kammabhavassa sampayuttataṃ vadantiyā dhātukathāpāḷiyā tassa cetanābhāvo dīpitoti.
tika-abh02t0:1634_2: “Punavacana”nti imināva punaruttidosāpatti paṭiññātāti parassa āsaṅkaṃ dassento “sātthakamevidaṃ punavacananti etaṃ na yuttanti ce”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1634_4: Tena yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudāyo bhavo vutto,
tika-abh02t0:1634_6: samudāyekadesā ca atthato bhinnā evāti vuttamevetanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1634_7: Puna yathāvuttameva bhedaṃ manasi katvā atthato punavacanābhāvaṃ dassento “parena vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1637_1: Vakkhamānenāti “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāmā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhamānena pakārena.
tika-abh02t0:1639_1: Anantarassa pana kāmakammabhavassa anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi upādānassa paccayabhāvo pākaṭoyevāti na vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1643_0: Satipi sukkasoṇitādike pitugatavisesādikāraṇe bāhire paccaye tassa pana aniyatattā,
tika-abh02t0:1648_4: Vedaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ karoti uppādetīti vedeti.
tika-abh02t0:1648_6: Vediyatīti pana kammakattukammānaṃ vasena niddesoti tassapi atthaṃ dassento “jānāti,
tika-abh02t0:1648_10: attanā ca vedakena rahitanti attho. Ca-
tika-abh02t0:1649_0: Catubbidhampi vā suññatanti dhuvabhāvādisuññataṃ, attādisuññatañca sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1650_1: Vedanāvasānampi bhavacakkaṃ paripuṇṇamevāti dassetuṃ “vedanā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1650_4: viññāṇādiggahaṇena jātijarāmaraṇāni sokādayo ca gahitāti evampi vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkanti yuttamevetaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1650_5: Taṇhāmūlake cāti taṇhupādānaggahaṇena avijjā gahitātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1651_7: Upasaggavisesena atthaviseso hotīti “ākirīyantī”ti padassa pakāsīyantīti attho vutto.
tika-abh02t0:1651_10: Puna kammassa vipākasambandho vuttanayattā na gahito.
tika-abh02t0:1651_11: “Vaṭṭānī”ti ca idaṃ “tīṇi vaṭṭānī”ti viggahavasena labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1652_0: “Purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāya āgatattā āsannapaccakkhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “imissā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1652_2: tasmā na aṭṭhakathāya pubbāparavirodho yathāpāṭhaṃ atthassa pakāsitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1652_3: Tattha cetanāsampayuttānañca cetanāya ca saṅkhārabhāvena kammabhavabhāvena ca vattabbamevāti pāḷidvayādhippāyavivaraṇavasena
tika-abh02t0:1652_10: Tīsu atthavikappesūti “taṃ kammaṃ karoto purimā cetanāyo”tiādinā vuttesu tīsu āyūhanacetanānaṃ atthavikappesu.
tika-abh02t0:1652_11: Nanu ca tatiye atthavikappe āyūhanassa avasāne cetanā na vuttāti?
tika-abh02t0:1652_13: “taṃsampayuttā”ti pana saddato padhānabhāvena vuttassa āyūhanassa appadhānabhāvena vuttā avasāne pacchato
tika-abh02t0:1652_14: vuttā viya hotīti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya “tīsupi…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1653_0: Nippariyāyena pana yesu āyūhanassa avasāne cetanā vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1653_3: Tatiye atthavikappe vutte āyūhanasaṅkhāre taṃsampayuttāti āhāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1654_3: upanissayakoṭiyā ca tassa kammassa upakārakāti tadupakārakā.
tika-abh02t0:1654_5: “Saṃkhippanti etthā”ti adhikaraṇasādhanavasena saṅkhepasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā puna kammasādhanavasena vattuṃ “saṃkhipīyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1655_5: Evaṃ “ittara”ntiādinā aniccaṃ calaṃ ittaraṃ addhuvanti catunnaṃ padānaṃ atthavisesavācitaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1656_1: “Yassa pahānatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃbhūtaṃ ariyasaccaṃ visesaṃ akatvā.
tika-abh02t0:1657_1: “Sokadomanassupāyāsā avijjāya aviyogino”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena siddhāya avijjāya.
tika-abh02t0:1659_0: Sati ca pariggahe rajjaṃ viya gatiyo anekānatthānubandhanā,
tika-abh02t0:1659_2: rajje”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1659_3: Yathāupaṭṭhitāni kammādīni cutiāsannajavanehi parikappetvā viya gahitāni paṭisandhiviññāṇenapi parikappitāni viya honti,
tika-abh02t0:1659_4: taṃ panassa parikappanaṃ atthato ārammaṇakaraṇamevāti vuttaṃ “pari…pe… to”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1660_3: sahitassa samuditassa puggalassa jīraṇabhijjanāvatthā dhammā jarāmaraṇāpadesena vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1660_5: te ca samuditā eva pavattantīti evaṃ jātito jarāmaraṇassa sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1660_6: Jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na na hoti hotiyeva ekantena jātassa jarāmaraṇasambhavato,
tika-abh02t0:1660_7: na ca jātiṃ vinā hoti ajātassa tadabhāvatoti jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayataṃ anvayabyatirekehi vibhāveti “na jātito”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1662_7: “Tadeva viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī”ti micchābhinivesasabbhāvato saṃsaraṇakiriyāyapi sabyāpāratā viññāṇassa vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1664_0: Ādānanti upasaddena vināpi daḷhagāho adhippetoti āha “ādānaṭṭho catunnampi upādānānaṃ samāno”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1664_1: Gahaṇanti nikāmanavasena visayassa paṭicchannanti vuttaṃ “gahaṇaṭṭho kāmupādānassā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1664_5: Hāni vā khīṇabhāvo khayoti “khayaṭṭho vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1664_7: Maraṇūpanayanarasattā vā jarāyapi maraṇaṭṭho eva dassito.
tika-abh02t0:1665_6: Na hi avijjādivinimuttaṃ ekattaṃ nāma kiñci paramatthato atthi.
tika-abh02t0:1665_8: Avijjādīsu viññāyamāno hetuphaladhammānaṃ ekasantatipatitādisaṅkhāto ekattādibhāvo teneva sabhāvena ñāyati,
tika-abh02t0:1665_12: Anekepi samānā dhammā yena santānānupacchedena “eka”nti ñāyanti voharīyanti,
tika-abh02t0:1665_14: tathā itarepīti āha “ekattādīhi ca atthā ‘eka’ntiādinā nīyantī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1665_19: ubhayassa ca aññamaññasannissitatāya duviññeyyanānato ekībhūtassa viya ghanabhāvappabandho hetuphalabhāvena sambandho sammā tānoti santāno,
tika-abh02t0:1665_20: tassa anupacchedo tathāpavatti ekattanti āha “santānānupacchedo ekatta”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1666_2: Ucchedadiṭṭhimupādiyatīti yathānurūpakāraṇato phalappavattiṃ asamanupassanto nānāsantāne viya asambandhanānattadassanato
tika-abh02t0:1666_3: hetubhāvarahitānaṃ nippayojanānaṃ purimuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ nirodhe hetuniyamābhāvato ekantena uppatti na yuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1666_6: samānajātidesapariṇāmavayarūpabalasaṇṭhānānaṃ uppatti na yuttātiādīni vikappento ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-abh02t0:1667_0: Kasmā uppatti na siyāti vālikāhi viya tilehipi telassa,
tika-abh02t0:1667_1: ucchuto viya gāvitopi khīrassa aññābhāvato kena kāraṇena tehi tesaṃ uppatti na siyā,
tika-abh02t0:1667_2: itarehi eva ca nesaṃ uppatti hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1667_3: Tasmāti aññassa aññato uppattiyaṃ sabbassa sabbaso uppattiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1667_5: Yasmā niyativādī anurūpā hetuto phaluppattiṃ na icchati,
tika-abh02t0:1667_8: Sabhāvasiddhā eva hi acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇi viya kamalaṅghanarahitā tathā tathā sarīrindriyasukhādibhāvapariṇāmāya
tika-abh02t0:1668_5: Saṃsāranti idha sampattibhavappabandhamāha apāyādipadehi duggatippabandhassa vuttattā.
tika-abh02t0:1672_2: Ekekacittāvaruddhanti abhidhammabhājanīye viya ekekasmiṃ citte avaruddhaṃ antogadhaṃ akatvā.
tika-abh02t0:1672_5: “Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti asahajātāyeva paccayapaccayuppannā dassitā vipākaviññāṇasseva adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1672_10: etarahi pana “ekekena catukkena” icceva bahūsu potthakesu pāṭho.
tika-abh02t0:1672_12: avijjāmūlakādīsu navasu nayesu paccekaṃ paccayacatukkādīnaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ “nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatana”ntiādivisesabhinnā cattāro vārāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1674_2: Tasmā “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti ettha na chaṭṭhāyatanassa aṅgatā.
tika-abh02t0:1674_6: Tīsu pakāresūti “paṭhamo sabbasaṅgāhikaṭṭhenā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttesu tīsupi pakāresu.
tika-abh02t0:1674_12: Atthavisesenāti yadipi aññattha “saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti saḷāyatanapaccayo vutto,
tika-abh02t0:1674_13: tathāpi sahajātādināmasannissayena pavattanato nāmamattapaccayāpi so hotīti paṭiccasamuppādassa nānānayavicittatānumitassa
tika-abh02t0:1674_17: ākārehi yehi liṅgehi yehi nimittehi yehi uddesehi nāmakāyassa paññatti hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1674_19: uddesesu asati api nu kho rūpakāye adhivacanasamphasso paññāyethā”ti phassassa nāmapaccayatāvibhāvanavasena mahānidānadesanā pavattā.
tika-abh02t0:1674_20: Tathā “nāmarūpapaccayā phassoti iccassa vacanīya”nti “nāmarūpapaccayā”ti vadantena “nāmapaccayā”tipi vuttameva hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1676_3: Samānaṃ phalaṃ samāno paccayo sahajātādipaccayehi upakattabbato,
tika-abh02t0:1677_1: saddaṃ loke gatiatthaṃ vadantīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1677_3: saddo paṭisedhadīpakoti dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ ñāpentīti āha “vigatatānivāraṇavasena gati eva hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1678_0: Tidhā catudhā pañcadhā vāti ettha saññāmanasikārādayo sahajātanissayaatthipaccayavasena tidhā,
tika-abh02t0:1678_5: Tampi hi adhipatindriyamaggapaccayehi chadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1679_0: “Vacanavasenā”ti iminā imasmiṃ catukke sahajātapaccayaṃ dhuraṃ katvā desanā pavattāti tesaṃ adhippāyoti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1679_2: Katthacīti kismiñci vāre attano paccayuppannassa yathāsakehi paccayo na na hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1679_6: Tasmā sahajātapaccayavaseneva paṭhamacatukko vuttoti na gahetabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1679_8: Imassa ca “bhavapaccayā jātītiādi na vattabbaṃ siyā”ti iminā sambandho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1679_14: Ettha ca “sahajātasūcaka”ntiādinā yathādhippetassa atthassa vacanato asiddhimāha,
tika-abh02t0:1679_16: Asambhave hi aññassa atthato sijjheyya vacanato vā atthato vā adhippetatthasādhanāti.
tika-abh02t0:1680_3: So ca ubhinnaṃ desanānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsandanabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1682_3: sabbesañca brahmānaṃ tathā upapajjanato ca opapātikayoniyā padhānatā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1682_4: Saṅgahanidassanavasenāti opapātikayoniyā eva saṃsedajayoniyā saṅgahassa nidassanavasena udāharaṇavasena.
tika-abh02t0:1682_5: Ārammaṇapaccayassāpi phassassa satipi pavattihetubhāve so pana sahajātādipaccayabhūtassa ajjhattikassa
tika-abh02t0:1682_6: chaṭṭhāyatanassa viya na sātisayoti vuttaṃ “ārammaṇapaccayo cettha pavattako na hotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1683_2: sadā sambhavatī”ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ viya itarayonikānaṃ kamena āyatanuppatti natthīti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1686_5: Bhavo pana yasmā jātikkhaṇato parampi bhavati,
tika-abh02t0:1686_6: tasmā na so tassā avigatapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1686_12: niyamābhāvato cā”ti vuttānaṃ hetūnaṃ vuttanayena abyāpibhāvavibhāvanena akāraṇataṃ dasseti ayāvabhāvino paccayuppannassa,
tika-abh02t0:1687_3: atthī”ti iminā jātiādīnaṃ avigatapaccayavasena paccayuppannabhāvo viya paccayabhāvopi natthīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1688_6: nāmarūpañca saṅkhārakkhandhena rūpakkhandhena ca jarāmaraṇānaṃ saṅgahitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1688_7: “Yo bhavo jātiyā paccayo”ti etena bhavasaṅgahitānipi jātiādīni jātiyā appaccayattā eva “ṭhapetvā”ti na vuttānīti dasseti,
tika-abh02t0:1688_8: paccayabhāvāsaṅkā eva nesaṃ tassā natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1691_3: Sappadesameva gahitaṃ idha vedanādikkhandhattayasseva adhippetattā niruḷhattā ca.
tika-abh02t0:1691_5: avigatapaccayaniyamābhāvo viya bhave upādānassa aññamaññapaccayaniyamābhāvoti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1692_0: Aññamaññapaccayo viya aññamaññapaccayoti ayamattho idhādhippetoti dassento “aññamañña…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1692_2: Tathā ca vadanti “aññamaññañcettha na paṭṭhāne āgataaññamaññavasena gahetabba”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1695_2: tathāpi sāmaññaggahaṇena nayagato viseso sarūpato dassito hotīti “nāmapaccayā avijjā”ti vatvāpi nāmavisesānaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1695_5: nanu nāmaggahaṇena aggahitopi jātiādi bhavaggahaṇena gahitoti dassitovāyamatthoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “bhavaggahaṇena cā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1695_7: Na siyāti “avijjāpaccayā avijjā”ti vuttaṃ na siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1695_8: Tasmāti yasmā sāmaññacoditaṃ visesacoditameva na hoti, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1696_4: “Nāmapaccayā avijjā”ti ettha paccayuppannaṃ ṭhapetvā paccayassa gahaṇato avijjāvinimuttā eva cattāro
tika-abh02t0:1696_5: khandhā nāmasaddena vuccantīti āha “na nāmasaddo niravasesabodhako”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1696_10: Iminā adhippāyenāti bhavasaddo niravasesabodhako upādinnacatukkhandhavisayattāti iminā adhippāyena.
tika-abh02t0:1696_12: na pana jātiādipaṭibaddhā jāyamānādikkhandhāti na ekacittakkhaṇe jātiādīnaṃ avijjāya paccayabhāvo sambhavatīti
tika-abh02t0:1696_14: Nānācittakkhaṇe pana jātiādayo avijjāya upanissayapaccayo hontīti “ekacittakkhaṇe”ti visesitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1699_4: Yadi evaṃ nāmaggahaṇena gahitā taṇhā kasmā puna vuttāti āha “nāme viya visesapaccayattābhāvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1699_5: “Nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatana”nti ettha hi kāmataṇhāpi nāme saṅgahitāti nāmassa yathārahaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa
tika-abh02t0:1699_7: upādānassa pana bhavasaṅgahopi atthīti “taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”nti etena “kāmupādānapaccayā bhavo”ti etassa
tika-abh02t0:1699_12: Paccayuppannaṃ paccayo ca ekamevāti “taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”nti ettha vuttapaccayuppannaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1699_13: “upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti ettha vuttapaccayo ca eko evattho,
tika-abh02t0:1699_14: tasmā paccayo visuṃ paccayuppannato bhinnaṃ katvā na vibhatto.
tika-abh02t0:1702_1: Yassāti “yassa ca hotī”ti ettha vuttaṃ “yassā”ti padaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1707_1: sarūpeneva pana “na ca cakkhuviññāṇādīni rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1710_1: Kusalaphaleti kusalavipākapaṭisandhiviññāṇassa gahitattā tassa sādurasavisarukkhabījasadisatā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1711_1: avigatacatukkādīni pana na labbhanti yathālābhayojanāya dassitattā.
tika-abh02t0:1714_1: Kammaṃ viya paccayo hoti vipākabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1714_2: Vipākassa kammaṃ paccayo hontaṃ sātisayaṃ hotīti tassa nippariyāyatā,
tika-abh02t0:1714_3: taṃsampayuttānaṃ pariyāyatā siyāti adhippāyena “pariyāyena upanissayapaccayoti vuttānī”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1714_6: vipākadhammadhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti pana vacanato nippariyāyena
tika-abh02t0:1714_7: sabbepi kusalākusalā dhammā vipākassa upanissayapaccayo hotīti ayamattho dissati.
tika-abh02t0:1714_8: “Kusalamūlaṃ akusalamūla”nti imesaṃ anvādesopi paccayasaddāpekkhāya “esā”ti pulliṅgavasena vuttoti dassento āha “esāti…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1715_1: avijjā ca upanissayā na hontīti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1715_2: Kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭabhūtāniyeva saṅkhāraviññāṇāni pacchimanaye adhippetānīti vuttaṃ “kiriyāni pana…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1715_4: Tesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena anekappakāratoti adhippāyoti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1716_1: Catunnaṃ catukkānanti purimanaye pacchimanaye ca āgatānaṃ yathālābhaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1716_7: vipākesu kusalākusalamūlakassāti evaṃ ekasseva nayassa vasena.
tika-abh02t0:1716_9: paccayuppannassa vā paccayabhāvena bhedeti imamatthaṃ dassento “avijjādīna”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna tameva
tika-abh02t0:1726_1: “Niccaṃ attā”ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇānaṃ cittadhammānaṃ taṇhāyapi vatthubhāvato visesaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1726_5: saṅkhārakkhandho ca phassādivasena anekabhedoti dhammānupassanā “atipabhedagatā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1726_6: Sarāgādivibhāgavasena soḷasabhedattā vā cittānupassanā nātipabhedagatā vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1726_7: sutte āgatanayena nīvaraṇādivasena anekabhedattā dhammānupassanā atipabhedagatā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1727_4: Oghesu vuttanayā eva yogāsavesupi yojanā atthato abhinnattāti te na gahitā.
tika-abh02t0:1727_6: Paṭhamoghatatiyacatutthaganthayojanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva kāyacittadhammānaṃ itarupādānavatthutā gahetabbāti vedanāya diṭṭhupādānavatthutā dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:1728_4: Satipaṭṭhānasabhāvo sammāsatitā niyyānasatitā samānabhāgatā ekajātitā sabhāgatā.
tika-abh02t0:1728_5: Purimasminti “ekatte nibbāne samāgamo ekattasamosaraṇa”nti etasmiṃ atthe.
tika-abh02t0:1728_10: “ekatte nibbāne samāgamo ekattasamosaraṇa”nti evaṃ vuccamāneti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1728_11: Dhāraṇatāva satīti “saraṇatā”ti vuttadhāraṇatā eva satīti katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1728_12: Satisaddatthantarābhāvāti satisaṅkhātassa saraṇekattasamosaraṇasaddatthato aññassa atthassa abhāvā.
tika-abh02t0:1728_14: Nibbānasamosaraṇepīti yathāvutte dutiye atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇapadāni sahitāneva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa ñāpakāni,
tika-abh02t0:1728_15: evaṃ nibbānasamosaraṇepi “ekatte nibbāne samāgamo ekattasamosaraṇa”nti etasmimpi atthe sati…pe… kāraṇāni.
tika-abh02t0:1729_1: Imesu pana yasmā kesuci devānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati,
tika-abh02t0:1729_2: tasmā tāni anāmasitvā yadipi koṭṭhāsadhātumanasikāravasenevettha desanā pavattā,
tika-abh02t0:1729_3: desanantare pana āgataṃ anavasesaṃ kāyānupassanāvibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1730_1: Tassā bhikkhubhāve niyate sāpi bhikkhubhāve niyatāyeva nāma hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1732_3: so pana avayavavinimuttaṃ drabyantaranti gāho laddhi avayavīgāho.
tika-abh02t0:1732_4: Hatthapādādiaṅgulinakhādiaṅgapaccaṅge sannivesavisiṭṭhe upādāya yāyaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasamaññā ceva kāyasamaññā ca,
tika-abh02t0:1733_0: Na taṃ diṭṭhanti taṃ itthipurisādi diṭṭhaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1733_1: Diṭṭhaṃ vā itthipurisādi na hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1742_4: Visuṃ visuṃ na vattabbanti codanaṃ dassetīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1742_6: Purimacodanāyāti “pubbe pahīnattā puna pahānaṃ na vattabba”nti codanāya.
tika-abh02t0:1746_2: saddena idha vuttā bahiddhāajjhattabahiddhāanupassanappakārā viya mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte vuttā samudayadhammānupassiādianupassanappakārāpi
tika-abh02t0:1746_5: Cuddasa pakārā mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte āgatacuddasappakārādike apekkhitvā idha vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1746_8: Tesampi hi ānāpānādivasena samathapakkhikā kāyānupassanā sambhavati.
tika-abh02t0:1747_0: Tacassa ca atacaparicchinnatā tacena aparicchinnatā atthīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1747_1: “Dīghabāhu naccatū”tiādīsu viya aññapadatthepi samāse avayavapadatthasaṅgaho labbhatevāti vuttaṃ “kāyekadesabhūto taco gahito evā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1747_4: tappaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhānaṃ itaresaṃ samūhabhūto sabbo kāyo “tacapariyanto”tveva vuttoti dassento “tappaṭibaddhā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1748_2: manasikiriyāya kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇādito upadhāraṇassa ca paguṇabhāvāpādanaṃ idha uggaho.
tika-abh02t0:1748_3: Yena pana nayena yogāvacaro tattha kusalo hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1749_4: tacapañcakassa ca paṭilomato sajjhāyakkamo sambandho dassito.
tika-abh02t0:1749_8: anulomapaṭilomato pañcāhanti evaṃ pañcakachakkesu paccekaṃ tipañcāhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1749_9: Purimehi ekato tipañcāhanti tacapañcakādīhi saddhiṃ anulomato vakkapañcakādīni ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttanayeneva tipañcāhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1749_11: anulomapaṭilomato sajjhāye antabhūtassa paṭilomato sajjhāyassa dassanavasena.
tika-abh02t0:1749_14: Etampīti yadidaṃ purimehi saddhiṃ pacchimassa pañcakādino ekato sajjhāyakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1749_15: pañcakādīnaṃ paccekaṃ anulomādinā sajjhāyappakārato añño sajjhāyappakāro esoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1749_16: Dvinnaṃ hatthānaṃ ekamukhā aññamaññasambandhā ṭhapitā aṅguliyo idha hatthasaṅkhalikāti adhippetāti āha “aṅgulipantī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1750_0: Attano koṭṭhāso, samāno vā koṭṭhāso sakoṭṭhāso, tattha bhavo sakoṭṭhāsiko, kammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1751_0: Kāyānupassanaṃ hitvāti asubhato vā dhātuto anupassanaṃ manasikāraṃ akatvā.
tika-abh02t0:1752_2: Manasikaraṇaṃ cittanti ekantaṃ samādhinimittasseva samannāhārakaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1752_3: Vikkhepavasena cittassa nānārammaṇe visaṭappavatti idha pabhañjanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1754_3: Paññāya tosetīti yāyaṃ tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanā,
tika-abh02t0:1754_8: Yathāvuttavisesasiddhiyāva hi taṃsādhikāya paññāya taṃ cittaṃ sampahaṃsitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1754_9: Evaṃ sampahaṃsanto ca yasmā sabbaso paribandhavisodhanena paññāya cittaṃ vodāpetīti ca vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:1754_12: Sampahaṃsetīti bhāvanāya cittaṃ sammā pahāseti pamodeti.
tika-abh02t0:1757_0: Antoti abbhantare koṭṭhāse. Sukhumanti sukhumanhāruādiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1759_6: “Gopphakaṭṭhikādīni avuttānī”ti na vattabbaṃ “ekekasmiṃ pāde dve gopphakaṭṭhīnī”ti vuttattā,
tika-abh02t0:1763_4: heṭṭhimehi ekato ca sajjhāye channaṃ channaṃ pañcāhānaṃ vasena pañca māsā paripuṇṇā labbhanti,
tika-abh02t0:1763_5: tacapañcake pana visuṃ tipañcāhamevāti āha “addhamāse ūnepī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1765_0: “Nīlaṃ pīta”ntiādinā saṅghāṭe nīlādivavatthānaṃ taṃnissayattā mahābhūte upādāyāti āha “mahābhūtaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1767_0: Yathāvuttena ākārenāti “iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā”tiādinā,
tika-abh02t0:1767_1: “imaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmenā”tiādinā vā vuttappakārena vidhinā.
tika-abh02t0:1777_2: vatthārammaṇehi saddhiṃ sukhasāmisādippakārehi aviparītaṃ vedanaṃ jānantassāti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1777_5: pariññātavedanopi vā uppannāya sukhavedanāya lokavohārena “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti jānāti,
tika-abh02t0:1778_2: Atthadhammādīsu sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā maggapaññā eva lokuttarapaṭisambhidā.
tika-abh02t0:1779_2: “Vatthu nāma karajakāyo”ti vacanena nivattitaṃ dassento “na cakkhādīni cha vatthūnī”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1779_3: Aññamaññupatthambhena ṭhitesu dvīsu naḷakalāpesu ekassa itarapaṭibaddhaṭṭhititā viya nāmakāyassa rūpakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitādassanañhetaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1780_3: Sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ suvibhūtavuttitāya vuttaṃ “sabbesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vedanā pākaṭā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1780_4: Vilāpetvā vilāpetvāti suvisuddhaṃ navanītaṃ vilāpetvā sītibhūtaṃ atisītale udake pakkhipitvā patthinnaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1780_5: ṭhitaṃ matthetvā paripiṇḍetvā puna vilāpetvāti satavāraṃ evaṃ katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1781_0: Tatthāpīti yattha arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ eva…pe… dassitaṃ, tatthāpi.
tika-abh02t0:1784_3: Visuṃ vacananti aññākusalato visuṃ katvā vacanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1788_0: 367. Ekasmiṃ yuge baddhagoṇānaṃ viya ekato pavatti yuganaddhatā.
tika-abh02t0:1789_1: Nimittanti cāti subhanimittanti ca vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1789_2: Ekaṃsena sattā attano attano hitasukhameva āsīsantīti katvā vuttaṃ “ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1789_3: Anupāyo eva ca hitavisiṭṭhassa sukhassa ayonisomanasikāro,
tika-abh02t0:1791_6: Abhidhamme hi “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti etassa vibhaṅge
tika-abh02t0:1791_7: “arūpe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ uppajjatī”tiādivacanato
tika-abh02t0:1792_4: Aṭṭhavīsatividhāti itthiādivasena sattavidhā paccekaṃ averādīhi yojanāvasena aṭṭhavīsatividhā.
tika-abh02t0:1793_1: “Bahukaṃ sutaṃ hoti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādivacanato bahussutatā navaṅgassa sāsanassa vasena veditabbā,
tika-abh02t0:1793_2: na vinayamattassevāti vuḍḍhataṃ pana anapekkhitvā icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1794_0: Tiṭṭhati anuppannā vicikicchā ettha etesu “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādikāya pavattiyā anekabhedesu
tika-abh02t0:1795_4: tattha nibbematikassa tadabhāvato ca sesavicikicchānaṃ ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh02t0:1804_2: Āgamanavasena vuttaṃ aññathā maggasammāsatiyā kathaṃ kāyārammaṇatā siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1804_7: sati ca tasmiṃ anekāvabodhassa ca āpajjanato.
tika-abh02t0:1804_10: Na dhammassa dhammo kiccanti ekassa dhammassa aññadhammo kiccaṃ nāma na hoti tadabhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1804_12: Tassa bhedoti tassa kiccassa bhedo natthi.
tika-abh02t0:1804_13: Tasmāti yasmā nayidha dhammassa vibhāgena kiccabhedo icchito,
tika-abh02t0:1807_5: Puggalaṃ anāmasitvāti “kāye kāyānupassī”ti evaṃ puggalaṃ aggahetvā.
tika-abh02t0:1812_3: anuppannapāpakānuppādanādikiriyāya anurūpappadhānāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1813_1: “Na añño dhammoti yathā taṇhāyanamicchābhinivesavāyamanasabhāvānaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ chandapariyāyo aññadhammo
tika-abh02t0:1813_2: nāma hoti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātassa chandaniyassa tesu abhāvā,
tika-abh02t0:1813_3: dhammacchando pana taṃsabhāvattā aññadhammo na hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1815_0: Na sakkontīti āha “santāya samāpattiyā parihīnā brahmacariyavāse santhambhituṃ na sakkontī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1816_0: Tattha duvidhāyāti yojetabbaṃ. Uppannāyevāti uppannapubbā eva uppajjanti samudācārādivasena.
tika-abh02t0:1817_1: Pakatattāvatthena hi sabbena sabbaṃ tāni na caritabbāni.
tika-abh02t0:1817_2: Itarāvatthena ca tadavatthāya tāni tāniyeva caritabbāni.
tika-abh02t0:1817_5: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1817_7: na nīce āsane nisinne ucce āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1817_10: na nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1817_11: na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti imāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh02t0:1817_21: pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ na sāditabba”nti idaṃ sabbampi asādiyanasāmaññena ekaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1818_0: “Kammañcā”ti paccattavasena vuttaṃ kammaṃ “avipakkavipākassā”ti ettha “kammassā”ti sāmivacanavasena pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1818_6: Maggena samucchinnā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo “anusayā”ti vuccantīti āha “anusayita…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1819_3: Tattha nimittaggāhavasena ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe kilesuppattihetubhāvena
tika-abh02t0:1819_4: uppattiṭṭhānato adhigatameva nāma hotīti āha “adhigataṃ nimittaggāhavasenā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1819_7: Tañca kho gāhake labbhamānaṃ gahetabbe upacaritvā,
tika-abh02t0:1819_8: yathā nissite labbhamānaṃ nissaye upacaritvā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1819_9: Idāni upacāraṃ muñcitvā nippariyāyeneva atthaṃ dassento “nimittaggāha…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1820_4: Evaṃ maggena pahīnakilesā daṭṭhabbā magge anuppanne uppattirahānampi uppanne sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1823_1: Vīriyajeṭṭhikāya pana maggabhāvanāya na vattabbāni sammappadhānāni “maggādhipatīnī”ti vā “namaggādhipatīnī”ti
tika-abh02t0:1823_4: namaggabhūtavīriyādhipatino ca abhāvo navattabbatāya kāraṇanti imamatthamāha “maggādhipatīnī”tiādinā.
tika-abh02t0:1828_3: Pajjitabbā iddhi vuttā “iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇantī”ti kattusādhanassa iddhisaddassa karaṇasādhanena pādasaddena samānādhikaraṇatāya asambhavato,
tika-abh02t0:1828_4: ijjhanakassa ca atthassa karaṇabhūtena pādena pajjitabbattā “iddhi eva pādo”ti saddayojanā na sambhavatīti imamatthamāha “na ca…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1828_6: Iddhikiriyākaraṇenāti ijjhanakiriyāya karaṇabhūtena atthena sādhetabbā ca iddhi pajjitabbāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1828_8: Na asamānādhikaraṇatā sambhavati paṭisedhadvayaṃ pakatiyaṃ ṭhapetīti.
tika-abh02t0:1828_10: dutiyena sāmivacanasamāso iddhipādasaddānaṃ na yujjati, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1828_11: Yathāvuttā vā paṭhamenatthena samānādhikaraṇasamāsavaseneva yojanā yujjati pādassa pajjamānakoṭṭhāsabhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1828_12: Dutiyenatthena itarasamāseneva yojanā yujjati pādassa ijjhanakaraṇūpāyabhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:1829_3: Visunti “iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo”ti imasmā visuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1829_6: Paṭilābhapubbabhāgānanti visesādhigamataṃpubbabhāgānaṃ yathākkamaṃ kattiddhikaraṇiddhibhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttoti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1829_10: vīmaṃsāva vīmaṃsiddhipādo”ti vuttattā āha “uttaracūḷabhājanīye vā vuttehi chandādīhi iddhipādehī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1830_6: Yadipi samādhivisesanasamannāgamaṅgadassanatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vīriyaṃ āgatanti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1830_8: Evaṃ siddhe sati puna vacanaṃ vīriyantarasabbhāvaṃ nu kho dīpetīti kadāci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “vīriyañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1830_11: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “chandaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhi”ntiādi.
tika-abh02t0:1830_12: Taṃtaṃavassayanavasenāti tassa tassa chandassa samādhino avassayatāvasena,
tika-abh02t0:1830_17: Tattha tenevāti chandādīnaṃyeva upāyatthabhāveneva iddhipādabhāvassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1830_18: Upāyiddhipādadassanatthamevāti chandādike dhure jeṭṭhake pubbaṅgame katvā nibbattitasamādhi chandādīnaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1830_21: viññāṇakkhandho”ti tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ chandādivisiṭṭhānaṃyeva vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:1830_23: Aññathā kevalaṃ iddhisampayuttānaṃyeva khandhānaṃ vasena iddhipādabhāve gayhamāne catubbidhatā na hoti visesakāraṇābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1831_4: Kulāpadese jātimā purissaro hotīti “pubbaṅgamattā cittassa visiṭṭhajātisadisatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1831_5: Vicāraṇāpaññāhetukattā mantassa vīmaṃsāsadisatā suviññeyyāvāti na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh02t0:1832_6: Tathā hi “sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyevā”ti iddhiiddhipāde amissetvāpi kathitaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1832_7: Visesenāti bhedena catūsu iddhipādesu asammissabhāvena āveṇikattā.
tika-abh02t0:1832_8: Āveṇikā hi chandādayo tassa tassa iddhipādassa.
tika-abh02t0:1833_9: chandādhiko vā samādhi adhippetoti āha “chandavato ko samādhi na ijjhissatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1834_11: Chandādīnaṃ viya sampayuttakkhandhānaṃ sabhāvato iddhibhāvo natthīti āha “iddhibhāvapariyāyo atthī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1835_0: Pubbe vuttato vacanakkamena aññanti āha “apubbanti katvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1835_11: chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasamādhī”tiādinā samādhissa visesanabhāvena.
tika-abh02t0:1835_13: Tattha samādhisevanavasenāti chandādhike adhipatiṃ karitvā samādhissa āsevanavasena.
tika-abh02t0:1838_2: tesu paccekaṃ cattāro iddhipādā na sambhavantīti āha “sādhipativārānaṃ paripuṇṇānaṃ abhāvā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1838_3: Tattha kāraṇamāha “na hi adhipatīnaṃ adhipatayo vijjantī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1838_4: Yadi hi adhipatī siyuṃ sādhipatīti iddhipādabhedena dvattiṃsa nayasatāni,
tika-abh02t0:1838_9: Suddhikāni aṭṭha nayasatāni sādhipatikānipi aṭṭhevāti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena soḷasa nayasatāni.
tika-abh02t0:1841_0: Sayaṃ jeṭṭhakabhāvena pavattanato cattāro adhipatayo aññamaññaṃ garuṃ na karonti.
tika-abh02t0:1841_3: Etamatthanti “adhipatayo aññamaññassa adhipatī na bhavantī”ti etamatthaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1841_5: Adhipatiṃ na karontīti adhipatiṃ katvā garuṃ katvā nappavattanti.
tika-abh02t0:1841_7: “Avīmaṃsādhipatikassa maggassa abhāvā”ti idaṃ “adhipatitāsamatthā dhammā adhipatibhāveneva pavatteyyu”nti dosāropanavasenāha,
tika-abh02t0:1841_10: na aññathāti sahabhāvepi tadabhāvaṃ sandhāya visesanaṃ na kattabbaṃ siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1841_13: Na vattabbaṃ siyā sabbesampi adhipatīnaṃ sādhipatikattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1847_3: Patiṭṭhānāya pana byāpārāpatti kammanti vuttaṃ “abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1847_4: Yasmā kilesesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo taṇhādiṭṭhicaritānaṃ visesato saṃsāranāyikā,
tika-abh02t0:1847_12: Diṭṭhīsupi antomukhappavattāya bhavadiṭṭhiyā visesato saṃsāre avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1847_14: Bahimukhappavattāpi vibhavadiṭṭhi bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṃ nātivattatīti vuttaṃ “ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1847_15: Layāpatti yathāraddhassa ārambhassa aniṭṭhānaṃ antosaṅkocabhāvatoti āha “līnavasena patiṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1847_16: Uddhatāpatti anupāyabhūtā byāpārāpatti asaṅkocabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “uddhaccavasena āyūhanā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1847_17: Tathā kosajjapakkhikattā ca kāmasukhānuyogassa uddhaccapakkhikattā ca attakilamathānuyogassa tadubhayavasena patiṭṭhānāyūhanā vuttā,
tika-abh02t0:1847_20: Avuttānanti “kilesavasena patiṭṭhāna”ntiādīnaṃ vasena veditabbā patiṭṭhānāyūhanāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:1850_15: ko vā taṃ abhipattheyyāti vaṭṭānugedhabhūto lobho vaṭṭāmisanti ca vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:1853_7: so ekova dhammo ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti abhiññāya abhiññeyyo.
tika-abh02t0:1853_12: bhikkhuno satthā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo”tiādinā āgatāni vimuccanakāraṇāni.
tika-abh02t0:1853_17: Khīṇāsavo hi dasavasso hutvā parinibbuto puna dasavasso na hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1853_20: ekamuhuttikopi na hotiyeva puna paṭisandhiyā abhāvā,
tika-abh02t0:1853_24: “Sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī”tiādīni dasa nijjaravatthūni.
tika-abh02t0:1854_1: “Maggaṃ appattaṃ kāyikaṃ vīriya”nti visesetvā vuttattā pana lokuttaravīriyampi pariyāyena kāyikaṃ nāma atthīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1855_3: evaṃ rūpāvacare pīti nibbedhabhāgiyā vattabbā siyā.
tika-abh02t0:1855_4: Evaṃ labbhamānāpi alabbhamānaṃ upādāya na vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1855_9: Na hi kāmāvacarā avitakkaavicārā pīti atthi.
tika-abh02t0:1856_1: Maggapaṭivedhānulomanato vipassanāya viya pādakajjhānesupi satiādayo “bojjhaṅgā”tveva vuccantīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā na paṭikkhipitabbo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1856_2: Evaṃ kasiṇajjhānādīsu bojjhaṅge uddharantānaṃ adhippāyaṃ vatvā anuddharantānaṃ adhippāyaṃ vattuṃ “anuddharantā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:1856_3: Te hi āsannekantakiccanibbattīhi vipassanākkhaṇe bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
tika-abh02t0:1863_2: so ca samādhivīriyasambojjhaṅgo viya sampayuttānaṃ ūnādhikabhāvabyāvaṭo ahutvā tesaṃ anūnānadhikabhāve
tika-abh02t0:1868_4: Ariyopapadataṃ na karoti vināpi tenassa ariyabhāvasiddhito.
tika-abh02t0:1869_3: pahāne ca ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanādinā visesappaccayattā sammādiṭṭhiādīni micchāvācādīni pajahāpentīti vuttāni.
tika-abh02t0:1869_4: Micchāvācādito nivatti sammāvācādikiriyāti vuttaṃ “sammāvācādikiriyā hi viratī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1870_0: Khandhopadhiṃ vipaccatīti paṭisandhidāyikaṃ sandhāyāha. Tattha vipaccatīti pavattivipākadāyikaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1871_0: Ekekanti “tattha katamā sammādiṭṭhī”tiādinā ekekaṃ aṅgaṃ pucchitvā.
tika-abh02t0:1871_3: Saha pana pucchitvāti “tattha katamo pañcaṅgiko maggo”ti pucchitvā.
tika-abh02t0:1871_6: “tattha katamo pañcaṅgiko maggo”ti pana ekato katāya pucchāya vissajjanavasena paṭiniddesabhāvato na pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1871_7: Kasmā panettha pañcaṅgikavāre eva pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1871_14: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti,
tika-abh02t0:1877_10: Kāraṇe hi siddhe phalampi siddhameva hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:1877_22: Tathā hi vakkhati “sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena sikkhāsaddassa atthadassanatthaṃ vuttā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1883_0: Bhedanapariyāyavasena vuttaṃ, tasmā kilesānaṃ pahānā kilesānaṃ bhedā bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1884_0: Guṇavasenāti sekkhadhammādiguṇānaṃ vasena. Tena bhāvatthato bhikkhusaddo dassito hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1885_0: Idaṃ dvayanti “ettha cā”tiādinā parato saṅgahadassanavasena vuttaṃ “sekkho”tiādikaṃ vacanadvayaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1885_1: Imināti “sekkho bhikkhu bhinnattā pāpakāna”nti padānaṃ atthadassanena.
tika-abh02t0:1886_3: Parisāvatthusīmāsampattiyo “samaggena saṅghena akuppenā”ti iminā pakāsitāti “ṭhānāraha”nti padassa “anūna…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1887_1: Avītikkamanaviratibhāvatoti avītikkamasamādānabhūtā viratīti katvā vārittasīlaṃ patvā virati eva padhānanti cetanāsīlassapi pariyāyatā vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:1888_1: Pātimokkhasīlaṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ na pakatisīlādikena gayhatīti āha “pātimokkhato aññaṃ sīlaṃ kāyikaavītikkamādiggahaṇena gahita”nti.
tika-abh02t0:1888_2: Taṃ pana pātimokkhasīlena na saṅgayhatīti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1888_3: kāyikavācasikasaṃvarassa tabbinimuttassa abhāvatoti dassento “iminā adhippāyena vutta”nti āha.
tika-abh02t0:1889_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
tika-abh02t0:1889_5: aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
tika-abh02t0:1889_6: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī,
tika-abh02t0:1889_13: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pātī.
tika-abh02t0:1889_14: “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1889_15: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1890_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1890_4: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe vā saṃsāradukkhe vāti pātī,
tika-abh02t0:1892_0: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro, tato mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1893_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:1893_4: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
tika-abh02t0:1893_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-abh02t0:1894_5: samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1894_7: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho,
tika-abh02t0:1894_11: Sīlasaṃvaro hi nibbedhabhāgiyo sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya hoti yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanatoti patimokkhaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1895_4: Sabbākaārena pana jinapātimokkho bhagavāva anavajjapatimokkhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ saṃvaṇṇeyya.
tika-abh02t0:1899_0: 514. Gacchanti yathāsakaṃ visaye pavattantīti gāvo, cakkhādīni indriyāni.
tika-abh02t0:1901_5: “na puna evaṃ karomī”ti attano dahanaṃ manasā adhiṭṭhānaṃ saṃyamanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1901_6: saṃyamanakaraṇīyāni saṃvarakaraṇīyānīti cittamattāyattā eva saṃyamasaṃvarā ācariyena adhippetāti āha “anāpattigamanīyānī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1901_7: Antevāsikatthero pana desanāpi cittuppādamanasikārehi vinā na hotīti desanāvisuddhiṃ nissaraṇaṃ vadati.
tika-abh02t0:1902_2: sa bhikkhū”tiādīsu viya idhāpi guṇato bhikkhu adhippeto.
tika-abh02t0:1902_3: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhūti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato evamāhā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1902_4: Yattakaṃ ekena puggalena asesetvā samādātuṃ sakkā,
tika-abh02t0:1902_5: taṃ sandhāyāha “yena samādānena sabbāpi sikkhā samādinnā hontī”ti yathā upasampadāpāripūriyā asesaṃ upasampannasikkhāsamādānaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1902_8: Yathā samādinnāya sikkhāya sabbena sabbaṃ avītikkamanaṃ sikkhitabbākāro,
tika-abh02t0:1902_13: taṃ sikkhiyamānaṃ na hotīti sesitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “vītikkamanavasena sesassā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1903_1: Cittaparisodhanabhāvanāti cittassa parisodhanabhūtā āvaraṇīyadhammavikkhambhikā samādhivipassanābhāvanā cittaparisodhanabhāvanā.
tika-abh02t0:1903_3: Idanti idaṃ abbokiṇṇabhavaṅgottaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ kiriyamayacittānaṃ appavattanaṃ suppaṃ nāma.
tika-abh02t0:1904_2: ekacce ca maggadhammā saha na pavattanti,
tika-abh02t0:1904_4: Ete tāva ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe saha na pavattantīti na gaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1904_5: indriyabalāni kasmā na gahitānīti āha “pavatta…pe… hontī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1904_6: Evampi saddhindriyabalāni bojjhaṅgehi na saṅgayhantīti kathaṃ tesaṃ tadantogadhatāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “pīti…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1905_2: sabbabhāgato vā tesu eva abhikkamādīsu atthānatthādisabbabhāgato sabbākārato.
tika-abh02t0:1906_3: bhikkhāya caraṇameva vā sampajaññassa visayabhāvato gocaro,
tika-abh02t0:1906_5: So pana abhikkamādibhedabhinnanti visesanavasena vuttaṃ “abhikkamādīsu panā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1906_8: yogino sukhavisesahetutāya vā kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte sampajaññassa visayabhāvena gocare.
tika-abh02t0:1907_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ padhānaṃ katvāti cīvarapārupanādisarīrapariharaṇakiccakālepi kammaṭṭhānamanasikārameva padhānaṃ katvā.
tika-abh02t0:1908_0: Tasmāti yasmā ussukkajāto hutvā ativiya maṃ yācasi,
tika-abh02t0:1908_2: indriyāni ca te paripākaṃ gatāni, tasmā.
tika-abh02t0:1908_5: Sikkhitabbanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannampi sikkhānaṃ vasena sikkhanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1909_0: Tattha diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattanti rūpāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhamattaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1909_1: Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpe rūpamattameva passati,
tika-abh02t0:1909_3: evaṃ sesataṃdvārikaviññāṇehipi me ettha diṭṭhamattameva bhavissatīti sikkhitabbanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1909_4: Atha vā diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1909_10: yathā āpāthagate rūpe cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati na dussati na muyhati,
tika-abh02t0:1909_11: evaṃ rāgādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattameva me javanaṃ bhavissati,
tika-abh02t0:1909_13: Atha vā diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭharūpaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1909_14: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma tattheva uppannaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātaṃ cittattayaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1909_15: Yathā taṃ na rajjati na dussati na muyhati,
tika-abh02t0:1909_16: evaṃ āpāthagate rūpe teneva sampaṭicchanādippamāṇena javanaṃ uppādessāmi,
tika-abh02t0:1909_17: nāssa taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1909_19: Mutanti ca tadārammaṇaviññāṇehi saddhiṃ gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1909_20: Viññāte viññātamattanti ettha pana viññātaṃ nāma manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1909_23: Yathā āvajjanaṃ na rajjati na dussati na muyhati,
tika-abh02t0:1909_24: evaṃ rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ adatvā āvajjanappamāṇeneva cittaṃ ṭhapessāmīti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh02t0:1909_25: Evañhi te bāhiya sikkhitabbanti evaṃ imāya paṭipadāya tayā bāhiya tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ anupavattanavasena sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1909_26: Iti bhagavā bāhiyassa saṃkhittarucitāya chahi viññāṇakāyehi saddhiṃ chaḷārammaṇabhedabhinnaṃ vipassanāvisayaṃ
tika-abh02t0:1909_27: diṭṭhādīhi catūhi koṭṭhāsehi vibhajitvā tatthassa ñātatīraṇapariññaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1910_1: Ettha hi rūpāyatanaṃ passitabbaṭṭhena diṭṭhaṃ nāma,
tika-abh02t0:1910_4: na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā.
tika-abh02t0:1910_7: avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti kuto tattha paṇḍitassa rajjanādīnaṃ okāsoti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:1911_0: Idāni ñātatīraṇapariññāsu patiṭṭhitassa upari saha phalena pahānapariññaṃ dassetuṃ “yato kho te bāhiyā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1911_8: yena vā kāraṇena diṭṭhādīsu mayā vuttavidhiṃ paṭipajjantassa aviparītasabhāvāvabodhena diṭṭhādimattaṃ bhavissati,
tika-abh02t0:1911_10: tena vā kāraṇena tvaṃ tena diṭṭhādipaṭibaddhena rāgādinā saha na bhavissasi,
tika-abh02t0:1911_11: ratto vā duṭṭho vā mūḷho vā na bhavissasi pahīnarāgādikattā,
tika-abh02t0:1911_12: tena vā diṭṭhādinā saha paṭibaddho na bhavissasīti.
tika-abh02t0:1911_15: yasmā vā tvaṃ tena rāgena vā ratto,
tika-abh02t0:1911_17: mohena vā mūḷho na bhavissasi, tadā,
tika-abh02t0:1911_18: tasmā vā tvaṃ tattha diṭṭhādike na bhavissasi,
tika-abh02t0:1911_19: tasmiṃ diṭṭhe vā sutamutaviññāte vā “etaṃ mama,
tika-abh02t0:1911_21: eso me attā”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi allīno patiṭṭhito na bhavissasi.
tika-abh02t0:1911_22: Ettāvatā pahānapariññaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā khīṇāsavabhūmi dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:1911_23: Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha, na huraṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1911_25: tena rāgādinā tattha diṭṭhādīsu paṭibaddho na bhavissasi,
tika-abh02t0:1911_30: vaṭṭadukkhassa ca ayameva anto ayaṃ paricchedo parivaṭumabhāvoti ayameva hi ettha attho.
tika-abh02t0:1911_31: Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti padaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ nāma icchanti,
tika-abh02t0:1913_0: “Tattha hī”tiādinā pañcaviññāṇavīthiyaṃ puretaraṃ pavattaayonisomanasikāravasena āvajjanādīnaṃ ayoniso
tika-abh02t0:1914_4: so tabbisayaṃ vijānanampi nipphādeti nāma hoti.
tika-abh02t0:1915_5: Gate ṭhite nisinneti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathito”ti vakkhamāno viseso.
tika-abh02t0:1916_0: Pavatteti caṅkamādīsu pavatte rūpārūpadhamme. Pariggaṇhantassa aniccādito.
tika-abh02t0:1919_5: Ettha ca yathāvutto pariggaho jāto etissāti pariggahitā,
tika-abh02t0:1919_6: taṃ pariggahitaṃ niyyānabhūtaṃ satiṃ katvāti attho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1921_3: tathābhūto vā cittuppādo saññāsīsena vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:1924_1: Yathā kenaci nikkujjitaṃ “idaṃ nāmeta”nti pakatiñāṇena na ñāyati,
tika-abh02t0:1924_2: evaṃ sabbappakārena aviditaṃ nikkujjitaṃ viya hotīti āha “sabbathā aññātatā nikkujjitabhāvo”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1925_8: Uttānīkarontīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonti.
tika-abh02t0:1925_9: Ettha ca “paññāpentī”tiādīhi chahi padehi atthapadāni dassitāni.
tika-abh02t0:1925_10: “Ācikkhanti desentī”ti pana dvīhi padehi byañjanapadānīti evaṃ atthabyañjanapadasampannāya uḷārāya pasaṃsāya pasaṃsanaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:1927_1: Taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇanti taṃyeva kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ “ananta”nti manasikārena phuṭaṃ pharitvā
tika-abh02t0:1927_2: ṭhitaṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi karotīti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1927_3: Dutiyavikappe pana sāmaññajotanā visese tiṭṭhatīti “phuṭa”nti iminā viññāṇameva vuttanti phuṭaṃ viññāṇanti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇamāha.
tika-abh02t0:1927_6: tañca dutiyāruppaviññāṇaṃ vadatīti āha “viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1927_10: Evanti yathāvuttākāraṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāse paṭhamāruppaviññāṇena anantapharaṇavasena yo gahitākāro,
tika-abh02t0:1932_1: Catukkanaye dutiyajjhānameva yesaṃ vicāro oḷārikato na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh02t0:1932_3: tesaṃ vasena dvidhā bhinditvā desitanti catukkanayato pañcakanayo nīhatoti āha “uddhaṭānaṃyeva catunnaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1936_1: Heṭṭhimo ariyo uparimassa ariyassa lokuttaracittāni paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ “na ca…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1937_2: Idha sabbasaddassa padesasabbavācibhāvato ekadesassa asambhavepi sabbatthapādakatā eva veditabbāti dassetuṃ “sabbattha…pe…
tika-abh02t0:1939_1: saddena ca sambandhitabbaṃ “sasantānagatampi apākaṭaṃ rūpaṃ dibbacakkhu viya sasantānagatampi apākaṭaṃ kammaṃ vibhāvetī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:1939_3: kamme ca abhiññāñāṇena payojanaṃ natthīti “apākaṭa”nti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:1944_12: saddo yathā mettāsahagatena cetasā puratthimādīsu ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati,
tika-abh02t0:1944_13: tathā dutiyampi disaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā pharitvā viharatī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh02t0:1944_18: tasmā “yathā mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ, dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:1944_21: tiriyaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā pharitvā viharatī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh02t0:1944_31: tassa pharaṇantarādino ṭhānaṃ ṭhānabhūto “vipulenā”tiādinā vuccamāno mettābhāvanāviseso.
tika-abh02t0:1944_33: Iti katvā iminā kāraṇena na vuttaṃ taṃ dvayanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:1946_2: taṃ panettha adhimuccanaṃ yasmā pharaṇavaseneva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:1946_4: Yasmā pana ārammaṇe suṭṭhu asaṃsappanavaseneva taṃ mettābhāvanāya adhimuccanaṃ hoti,
