tika-abh02t0:2044_3: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetī”ti ārabhitvā “so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2044_5: itarassa ca rūpāyatanassa dassanasamatthassāpi dibbacakkhuñāṇassa sikhāpatti cavamānopapajjamānasattadassananti āha “muddhappattena cā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:2047_1: Chabbidhampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇa”ntiādinā vuttaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattañāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2047_2: Saha gahetvāti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vipassanārammaṇabhāvasāmaññena ekattena gahetvā.
tika-abh02t0:2047_3: Saṅkhipitvā vuttenāti pubbe chadhā vuttaṃ viya dassitaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti evaṃ saṅkhipitvā vuttena.
tika-abh02t0:2047_8: Vipassanāti ca “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”ntiādinā paccayapaccayuppannadhamme vibhāgena dassanato dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ idhādhippetaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2048_0: Evamettha aṭṭhakathādhippāyavasena pāḷiyā atthaṃ dassetvā idāni attano adhippāyavasena dassetuṃ “pāḷiyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:2048_6: Tena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇato aññaṃyeva pariyosāne vuttaṃ ñāṇanti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:2048_8: Ayameva cettha attho yuttoti dassento “na hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:2048_9: Tattha “tampi ñāṇanti sambandho na hotī”ti evaṃ sambandho na yutto aṅgantarabhāvassa avibhāvanatoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:2048_12: Na hi visuṃ visuṃ vuttameva ekajjhaṃ vacanamattena atthantaraṃ hotīti.
tika-abh02t0:2048_14: cā”ti iminā purimasmiṃ pakkhe upacayena dosamāha.
tika-abh02t0:2051_0: 808. Paccanīkadhammeti nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhamme. Dukkhanti samāpajjane asati uppajjanakadukkhaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2055_4: na aññapaṭipakkhādiatthoti āha “natthi ṭhānanti vā aṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh02t0:2055_7: dutiyo sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh02t0:2055_8: Taṇhupādānādīnampi sukhato upagamanassa hetubhāve diṭṭhivipallāsassa so sātisayo asukhepi daḷhaṃ pavattāpanatoti āha “diṭṭhivipallāsova…pe…
tika-abh02t0:2055_13: attadiṭṭhisannissayā pana sabbadiṭṭhiyoti dassetuṃ “attadiṭṭhivasenāti padhānadiṭṭhimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2056_0: So evāti yo liṅge aparivatte tasmiṃ attabhāve bhavaṅgajīvitindriyappabandho, so eva.
tika-abh02t0:2056_2: na cettha bhāvakalāpajīvitindriyassa vasena codanā kātabbā tadaññasseva adhippetattā.
tika-abh02t0:2057_0: Sapattavasena yojetabbanti “sapattaṃ māremīti abhisandhinā sapattena nipannaṭṭhāne nipannaṃ manussabhūto
tika-abh02t0:2057_1: manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā mārento”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2057_5: Puthujjanasseva taṃ dinnaṃ hotīti ettha yathā arahattaṃ patvā paribhuttampi puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ puthujjanadānameva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2057_6: evaṃ maraṇādhippāyena puthujjanakāle pahāre dinne arahattaṃ patvā teneva pahārena mate kasmā arahantaghātoyeva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2057_9: Yathā hi dānaṃ deyyadhammassa pariccāgamattena hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2057_14: tena maraṇanti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ pāripūriyāva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2057_16: Tasmā arahattaṃ pattasseva maraṇanti arahantaghātoyeva hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2057_18: Yasmā pana “imaṃ māremī”ti yaṃ santānaṃ ārabbha māraṇicchā,
tika-abh02t0:2057_19: tassa puthujjanakhīṇāsavabhāvena payogamaraṇakkhaṇānaṃ vasena satipi santānabhede abhedoyeva.
tika-abh02t0:2057_23: Kathaṃ panettha vadhakacetanā vattamānavisayā siyāti āha “vadhakacittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇampi…pe…
tika-abh02t0:2057_32: Aññasakakaraṇanti attato vinimocetvā aññassa dakkhiṇeyyassa santakabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2057_36: sacepi arahattaṃ patvā tena paribhuttanti attho.
tika-abh02t0:2058_0: “Kappavināse”ti idaṃ “saṇṭhahante kappe”ti vuttattā mahākappavināsaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “kappaṭṭhakathāya
tika-abh02t0:2058_2: Āyukappo cettha avīciyaṃ nibbattasattānaṃ antarakappaparimāṇaṃ paramāyu veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2058_3: Tañhi sandhāya “ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kāla”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2058_4: Tayidaṃ “ekaṃ kappa”nti yadi ekaṃ mahākappanti attho,
tika-abh02t0:2058_5: tathā sati vīsatiantarakappaparimāṇo eko asaṅkhyeyyakappoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh02t0:2058_8: Yathā pana kappaṭṭhakathāya ayaṃ aṭṭhakathā sameti,
tika-abh02t0:2059_1: Samānasaṃvāsako kammaladdhīnaṃ vasena anānāsaṃvāsakoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:2060_1: Tattha paṭisedhetvāti “puggalo pana niyato nāma natthī”ti evaṃ paṭisedhetvā.
tika-abh02t0:2060_9: Sotāpanno eva hi eko sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2060_11: eko ekabījī nāmāti sotāpannassa niyatabhāvo vuttoti āha “sotāpanno ca niyato”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2060_14: “Pubbahetukiccaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ sotāpannassa niyatatāya vuttattā vakkhamānañca dosaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2060_15: Uparimaggānaṃ saupanissayatte paṭhamamaggassāpi saupanissayatā siddhā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadi hī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:2061_9: “Nāmakaraṇanimittato”ti iminā nāmakaraṇahetutāya niyāmakataṃ vibhāveti ekabījiādisamaññānaṃ anvatthasaññābhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:2062_5: ‘Atthetarahi aññe samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiya’nti evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-abh02t0:2062_6: ‘no’ti vadeyya”ntiādi vacanehi imissā lokadhātuyā viya aññassa buddhassa aññissā lokadhātuyā uppādo nivāritoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2062_7: Na hi vijjamāne “sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2062_12: Sakkoti hi bhagavā yattha yattha icchati,
tika-abh02t0:2062_14: “Ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti ca idaṃ buddhakhettabhūtāya lokadhātuyā dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2062_17: Tattha ekasmiṃ kāle eko eva sammāsambuddho uppajjatīti.
tika-abh02t0:2063_4: Tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti pacchimapaṭivedhato paraṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:2063_5: pacchimasīlabhedato ca paraṃ paṭipattisāsanaṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti sāsanabhāvasāmaññena pana ubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā dassento “pacchima…pe…
tika-abh02t0:2065_1: yato pāramīpavicayādīsu udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavīkampo ahosi,
tika-abh02t0:2065_2: abhisambodhidivase ca ṭhapetvā pubbuttaradisābhāge bodhirukkhamūle bhūmibhāgo mahāpurisaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhi,
tika-abh02t0:2065_3: aññadatthu ekapasse pakkhittaatibhārabharitanāvā viya cakkavāḷagabbho viparivatto.
tika-abh02t0:2065_7: kārassa lopo katoti dassento āha “samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjatīti sāmupādikā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2066_2: Ekasmiṃ upaṭṭhite paccayavasena tadaññassa upaṭṭhānaṃ parivattanaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2069_0: 810. Bhoge bhuñjituṃ na jānāti, vināsetīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:2079_1: “Ke pana te ariyāvāsā”ti pucchitvā te sutteneva dassento “idha,
tika-abh02t0:2079_2: bhikkhave”tiādipāḷiṃ āharitvā “evaṃ vuttā”ti nigametvā puna maggādhigameneva tesaṃ adhigamaṃ dassento “etesū”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:2080_3: Yathā hi maggena asamucchinno rāgo kāraṇalābhe uppajjanāraho thāmagataṭṭhena santāne anusetīti vuccati,
tika-abh02t0:2080_5: Taṃ panassa anusayanaṃ uppattiyā pākaṭaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2080_7: Yasmā pana evaṃ ciraparibhāvitaṃ pariveṭhetvā viya ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2080_8: tasmā “samantato veṭhetvā viya ṭhitabhāvena anusayitataṃ dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2080_10: “Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā”tiādipāḷivasena bhavarāgassāpi vatthukāmatā veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:2082_1: Pahātabbena upaddutanirodhanatthaṃ pahāyakaṃ pariyesatīti paṭhamaṃ pahātabbaṃ,
tika-abh02t0:2082_2: pacchā pahāyakanti ayaṃ pahātabbapajahanakkamo pahānakkamapadena vutto.
tika-abh02t0:2082_6: Tato pacchā appahātabbaṃ yathā taṃ dassanattikādīsu.
tika-abh02t0:2083_0: 826. Tanti bhavaṅgaṃ. Tassāti lokuttarassa. Pādakanti antimabhavikassa bhavaṅgaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh02t0:2087_0: Samādhi vā tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā cittamañjūsāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:2091_1: Paññāva vimuttīti rāgādīhi vimuttibhūtā paññāva vimuttīti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:2091_5: Kasmā panettha balañāṇakicce vuccamāne jhānādiabalañāṇaṃ udāhaṭanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadipī”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:2091_9: Samudayappahānādiekaccañāṇakiccampi akarontaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ kathamappanādikaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ kareyya,
tika-abh02t0:2091_11: tato uttariñca jānantampi yasmā ekaccabalakiccaṃ na karoti,
tika-abh02t0:2091_13: aññaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇanti dassanatthaṃ “etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karotī”tiādi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2091_14: Tattha yathā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ abalakiccaṃ ekaccaṃ na karoti,
tika-abh02t0:2091_15: evaṃ balakiccampīti udāharaṇadassanavasena “tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetu”ntiādi vuttanti dassetuṃ “atha vā…pe…
tika-abh02t0:2096_2: asatipi sahajātapurejātādibhāve yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2096_3: so tassa paccayoti katvā yathā tathā atthitāmattaṃ idha paṭiccatthoti attho.
tika-abh02t0:2096_4: Taṃ pana paṭiccatthaṃ byatirekamukhena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh02t0:2096_5: Tattha nissayādipaccayabhāvena paṭiccāti vuttanti nissayādipaccayabhāvato paccayabhūtaṃ cakkhādi “paṭiccā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2096_6: Ekissā seṇiyāti aṭṭhārasasu seṇīsu mayaṃ amukāya seṇiyā jātāmha,
tika-abh02t0:2096_7: na aññe viya appaññātāti evamettha atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:2099_2: so pana yasmā kusalakiriyāya ṭhānaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2099_4: Pamādasaṅkhātassa atthassa evamādiko pariyāyoti yojanā. Ādi-
tika-abh02t0:2099_9: “cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppādana”ntiādiko tappariyāyappakāsako byañjanapariyāyo ca apariyantoti sambandho.
tika-abh02t0:2099_10: “Cattāro khandhe dassetī”ti iminā sativossaggākārappavattā cattāro akusalakkhandhā pamādoti vadati.

tika-abh02t0:2103_2: patto vā attho attāti niruttinayena padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-abh02t0:2106_0: 851. Gaṇṭhikā sayaṃ gaṇṭhikaraṇato. Patirūpavacanato, aññesaṃ gaṇṭhibhedato ca gaṇṭhibhūtā.
tika-abh02t0:2108_0: 853. Cirakālaparibhāvitattena temanakaraṇaṃ allabhāvakaraṇaṃ, lobhavasena avassavananti attho.
tika-abh02t0:2109_0: Evaṃ sante kathaṃ khīyananti niddesoti āha “khīyananti cā”tiādi.
tika-abh02t0:2110_2: Idāni taṃ visesanabhāvaṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “cīvarena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2112_0: 856. Saṅkampanā ukkaṇṭhanāvasena anavaṭṭhānaṃ, anavadhānaṃ vā. Tassa tassa ārammaṇassa taṇhāyanā.
tika-abh02t0:2113_0: 857. Kāyassāti nāmakāyassa. Tasmiñhi avipphārike rūpakāyopi avipphāriko hoti.
tika-abh02t0:2115_3: “Tattha katamā kuhanā lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassā”tiādinā idha khuddakavibhaṅge āgataṃ desanānayaṃ
tika-abh02t0:2115_4: nissāya mahāniddesadesanā pavattāti āha “nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2117_0: Lābhasakkārasilokahetu sambhāvanādhippāyena saṃyatākāradassanaṃ kohaññanti āha “pāpicchatāya niratthakakāyavacīvipphandaniggahaṇaṃ koraja”nti.
tika-abh02t0:2117_1: Yo saṃvegabahulo kukkuccako pubbenāparaṃ attanopi kiriyaṃ parisaṅkanto paccavekkhamāno tiṭṭhati,
tika-abh02t0:2118_1: Pasaṃsāmukhena nindananti pasaṃsāvatthuto khipanaṃ bahi chaḍḍanaṃ yathā “adāyakaṃ aho dānapatī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2120_2: vaṇṇassa sundarabhāvo vaṇṇapāripūrī hotīti āha “vaṇṇapāripūrī vā vaṇṇapokkharatā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2121_1: Seyyamānādiniddesesūti “tattha katamo seyyassa ‘seyyohamasmī’ti māno”tiādinā niddiṭṭhesu navasu mānaniddesesu.
tika-abh02t0:2121_2: “Seyyādipuggalo”ti idaṃ tattha pāḷiyaṃ seyyādīnaṃ navannaṃ puggalānaṃ āmaṭṭhattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2121_3: Idha pana puggalāmasane sati seyyapuggalo ca āmasitabbo siyā.
tika-abh02t0:2121_7: Yassa kassacīti seyyādīsu yassa kassaci puggalassa.
tika-abh02t0:2123_2: pakkhīnaṃ pana vāyaso”ti vacanato āha “pakkhijātīsu vāyaso anto lāmako”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2125_2: Mānasabhāvaṃ anugato seyyādito sampaggaṇhanavasena pavatto mānasampayuttakattukamyatāchando vā mānacchando.
tika-abh02t0:2127_1: Anuddayassevāti mettāyantassa viya anukampantassa viya vikappanāti āha “sahananditādikassā”ti,
tika-abh02t0:2127_4: Attho yujjatīti evampi “tatthā”ti pāḷipadassa attho yujjati.
tika-abh02t0:2128_1: Kāmaguṇapāripūriyā yebhuyyena loko sambhāvetīti āha “anavaññattatthameva kāmaguṇe ca patthetī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2131_2: Upanāho hi āghātavatthunā cittaṃ bandhanto viya hoti,
tika-abh02t0:2131_3: yato aññathā pavattitvāpi avidite upanāhe āghātavatthusannissitova hoti.
tika-abh02t0:2132_0: 892. Dantehi chinditvāti dantehi chinditvā viya ekadesaṃ apanetvā ekadesaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh02t0:2134_1: saddo loke niruḷhoti āha “yo na sammā bhāsati,
tika-abh02t0:2134_3: Saṭhassa yakkhasūkarasadisataṃ dassento “kucchi vā piṭhi vā jānituṃ na sakkā”ti āha,
tika-abh02t0:2135_0: Yo sabbathā vipannajjhāsayopi samāno kāyavacībhedamattena attānaṃ sampannaṃ viya dassetvā lokaṃ vañcento aññathā santaṃ aññathā pavedeti.
tika-abh02t0:2135_1: Tenāha “tenetaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ māyāto balavatarā vañcanāti daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-abh02t0:2136_4: ekaccānañca sekkhānaṃ yathārahaṃ attābhinivesādīhi katūpakāraṃ rūparāgādisaṃyojanakiccaṃ sādheti,
tika-abh02t0:2136_5: ekaccānaṃ pana vinā eva tehīti kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kathañcipi avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa
tika-abh02t0:2136_7: tadabhāvato “bahiddhā”ti laddhavohāre rūpārūpabhave kevalampi saṃyojanakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ pavattatīti,
tika-abh02t0:2136_8: tato eva rūpārūpāvacarasattānaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanabhāvahetajātanti ca “bahiddhāsaṃyojana”nti vuccatīti imamatthamāha “sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ…pe…
tika-abh02t0:2139_1: Avijjābhavataṇhāhi viya issāmacchariyadomanassādisahāyabhūtena dosenapi bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṃ hotīti “akusalamūlāneva vaṭṭamūlānī”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2140_0: 919. Rūpārūpāvacaravipākānaṃ santapaṇītabhāvena uḷāratamattā tattha sātisayo bhavarāgo vutto.
tika-abh02t0:2141_0: 920. Mānena ṭhapanāti mānena seyyādivasena attano ṭhapanā. Ṭhapanāti ca dahanā, paggaṇhanā vā.
tika-abh02t0:2144_5: Sannipātajo sañcayato paṭṭhāya paccekaṃ visamākārato dosattayasamodhānato jāto.
tika-abh02t0:2144_8: Sabbassāpi hi rogassa dosattayaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ dosappakopena vinā abhāvato.
tika-abh02t0:2144_9: Kammaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ katokāse eva tasmiṃ uppajjanato,
tika-abh02t0:2144_12: Upapajjavedanīyaphalampi pubbekatahetukapakkhikameva atītaddhikattā kammassāti arucisūcanatthaṃ kira-
tika-abh02t0:2147_0: 931. Addanaṃ addā maddavo, anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ tappaṭikkhepena anaddāti āha “amudutā vā anaddā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2151_3: Bhavo eva abhivuddho abhavo yathā “asekkhā dhammā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2154_0: “Sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”ntiādikā diṭṭhi yadipi aññesampi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ attheva,
tika-abh02t0:2154_1: timbaruko pana tathādiṭṭhiko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchīti sā diṭṭhi “timbarukadiṭṭhī”ti vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:2158_2: Aññathāti lābhato takkanato ca aññappakāro gahitoti taṃ dassento “saddhāruciādīhī”ti āha.
tika-abh02t0:2160_1: Udaggatāsaṅkhāto avūpasamo na uddhaccasaṅkhātoti pītiyā eva savipphārikatāsaṅkhātaṃ asantasabhāvaṃ āha.
tika-abh02t0:2165_0: Gaṇena sattasamūhena saṅgaṇi sannipatanaṃ yena saddhiṃ,
tika-abh02t0:2167_0: 948. Adhiccasamuppannikoti “adhiccasamuppanno attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃvādī.
tika-abh02t0:2175_0: Ajjhattanti gocarajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Etassa gāthāvacanassa. Niṭṭhapetvāti abhinivissa.
tika-abh02t0:2176_8: diṭṭhiyā niccādivasena pavatti visesavatī samānepi anāgatakālāmasaneti āha “bhavissantī…pe… vutto”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2176_9: “Ahamasmī”ti pana pavattamānasseva bhavatīti sabbapadasādhāraṇassa mānasseva vasena iñjitāditā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh02t0:2179_4: Tadākāro mohoti yathāvuttākārena pavatte cittuppāde moho.
tika-abh02t0:2179_6: Adhimānasampayuttaṃ sañjānanaṃ pakatipurisantaradassanādivasena pavattaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttacittaṃ phalaṃ viya vimuttanti gahitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2182_2: samato ca asamato ca upanidhānanti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā,
tika-abh02t0:2183_2: Diṭṭhiyāti diṭṭhiyā gahitāya tadavinābhāvinī taṇhā dassitā.
tika-abh02t0:2185_0: 976. Bahikatāni rūpādīni upagantvā pavattā taṇhā upādāyāti vuttāti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:2186_0: Ekaccassa puggalassa ekasmiṃ attabhāve kassaci taṇhāvicaritassa asambhavo,
tika-abh02t0:2191_2: saṅgahitattāti ettha khandhādīnaṃ kāmadhātuādidhātūsu sambhavabhedabhinnānaṃ niravasesato saṅgahitattāti vibhāgena yojanā,
tika-abh02t0:2191_4: Tattha “niravasesato saṅgahitattā”ti iminā “sabbasaṅgāhikavāro”ti ayamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti.
tika-abh02t0:2191_5: Yasmā cettha khandhādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ anavasesasaṅgaho,
tika-abh02t0:2191_7: Khandhādīnameva hi tesaṃ sambhavādivicāro uppattānuppattidassanavāroti vattuṃ yuttoti yojanā.
tika-abh02t0:2191_9: Na hi tattha “kati khandhā na pātubhavantī”tiādipāḷi atthi.
tika-abh02t0:2192_4: aññesaṃ taṃ yādicchikaṃ sutakkharasadisanti āha “sabbaññuvacanaṃ viññāya katattā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2195_1: “Kāmabhave”ti idaṃ okāsavasena vatvā puna sattasantānavasena vattuṃ “kāmadhātusambhūtānañcā”ti vuttanti tamatthavisesaṃ dassento “iddhiyā…pe…
tika-abh02t0:2195_4: yadipi asaññasattānaṃ acakkhukattā rūpāyatanaṃ accantasukhumattā heṭṭhimabhūmikānañca agocaro,
tika-abh02t0:2195_6: uparibhūmikānañca suddhāvāsānaṃ cakkhāyatanassa gocaro hotīti āyatanādikiccaṃ karotiyevāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2195_9: “Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmi”ntiādinā vuttapadesā kāmāvacarādiokāsā.
tika-abh02t0:2195_10: Te sattanikāyā ca dhātūti vuccanti samudāyassa avayavādhārabhāvato yathā “māsapuñjo māso”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2195_12: uppajjanaṭṭhena sattāva uppatti sattuppattīti evaṃ okāsasattalokadvayassa sattuppattipariyāyo veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:2195_20: Yebhuyyena hi tasmiṃ sattāvāse dhammā samānākārena pavattanti.
tika-abh02t0:2198_3: Paricchedakārikāya kāmāditaṇhāya paricchijja āpannā gahitāti pariyāpannāti taṃtaṃbhavādiantogadhā taṃtaṃpariyāpannā.
tika-abh02t0:2206_7: saññāvirāgādīhi ārammaṇassa visesanaṃ tathāpavattāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇakaraṇameva.
tika-abh02t0:2207_1: santabhāvopi mahanīyatāya mahantamevāti āha “vipulā phalāti vipulasantasukhāyuvaṇṇādiphalā”ti.
tika-abh02t0:2208_5: tena saṃvaccharena pañca vassasatāni sañjīve āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2208_11: tena saṃvaccharena dve vassasahassāni saṅghāte āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2208_14: tena saṃvaccharena cattāri vassasahassāni roruve āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2208_17: tena saṃvaccharena aṭṭha vassasahassāni mahāroruve āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2208_20: tena saṃvaccharena soḷasa vassasahassāni tāpane āyuppamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2208_22: Avīciyaṃ eko antarakappo ca āyuppamāṇanti vadanti.
tika-abh02t0:2208_23: Devānaṃ adhimuttakālakiriyā viya tādisena puññabalena antarāpi maraṇaṃ hotīti “kammameva pamāṇa”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2209_0: Kiṃ jhānanti aṭṭhasu jhānesu kataraṃ jhānaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2209_7: Tasmā so brahmakāyikādīhi cuto arūpaṃ upapajjanto veditabbo.
tika-abh02t0:2209_9: na heṭṭhūpapattī”ti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhoti adhippāyena “yaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh02t0:2209_11: na heṭṭhūpapattī”ti pana pāṭhoti tena “heṭṭhūpapattiyeva nivāritā”tiādivacanena payojanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh02t0:2209_13: Arūpadhātūpapatti na nivāritā “matthake ṭhitova parinibbātī”ti niyamassa anicchitattā.
tika-abh02t0:2210_9: tasmiṃ arūpajjhānena vikkhambhite sammadeva diṭṭhādīnavesu yathā kāmarūpabhavesu āyatiṃ bhavābhilāso na bhavissati,
tika-abh02t0:2210_14: Nibbattabhavādīnavadassanavasenāti tasmiṃ rūpabhave nibbattopi tattheva ādīnavadassanavasena.
tika-abh02t0:2210_19: kassaci tayo anusayā anusentī”ti ayaṃ yamakapāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh02t0:2214_0: “Cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā”tiādīsu idha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
